Quixel Megascans and MetaHuman are also vital to our success, with both providing us with hyper-realistic graphics and assets. We cannot thank Epic Games enough for the tools they provide.
A Beautiful, Detailed, and Expansive World

The world of The Harbinger has been built from the ground up to create a series of stunning environments for the player to experience. From intricate lore and worldbuilding, to a breathtaking environment built by hand, we are confident you will love the world as much as we do. Your adventure takes place in a small segment of Vahde known as the Five Holy Nations. Each of these nations has distinctly different environments and social structures, ensuring a comprehensive fantasy RPG experience.

Valbora is the dominant geopolitical power of the Five Holy Nations. It is (quite literally) at the center of trade and politics in the region. It has some of the most fertile lands of the nations, temperate forests, access to bountiful resources, and a coastline that is unrivaled. Valbora is inspired by traditional medieval European society and culture. As Erin, you will begin your journey in the northern reaches of Valbora.

Rengea is a peaceful nation west of Valbora, whom it has close ties with. Rengeans are reserved and respectful, and highly value loyal friendships. Much of the nation is covered in mountains and dense, misty forests, with its southern provinces being an icy tundra similar to much of Indevaar. Rengea is inspired by Eastern Asian cultures.

Indevaar is a frozen hell, where the people are harsh and society is brutal. The people of Indevaar are vikingesque brutes who have managed to build a strange tribal society in the frozen wasteland. For centuries the state has been fractured by internal quarrels between the various tribes, but the Inden tribe has been able to hold unitary power over the various tribes for some time now. Indevaar regularly attempts to invade Rengea, seeking to claim more fertile lands and expand their influence. Its culture is loosely based on that of Nordic cultures.

Sanuvar is known for the vast desert that spans most of the nations, and is home to harsh conditions rivaled only by Indevaar. A famine has been tormenting the people of Sanuvar for several years, pushing the nation to the brink of collapse. The elitist royal family of Sanuvar hoards what little food the nation can obtain, leading to additional struggles within the nation. Even still, the people of Sanuvar persevere in life, accepting the challenge of surviving when it ought be impossible. Sanuvarian society is based on Middle Eastern and Egyptian cultures.

Aduran is the technological marvel of the Five Holy Nations, developing geothermal powered wonders thanks to the large amounts of volcanic activity found there. Surrounded by mountains, volcanos, and the sea, and far away from any of the other nations, Aduran can easily maintain its separatist stance while developing technology far more advanced than the other nations. Even with these great marvels of human creation, the country largely remains disconnected from the world, choosing not to engage in conflicts until absolutely necessary. Adurani culture is loosely based on Roman society, most prevalent in their architecture.
A World in Turmoil, a Chilling Prophecy, and Mankind's Savior

Centuries after the world was created by the gods, chaos struck. In a desperate attempt to preserve humanity, they created an eternal soul to fight for mankind - the Harbinger. Over the course of history, the Harbinger has come to the aid of all against countless foes. This is one of those times.

Nations are raising their banners, people are dying by the thousands, the world quakes in frightful anticipation. The world is in need of its hero. A prophecy points to the player's sister, Elle, as the Harbinger, but she is far too young to carry the weight of the world on her shoulders.

As Erin, the player must complete their training as a warrior to protect Elle, but when Elle is taken from their home in the ancient mountain town of Alwen, the player must travel across the Five Holy Nations with their spirit golem companion, Bo, to rescue her. Erin and Bo will face countless foes, attempt to prevent wars, resolve struggles, and stop the return of an ancient evil.

We believe quests should serve a purpose greater than ""just another thing to do."" That's why our writing team is working to design main quests and side quests that are more than just filler. Gone are the days of the generic fetch quest!

Our quests are built as chains of long-form quests that intersect and influence on another instead of the classic ""main quest,"" ""side quest,"" and ""miscellaneous quest"" setup that is too common in other RPGs. These long-form quest arcs tell naturally evolving stories that don't start and end with just that single quest.

That's why our philosophy on quest design is that every quest in The Harbinger should serve a true purpose. It should either expand the lore, the world, or the characters. In summary, each quest should make the world feel real to the player, or as real as it possibly can.

Because the game takes place across five different nations, each with unique inspirations from our own world, our goal with quest design is to create questlines that feel unique to different areas of the world. A character in the icy tundra of Indevaar will have different needs than a character in the scorching desert of Sanuvar, and our quest design is aimed at illustrating those differences, both for the main quest and side quests.

Throughout your journey, you will encounter a large variety of characters. It's our mission to ensure the characters you interact with feel like genuine human beings. This starts with the use of MetaHuman to make our NPCs and having our writers craft highly detailed lives for the NPCs to further immerse you into the world. These colorful and intriguing characters are thoughtfully handcrafted to bring greater depth to our expansive open-world RPG.

Erin. You will play as Erin, a young adult training to become a warrior in the ancient mountain town of Alwen. Erin can be either a male or female, and the player will have customizable options regarding the looks of the character.

Elle. Elle is Erin's younger sister, and is prophesied to be the legendary Harbinger reincarnate. She has an affinity for baking and is incredibly kind. Since your parents died when you were both quite young, she has taken on a motherly role in the house, and is quite mature for her age.
Elle's complexion will change based on the player's customization choices for Erin.

Master Arkin. Master Arkin is one of five Master Warriors at the Warrior Sanctuary in Alwen. He is a father figure to Erin, and acts as the player's mentor throughout the Harbinger. He is strong, headfast, and confident, and is seemingly all-knowing. His wisdom and fighting skills are seemingly unsurpassed. He is keen to teach Erin all that he knows, passing down generations worth of knowledge to his favorite student.

Bo. Borem (Bo for short) is Erin's spirit golem companion and the player's most important ally. Bo will be by the player's side throughout the entire game as you travel across the Five Holy Nations, and his shapeshifting abilities will enhance the player's journey tenfold. Bo is snarky and sarcastic, and will often let the player know when he doesn't approve of something you've done. He carries a burdensome secret the player will have to work to uncover.
Even more important characters can be found on our website!
Blue Diamond Studios (BDS for short) we're indie rebels focused on making a positive impact to empower other indies within the gaming industry.

BDS was founded by Hunter in late 2020. He has had a passion for video games since he first picked up a gameboy in the late 90s, playing Pokemon Blue. Hunter found a passion for open-world games when he first picked up Skyrim in 2011, devoting an admittedly unhealthy amount of time to exploring dungeons and getting sent flying by giants. After much consideration, Hunter formed BDS to tell narrative based stories in open-world environments with other like-minded developers. He is the Creative Director of The Harbinger, overseeing the full development and ensuring that everything from mechanics to monsters adhere to the lore and vision of the game.

Ricky was one of the first people to join Hunter on his journey to creating The Harbinger. He is the outgoing ""people person"" of the bunch, and serves as both the Director of Environment and Level Design, as well as the Human Resources Director for BDS. He handcrafted the environments visible in the trailer and screenshots, and is working hard to make them as stunning as possible.

Arianna was committed to joining Hunter before he even formed BDS. She is the Narrative Director for BDS, and works closely with Hunter to oversee the development of quest design, narrative direction, and character development. She is currently seeking her degree in playwriting and screenwriting, as well as minors in literature and film & video production.

While these four are over the whole of BDS, we aren't alone in this journey. We have an amazing dev team that we wouldn't be here without. In fact, we currently have around 20 developers working with us on the game. We all consider ourselves close friends, and we all share the same dedicated vision to proving that a game like The Harbinger can be made by a small indie studio. We all share the same vision of changing the gaming industry forever.

We believe that the gaming industry has been divided by ""AAA"" and ""Indie"" for far too long. We also believe that indie developers can create the same quality of games that AAA studios can. The tools indies have at our disposal today rival that of the greatest AAA studios, and we seek to capitalize on those tools to prove this point and provide gamers around the world with quality gaming experiences.
That's why our motto at BDS is ""Because Indies Can,"" and we stand by that statement wholeheartedly.
Currently, we have 21 people working on the game, either full time or part time depending on their circumstances. This dev team includes:
Zack, Character Design & Social Media Manager

While a lot of our team members have dedicated positions, a lot of us are working in various areas to bring the project to life. We're all proud of the work we've accomplished so far, and are passionate about the work we still have left.
Our overall development is planned to take 3-4 more years, with our planned release sometime in Spring of 2025. A game like this takes time, and we want to make sure that we deliver on our promises.

$500,000 is a key step in us reaching that development goal, and it will carry us into 2022. We anticipate that the total cost of our entire development will be close to $2,000,000 overall, or just at $500,000 a year. This means we have to be incredibly frugal with our purchases, and so every cent we earn will be carefully spent to ensure we maximize its utility.
What We'll Use the Funds For

The $500,000 goal is meant to carry us through the entire prototype and vertical slice stage of development, and then further into early 2022. All of the money we raise from this campaign is directly going to the continued development of The Harbinger. We want to be as open and transparent as possible with our expenses, so here is our planned breakdown of a full $500,000 budget.

$400,000-$450,000: Developer pay. We anticipate that 80-85% of the money we raise will go directly to paying our development team and contracting additional developers to help us see the project through the early beta phase. Even if we don't meet our full goal, we expect the bulk of the money to go to paying our developers.

$50,000-$100,000: Additional business expenses. This includes things like upgrading our current repository, buying important tools and resources for the game, improving our marketing campaigns, covering necessary legal expenses (like trademark and copyright filings), and more.
What this Campaign Means to Us

We've been developing The Harbinger for just three months now, with one full-time programmer and environment artist. The rest of the development team is incredibly dedicated, devoting as much of their time to the project as they can. The funds we receive from this campaign will allow us to hire the necessary people to increase our output and further develop the game.

Even still, the campaign means more to us than just furthering the game. It means that we're doing something that has meaning and purpose to a lot of people. As a new indie studio, getting support is tough, so everything you can do helps. The support you give helps us financially and let's us know that you believe in this project as much as we do. This campaign means we aren't alone.
The Next Steps in The Harbinger's Development

Following this campaign, we are going to dedicate a majority of the funds to paying our current dev team and bringing on some additional help. As mentioned previously, we are operating on a four-year timeframe for full development, with the game's release scheduled for Spring 2025. In the meantime, we have plans to regularly update everyone on the production, as well as plans to secure additional funding when it becomes necessary.
Our cumulative plan is to release a playable demo of The Harbinger this Fall. The demo will be free to play for anyone.

We also plan on releasing regular devlog content on our YouTube channel and website, as well as lore and other worldbuilding information so everyone can familiarize themselves more with the world we are building.

We're also very excited that Unreal Engine 5 is slated to release later this year. With its release, we are hopeful that development will become even more streamlined and efficient, and that we can optimize the game further so that even more people can enjoy it.

By the end of our first year, we plan to have the playable alpha completed. Upon meeting this goal, we hope to spend the next three years refining and polishing the game so it meets our personal expectations when it is released.

Following this next year, the subsequent years will be spent refining the game's alpha, beta, and final stages through a series of playtests we have planned. Many of these playtests will be available to our backers only, and we are optimistic that when they come around you will all be excited by the progress we make.
A lot of our time will also be spent working to either market the game further or secure some sort of publishing deal, as well as porting the final game to the platforms we plan to release it on.

We can't express our gratitude enough for taking the time to look over our project. We're very optimistic about where we're headed, and we hope you are too. We hope you'll stick by us through our journey to bringing The Harbinger to life. So, from the bottom of our hearts, thank you from the entire BDS development team.
- Hunter, Austin, Ricky, Arianna, and everyone else!
To keep up with The Harbinger and BDS, be sure to follow us on social media.

Note: We cannot make any guarantees about the full production of the video game. Many things change in development, including game scope and direction. For that reason, all things in this campaign are planned but subject to change. Thank you for understanding.",22.0,0,"1 Campaign

column2: >

column1: Tyrion Cuthbert: Attorney of the Arcane is a visual novel inspired by the Ace Attorney series. You play as defense attorney: Tyrion Cuthbert who practices law in a world of fantasy and wizards. You must defend clients accused of various crimes committed using magic and use the rules of magic to prove them innocent.

The game borrows the base mechanics of Ace Attorney, but adds another layer of complexity through the presence of magic. The game features a magic system heavily inspired by tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons. Magic and the mages who wield it follow very specific and detailed rules.

Magic plays a pivotal role in how each of the crimes occurred. It is imperative that the player pay attention to how magic was used during a crime. By using the rules of magic, you can make deductions and prove if someone is lying to you.

One of the key features of Attorney of the Arcane is the Deduction Prompt. At every step of the investigation, Tyrion (and by extension the player) must work through how exactly the crime happened. Throughout the game, Tyrion will attempt to make deductions based on the facts that he's learned thus far. During these moments, the player will be prompted to enter an answer to the prompted question. With each successful deduction, Tyrion moves one step closer to solving the case!

While working a case, you'll need to travel to the crime scene and investigate. Collecting evidence will be crucial to acquitting your client. You may even find details that law enforcement missed during their investigation.

Enter the Kingdom of Wyverngarde: a nation ruled over by an aristocracy of mages. Legends say that the Kingdom of Wyverngarde began as a small city-state located between two powerful nations. These two nations were at war with each other, and this city-state was constantly caught in the crossfire. The people of Wyverngarde worshiped the ancient dragons and prayed to their deity Bahamut for salvation. Whether it be by divine intervention, or by sheer coincidence, the last of the ancient dragons: Rathyn, appeared. Taking pity on them, he bestowed the power of the Arcane upon on a few select individuals. These individuals would later be known as the first mages of Wyverngarde.

With their newfound power, the village slowly claimed territory from the two warring nations. Weakened from their war with each other, both nations had no choice but to continue seceding territory. It was then that the Kingdom of Wyverngarde was established. And the mages who had brought victory went on to form the noble houses that currently rule over Wyverngarde. Wyverngarde enjoyed a period of prosperity for a time. However, generations passed. And the once benevolent noble houses became more and more corrupt. Using their authority, they began bending the laws of the land to their will. They abused the commonfolk that they once vowed to protect. And resentment began breeding among the commonfolk. It’s only a matter of time before these tensions come to a boil…
I will need a total of $30,000 in crowdfunding to complete this game with all of the content that I originally intended. The game will be composed of five episodes and 10+ hours of gameplay!

Each and every contribution will put me one step closer to producing this game without cutting any content. Up until now, I've been paying for this project out of my own pocket. Every bit of funding I receive will reduce the strain on me financially and allow me to invest more into making the final release the best game it can be.
Developing games as an indie will always come with its fair share of risks and uncertainties. Unexpected delays and complications can occur throughout production.

With that said, this is a project that I care deeply about and have wanted to make for a long time. I and many other people have put a lot of work into making this project a reality and I'm confident in my ability to bring this project to completion. No matter what happens, I will do everything I can to make sure this project gets made and released.

Not everyone can contribute financially, but that's okay! If you care about this game and want to see it completed, spread the word! Tell everyone who might be interested in it. A dollar can help with production. But I would get nowhere artistically OR financially without the support of my fans and followers!

A Maniacal Game is a group of developers with varying
experiences that have been operating for just over three years. As we move from
our successful pre-production phase, we are very excited about our creative
development and what our next steps are including the funding of our software,
more dedicated server time and, of course, the work of our amazing artists.
Donations to AMG mean being a part of a team that has already successfully
launched one completed project and have begun developing our third. We are
always striving to improve ourselves and our projects with each passing
What we’re looking for is funds to cover the costs of state
taxes, our software licenses and any other operational costs that may hamper us
during our continued development of Screaming Eagles. If our goals aren’t met
the funds will go by the list already stated. There are many tiers for
donations and each tier will offer something different and unique which include
access to our multiplayer beta, buttons, stickers, wallpaper, t-shirts, the
original soundtrack, character booklets, company straight-jackets (yes we have
those), and opportunities to include original enemy and character assets into
The Screaming Eagles Project takes the best ideas from the
top-down shooter genre and expands upon it. So everything that would be
familiar to bullet hell games like tough as nails action, empowering abilities,
gigantic bosses and flashy effects are present. Our additions include a larger
map to explore with hidden treasures to find, a 4 player cooperative
multiplayer that won’t make you feel lost in other characters, a fully
destroyable environment to leave your mark on, it is the first attempt at an
There are always risks involved in Indie game development
triumphed over adversity by adhering to the needs of our development staff. In
understanding their desires for personal finance and providing a creative
outlet, we’ve been capable of managing the development of this project for the
past two years. As a company to actually release a full project, we stand out
among millions of other developers that have failed. We’ve learned from our
past mistakes more than we ever could from our accomplishments and feel
prepared to fulfill the challenges that this project presents.
We understand that some people just can’t help us with dollars but there
are other ways in which you can help. By spreading the word of our project and
letting people know about the opportunity to help us improve it will insure our
success to come. Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools so people may find

Riddled Corpse is now a arcade game, improved and recreated to play on a pc or console.bosses,stages etc..
The game is 70% of developing an advanced state with the mechanical already completed, is a safe project.
Financing is necessary for clear reasons, need to pay money for certain employees, taxes shopping, preparation of music.
The music in this game is professional with a chiptune style (music 8bit / 16bit) high quality and need to pay the musician.
They are external payments, because of my work I ask nothing,
The result of all this is a high quality soundtrack, with many issues and also, ensure that the game is in many websites.
I am CGdfc, a programmer and game designer, I have created many great games for mobile ,with years designing and creating cartoon style, asian art etc...
The game will be released in mid-2015 if all goes well
I am currently preparing the third level and I do my best.
Hope you interested in this project and you like it, you can always help me make more people aware of this game
It may be helpful, positive votes in the steam greenlight to a game's release in this store is great help.

column2: >Hello Smashers, we are WY Gaming League, a brand

column1: new place where can people can come together and play Super Smash Bros, in
the Chicagoland area. Our goal is to provide quality Smash content across
the world and give younger audiences a shot in eSports that seemed nearly
impossible to reach. Some kids don’t have the ability to play traditional
sports and we here at WY Gaming League want to provide a safe space where
young cyber athletes can hone their skills and grow as players and people.
The staff at WY Gaming League have made lasting friendships through Smash
and would like to share those opportunities with people both here in
Chicago and also across the world on our stream.
column3: >If the campaign succeeds, it shows that there is proof that people are interested in seeing the growth of youth eSports, as well as allowing ways to others to expand in ways similar to us. Thank you for your support.

column1: In order to achieve a more approachable Smash scene and get members used to the overall feel of the competative scene, we are crowd-funding for the following:

column2: >With this equipment we can provide a high quality scene while also allowing over 30 people to play at the same time.

column3:
?

As of now we have at least 2 setups for every game except 64 and Smash 4 and feel that Smash 4 would attract those who have never heard of Smash Bros. more quickly based on the testing we have done within our school. If there is something that you could do to help us with equipment for anything, let us know by emailing us at wygamingclub(at)gmail.com or tweeting us @WYGamingClub

What Could Happen Afterwards

column1: So far, this has only been attempted
once in New York City and we plan to continue what they've started and push
<li>If the project succeeds, it will push the way for other
students to form their own projects and to make gaming even more
<li>By getting our school involved, success of the campaign
would cause a change in how games are seen in school
remains a long list of hurdles we are to overcome.
<li>The fact that we are students plays a great deal over
the fact on whether anyone will take the campaign for how we are treating
<li>We take place at a busy school, so there is the risk of
the board not letting us use the venue in the future
<li>However, this all stems from the fact that we are
willing to take the chance to see the change that we want

After Hitting the Goal

Since we already have the venue sent up, it will not take long for the league to be set into official motion. If the goal if reached, we are prepared to start in the following school year (September 2015) and if reached early, we can start immediately in the current summer season.

Isn't $500 too small of a goal?

You can be surprised the prices for some things you can find on the internet! You can also be surprised what can happen when you handle problems in a group! By getting past our problems for systems, all that is left is funding for the stream equipment, which is around the same price of getting a Day-One Xbox One.

Isn't $500 too big of a goal?

We may have found the best deals for the equipment, but that doesn't mean that we are to get everything for pennies. The biggest hurdle is getting the streaming equipment in order to make it easier for a younger player to see that there is a community for them to start from and a safe place to be. That is why we chose $500 as our goal, for after Indiegogo fees, is exactly what is needed for the equipment we will use.

What happened to the $3,000 goal?

After a month of campaigning, we saw that sadly we were not able to move far from our goal so we had to downgrade from our usual expectations and worked to gather up the most expensive parts of funding. However, the biggest hurdle will be the actual equipment for streaming and making the league more accessible and that is what we are campaigning for now. Thank you to those who have helped us from the beginning.


Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you cannot add towards the
funding, there still are ways you can help us:
• Let everyone you know about the campaign
• Don't forget to share the campaign in order to increase its chances for success
• Follow as it keeps the fundraiser relevant to the Indiegogo computer algerithms and allows more to see it
time and if you still have questions, email us at wygamingclub(at)gmail.com
Hello Smashers, we are WY Gaming League, a brand
new place where can people can come together and play Super Smash Bros, in
the Chicagoland area. Our goal is to provide quality Smash content across
the world and give younger audiences a shot in eSports that seemed nearly
impossible to reach. Some kids don’t have the ability to play traditional
sports and we here at WY Gaming League want to provide a safe space where
young cyber athletes can hone their skills and grow as players and people.
The staff at WY Gaming League have made lasting friendships through Smash
and would like to share those opportunities with people both here in

Chicago and also across the world on our stream. If the campaign succeeds, it shows that there is proof that people are interested in seeing the growth of youth eSports, as well as allowing ways to others to expand in ways similar to us. Thank you for your support. -WY Gaming League
In order to achieve a more approachable Smash scene and get members used to the overall feel of the competative scene, we are crowd-funding for the following:
With this equipment we can provide a high quality scene while also allowing over 30 people to play at the same time.

Where's Melee/PM/64/<insert game here>?As of now we have at least 2 setups for every game except 64 and Smash 4 and feel that Smash 4 would attract those who have never heard of Smash Bros. more quickly based on the testing we have done within our school. If there is something that you could do to help us with equipment for anything, let us know by emailing us at wygamingclub(at)gmail.com or tweeting us @WYGamingClubWhat Could Happen Afterwards
So far, this has only been attempted
once in New York City and we plan to continue what they've started and push
If the project succeeds, it will push the way for other
students to form their own projects and to make gaming even more
By getting our school involved, success of the campaign
would cause a change in how games are seen in school
Because we are still students, there
remains a long list of hurdles we are to overcome.
The fact that we are students plays a great deal over
the fact on whether anyone will take the campaign for how we are treating
We take place at a busy school, so there is the risk of
the board not letting us use the venue in the future
However, this all stems from the fact that we are
willing to take the chance to see the change that we want

After Hitting the GoalSince we already have the venue sent up, it will not take long for the league to be set into official motion. If the goal if reached, we are prepared to start in the following school year (September 2015) and if reached early, we can start immediately in the current summer season.Isn't $500 too small of a goal?You can be surprised the prices for some things you can find on the internet! You can also be surprised what can happen when you handle problems in a group! By getting past our problems for systems, all that is left is funding for the stream equipment, which is around the same price of getting a Day-One Xbox One.Isn't $500 too big of a goal?We may have found the best deals for the equipment, but that doesn't mean that we are to get everything for pennies. The biggest hurdle is getting the streaming equipment in order to make it easier for a younger player to see that there is a community for them to start from and a safe place to be. That is why we chose $500 as our goal, for after Indiegogo fees, is exactly what is needed for the equipment we will use.What happened to the $3,000 goal?After a month of campaigning, we saw that sadly we were not able to move far from our goal so we had to downgrade from our usual expectations and worked to gather up the most expensive parts of funding. However, the biggest hurdle will be the actual equipment for streaming and making the league more accessible and that is what we are campaigning for now. Thank you to those who have helped us from the beginning.Other Ways You Can Help
Even if you cannot add towards the
funding, there still are ways you can help us:
Let everyone you know about the campaign
Don't forget to share the campaign in order to increase its chances for success
Follow as it keeps the fundraiser relevant to the Indiegogo computer algerithms and allows more to see it
time and if you still have questions, email us at wygamingclub(at)gmail.com",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column9: '>A unique RPG Adventure with Videos and Maps for Game Masters and Players!

column1: is a fusion of pen and paper RPG with a unique Game Master Support System
featuring high-quality Videos, poster-sized Grid Maps, and global relief Maps.
After hundreds of hours of play testing our unique RPG adventure, including the
review of the text layouts, artwork, and videos, our team of writers, artists,
and editors agree that it is time to launch the project.
With your generous support, we can take Heroes From Earth,
our first of nine books, from a concept and proof copy to a finished RPG book
with six high-quality Videos plus 36 video clips with sub-titles, eight
artwork and video revisions, as well as the final text and
appendix concepts for Heroes From Earth, Book One: Nemoria. Play testing
has been completed to ensure that our first book is released on schedule. We have also procured printing and
manufacturing costs. You will receive your perks first,
prior to the official release of Heroes From Earth.

Enjoy your Millennium Adventure,

Cliff Robbins , Kyle Jacobs, and Mel
Video Notice: Please note that videos are compressed (low-res) for viewing at this site. The videos you will receive as a Contributor are all high-resolution, HD quality.
2 Poster-Size Global Maps!

Our unique RPG Book, HEROES FROM EARTH, features videos and poster-sized maps—the core of a Game Master Support System for our Millennium Adventures™ RPG books. These creative additions make production and fulfillment a bit more challenging than the publishing of a single RPG book. Because our team has three decades of business experience in the game industry, we feel strongly that we will avoid any delays in production and manufacturing that involve our Millennium Adventure book, videos, and poster-sized maps.

As we tell all our Contributors, there is always the possibility of printing errors prior to the delivery of HEROES FROM EARTH. Contributors need to be aware that a delay of shipment is possible if the proof samples sent to us are unacceptable. We are prepared for the task at hand.

We are proud to say that we have done our research of RPG game production and manufacturing to ensure the successful fulfillment of our project: HEROES FROM EARTH. We have spent months in the pre-production play testing phase, conducting hundreds of rewrites and reviews for our first of nine RPG books, as well as the tedious hours spent creating the artwork, illustrations, fantasy maps and videos based on the story world of Millennium.

Our promise is to communicate with you, our Contributors, throughout the IndieGoGo process. It is important that we be totally transparent and let everyone know how the HEROES FROM EARTH project is proceeding every step of the way. Therefore, Contributors will receive constant updates of our progress. We believe the entire experience will be a positive one for us, our production team, and our backers. Together, we will bring HEROES FROM EARTH to the world of gaming.
Cliff Robbins, Kyle Jacobs, and Mel Wayne

Das Kartenspiel für Erwachsene mit dem lasziv-erotischen Kick

Wir möchten für ein Jahr eine Auszeit aus dem Alltag nehmen, die Welt bereisen und viele spannende Menschen mit ihren Geschichten kennenlernen. Allerdings ist unsere Reisekasse nicht so voll, wie es nötig wäre.

So haben wir lange überlegt, wie wir das nötige Geld für eine solche Reise auftreiben könnten. Bis uns eingefallen ist: Sex sells!
Da wir beide als Erotikmodel sicherlich keinen Cent verdienen würden, haben wir uns mit der nächst besseren Möglichkeit beschäftigt: Ein Spiel mit dem prickelnd-erotischen Faktor musste her.
Nach vielen Versuchen, ausführlichen Tests und viel Spaß ist es nun da - unser erstes eigenes Spiel mit Kribbelfaktor!

Nun muss sich das Ganze nur noch verkaufen - darum reden wir nicht lange um den heißen Brei herum, sondern stellen Euch das Spiel einfach vor:

Die Eisbrecher Spieleeditionen bieten ein aufregendes und lustvolles Erlebnis für aufgeschlossene und neugierige Menschen auf hohem Niveau, die auch spielerisch gern über den Tellerrand schauen: ob zu zweit, im kleinen Freundeskreis, nur unter Frauen oder auch in größeren Gruppen - die Einsatzmöglichkeiten sind vielfältig. Dabei werden den Mitspielern unverfängliche, aber auch durchaus sehr pikante und erotische Fragen oder Aufgaben gestellt - ganz abhängig von der jeweiligen Kartenedition.

Das Spiel ist so konzipiert, dass es auch für zurückhaltende Mitspieler problemlos spielbar ist. Es gibt jederzeit eine dezente Hintertür, um einer der 55 Karten auszuweichen. Aber Vorsicht: Diese Möglichkeit kann nach Absprache unter den Teilnehmern beliebig gestrichen werden - was Eisbrecher zu einem Spiel mit vielen Varianten werden lässt.

Wir möchten Eisbrecher - Das Kartenspiel - so schnell wie möglich Wirklichkeit werden lassen. Die ersten Testeditionen sind bereits gedruckt und mit viel Spaß, Spannung und Kribbeln getestet worden. Damit wir dieses Spiel aber allen genussvollen Spielern dieser Welt für einen bezahlbaren Preis zur Verfügung stellen können, müssen wir eine entsprechend hohe Anzahl produzieren.

Um Eisbrecher - Das Kartenspiel - produzieren zu können, benötigen wir insgesamt 7000 Euro Kapital. Dieses deckt die Kosten für das Design, die Druckkosten für die Karten und die Spielanleitung, die Verpackung, das Einschweißen in Folie und einiges mehr ab. Und wenn wir diesen Punkt erreicht haben, kann das Spiel einige Zeit später auch im normalen Handel erworben werden. Womit wir wieder da wären, wo wir eigentlich hin möchten: Auf Weltreise


Nutze Deine Chance, Eisbrecher als Erster zu spielen
Als Dank für Eure Unterstützung haben wir uns einige ganz besonderen Perks ausgedacht.

Neben den jeweils einzelnen Editionen kannst Du auch für mehr Spielespaß zwei, drei oder sogar alle fünf Editionen jeweils in einer hochwertigen Schachtel erhalten.
Nachdem diese Kampagne erfolgreich beendet ist, wird es dieses Spiel irgendwann hoffentlich auch im Handel geben. Damit es aber dazu kommt, sind wir darauf angewiesen, dieses produzieren zu können. Und damit Du auch eine Belohnung für Deine Unterstützung erhältst, haben wir den Preis während dieser Kampagne bewusst unterhalb des zukünftigen Kaufpreises angesetzt. Wer also wartet, bis das Spiel im Handel erhältlich ist, der verpasst die Gelegenheit, einer der ersten Eisbrecher zu sein (allerdings muss es ja erstmal so weit kommen, weshalb wir auf Deine Unterstützung hoffen).

Und um die Veröffentlichung des fertigen Spiels auch gebührend zu feiern, haben wir 100 Plätze für unser exklusives Eisbrecher Release Event reserviert. An diesem Abend werden wir Dir deine Eisbrecher-Karten persönlich überreichen, womit Du zu den Ersten gehörst, die dieses Spiel erhalten. Im Anschluss werden wir mit allen Eisbrecherinnen und Eisbrechern in die Spielewelt eintauchen und eine spaßige, lust- und genussvolle Zeit verbringen. Für dieses einmalige Event haben wir eine Location in der Nähe von Berlin im Auge, die wir exklusiv nur für unseren gemeinsamen Spieleabend nutzen werden. Es stehen allen Gästen verschiedene Räume, getrennt nach Spieledition, zur Verfügung. Wer bereit ist, die nächste Edition zu spielen, wechselt einfach den Raum und findet dort weitere Mitspieler.
Natürlich ist an diesem Abend auch für Euer leibliches Wohl gesorgt: Getränke und ein köstliches Buffet stehen allen Teilnehmern kostenlos und ohne Begrenzung zur Verfügung.


Unsere Editionen im Überblick
column3:
/>

Eisbrecher Getuschel - für ganz alltäglichen Small-Talk unter Gästen oder Bekannten zum besseren Kennenlernen.

Eisbrecher Getuschel ist erotikfrei und verspricht einen amüsanten

column1: und interessanten Abend unter Menschen, die sich vielleicht noch nicht
so gut kennen. Du hast mehrere Freunde zu einem Abendessen eingeladen,
die nur flüchtig miteinander bekannt sind? Dann ist diese Kartenversion
für Dich perfekt, denn sie beinhaltet alltägliche Themen, die sich nicht
mit dem Thema Erotik befassen. Schließlich will man ja nicht immer
gleich mit der Tür ins Haus fallen, sondern sich vielleicht vorsichtig
rantasten. Bei den Themen geht es z.B. um Urlaub und Hobbies.
Natürlich lässt sich Eisbrecher Getuschel auch entspannt unter
Freunden spielen, um Dinge zu erfahren, die Dir vielleicht noch nicht
Eisbrecher Getuschel ist perfekt dazu geeignet, um z.B. mit den
durchaus pikanteren Eisbrecher Geheimnissen gemischt zu werden und

garantiert einen faszinierenden Abend.


Eisbrecher Geheimnisse - für pikantere und intimere Details unter Freunden.

Bei den Eisbrecher Geheimnissen
sind die Fragen schon leicht pikanter und durchaus erotischer Natur.
Diese Edition lässt sich wunderbar von Paaren und Freunden, aber auch
von sexuell aufgeschlossenen Bekannten spielen und sorgt für eine
prickelnde Unterhaltung. Die Geheimnisse umfassen z.B. Themen wie
sexuelle Vorlieben, die intime Vergangenheit oder Fantasien und Wünsche.
Eine gewisse Offenheit ist dabei eine gute Voraussetzung. Lasst Euch
darauf ein und lernt reizvolle Dinge über Eure Mitspieler. Und wenn die
Fragen doch allzu heikel werden, gibt es immer noch eine persönliche
Tauschkarte - aber sei auf der Hut, diese kannst Du nur einmal
sich ganz wunderbar mit dem Eisbrecher Getuschel oder den Eisbrecher
Damendramen mischen und bilden eine perfekte Grundlage für die doch sehr
viel tiefer ins Detail gehenden Eisbrecher Tatsachen oder die Eisbrecher

Züchtigung. Lasst Euch überraschen.


Eisbrecher Damendramen - für Frauen unter sich, die sich gern über prickelnde Intimitäten und Sehnsüchte austauschen.

Die Eisbrecher Damendramen bilden den
perfekten Rahmen für eine ausgelassene Frauenrunde, in der das Thema
Sexualität kein Tabu ist. Hier seid Ihr völlig unter Euch und könnt ganz
offenherzig aus dem Nähkästchen über Eure Vorlieben und Erlebnisse
plaudern. Dabei wurden in diese speziell für Frauen konzipierte Version
auch Fragen z.B. zu erotischem Spielzeug mit aufgenommen, um der

Spielerunde den gewissen Kick zu geben und die Spannung zu steigern.

Macht es Euch bei einem Glas (alkoholfreien) Prosecco gemütlich und
freut Euch auf einen lasziven Abend - ob Zuhause, in einer Kneipe, im
Urlaub oder auf einem Junggesellinnenabschied. Die Möglichkeiten sind
vielfältig und genauso individuell wie Ihr. Schaut einfach, was passiert

und seid offen und ehrlich, dann ist der Spaß garantiert.

Auch die Eisbrecher Damendramen sind ideal geeignet, um sie z.B. mit
den Eisbrecher Getuschel Karten zu mischen und den Spielespaß damit zu

verdoppeln.



Eisbrecher Tatsachen - für mutige Paare und Gruppen, die sich gemeinsam auf eine lustvolle Entdeckungsreise begeben.

Mit den Eisbrecher Tatsachen ist es vorbei
mit dem Vorspiel, jetzt geht es ans Eingemachte und es gibt kaum ein
Entrinnen. Lustvolle, erotisierende und intime Fragen und Aufgaben
schaffen eine aufgeheizte Atmosphäre und sind ideal für das intensive
Kennenlernen von Paaren und Gruppen. Gerade Swinger werden an dieser
Edition Gefallen finden, da manche Karten sich nicht nur auf die eigene
Person, sondern auch auf den einen oder anderen Mitspieler beziehen -
Aber sollte Euch eine Karte zu intensiv
sein, könnt Ihr von Eurer Tauschkarte Gebrauch machen, aber um ehrlich
zu sein - brauchst Du die wirklich? Lass Dich ein auf das Spiel mit dem
Feuer und genieße die knisternde Atmosphäre, die in der Luft liegt.
Dabei gilt auch für die Eisbrecher Tatsachen wie für alle anderen
Editionen - Ihr könnt diese z.B. mit den Eisbrecher Geheimnissen oder der
Eisbrecher Züchtigung mischen und die Regeln ändern, ganz wie es Euch
beliebt. Eurer Kreativität und Lust sind keine Grenzen gesetzt.

Eisbrecher Züchtigung - für unerschrockene Paare und Gruppen, die tabulose LEIDENschaften erleben möchten.

Mit den Eisbrecher Züchtigung Karten
wird es jetzt richtig prickelnd. Diese Edition wird Paare
und Gruppen begeistern, für die alle vorherigen Eisbrecher Karten das
reine Kinderspiel waren. Diese Karten laden Euch dazu ein, Eurer Lust
nachzugeben und dafür auch den einen oder anderen Schmerz mit Freude und
Stolz zu ertragen. Hier werden Tabus gebrochen, über Grenzen gegangen
und dem Verlangen freien Lauf gelassen. Lass Dich ein auf das Spiel mit
Eisbrecher Züchtigung treibt das Eisbrecher Spiel auf die Spitze
und verspricht ein unzüchtiges und aufregendes Spieleabenteuer - egal
ob zu zweit oder mit mehreren, hier ist das Spiel grenzenlos und kann

ganz nach Eurem Gusto gemischt oder verändert werden.



Risiken &

An dieser Stelle sehen wir uns gezwungen, Dich über mögliche Risiken und Nebenwirkungen aufzuklären:
Das Spiel ist fertig konzipiert und muss nur noch in ausreichender Menge produziert werden, um einen möglichst geringen Verkaufspreis zu haben.
Sollten wir das Kampagnenziel nicht erreichen, dann werden wir die bestellten Spiele dennoch produzieren, allerdings können wir dann keine weiteren Spiele verkaufen. Das wäre sehr schade, denn mit jedem verkauften Spiel wächst auch die Community, die wir um das Spiel herum aufbauen möchten.

Je mehr Leute Eisbrecher spielen, desto eher hast Du die Chance, gleichgesinnte und spielfreudige Leute in Deiner Nähe kennenzulernen.


Und sonst noch?

Wir freuen uns über Eure Unterstützung und Bekanntmachung unserer Kampagne, indem Du Deine Freunde und Bekannte darauf aufmerksam machst. Am besten machst Du das per Facebook, per Email an alle Deine Freunde, erzählst davon am nächsten Stammtisch oder in der Damenrunde.
Jeder weitere, der von diesem Spiel erfährt, hilft uns, um unseren Traum eines eigenen Spiels und unserer Weltreise Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.

Bei allen Fragen zum Spiel, zu den Perks oder zu weiteren Möglichkeiten uns zu unterstützen, sende uns bitte einfach eine Nachricht.
Außerdem haben wir für Eisbrecher - Das Kartenspiel - eine eigene Internetseite mit weiteren Informationen und Hintergründen online.

Nun sind wir mehr als gespannt und würden uns über nichts mehr freuen, als dass unser erstes eigenes Spiel in die Produktion gehen könnte!

Wir danken Euch schon jetzt für Eure Unterstützung!

Natürlich lässt sich Eisbrecher Getuschel auch entspannt unter
Freunden spielen, um Dinge zu erfahren, die Dir vielleicht noch nicht
Eisbrecher Getuschel ist perfekt dazu geeignet, um z.B. mit den
durchaus pikanteren Eisbrecher Geheimnissen gemischt zu werden und
garantiert einen faszinierenden Abend.Eisbrecher Geheimnisse - für pikantere und intimere Details unter Freunden.Bei den Eisbrecher Geheimnissen
sind die Fragen schon leicht pikanter und durchaus erotischer Natur.
Diese Edition lässt sich wunderbar von Paaren und Freunden, aber auch
von sexuell aufgeschlossenen Bekannten spielen und sorgt für eine
prickelnde Unterhaltung. Die Geheimnisse umfassen z.B. Themen wie
sexuelle Vorlieben, die intime Vergangenheit oder Fantasien und Wünsche.
Eine gewisse Offenheit ist dabei eine gute Voraussetzung. Lasst Euch
darauf ein und lernt reizvolle Dinge über Eure Mitspieler. Und wenn die
Fragen doch allzu heikel werden, gibt es immer noch eine persönliche
Tauschkarte - aber sei auf der Hut, diese kannst Du nur einmal
sich ganz wunderbar mit dem Eisbrecher Getuschel oder den Eisbrecher
Damendramen mischen und bilden eine perfekte Grundlage für die doch sehr
viel tiefer ins Detail gehenden Eisbrecher Tatsachen oder die Eisbrecher
Züchtigung. Lasst Euch überraschen.Eisbrecher Damendramen - für Frauen unter sich, die sich gern über prickelnde Intimitäten und Sehnsüchte austauschen.Die Eisbrecher Damendramen bilden den
perfekten Rahmen für eine ausgelassene Frauenrunde, in der das Thema
Sexualität kein Tabu ist. Hier seid Ihr völlig unter Euch und könnt ganz
offenherzig aus dem Nähkästchen über Eure Vorlieben und Erlebnisse
plaudern. Dabei wurden in diese speziell für Frauen konzipierte Version
auch Fragen z.B. zu erotischem Spielzeug mit aufgenommen, um der
Spielerunde den gewissen Kick zu geben und die Spannung zu steigern.Macht es Euch bei einem Glas (alkoholfreien) Prosecco gemütlich und
freut Euch auf einen lasziven Abend - ob Zuhause, in einer Kneipe, im
Urlaub oder auf einem Junggesellinnenabschied. Die Möglichkeiten sind
vielfältig und genauso individuell wie Ihr. Schaut einfach, was passiert
und seid offen und ehrlich, dann ist der Spaß garantiert.Auch die Eisbrecher Damendramen sind ideal geeignet, um sie z.B. mit
den Eisbrecher Getuschel Karten zu mischen und den Spielespaß damit zu
verdoppeln.Eisbrecher Tatsachen - für mutige Paare und Gruppen, die sich gemeinsam auf eine lustvolle Entdeckungsreise begeben.Mit den Eisbrecher Tatsachen ist es vorbei
mit dem Vorspiel, jetzt geht es ans Eingemachte und es gibt kaum ein
Entrinnen. Lustvolle, erotisierende und intime Fragen und Aufgaben
schaffen eine aufgeheizte Atmosphäre und sind ideal für das intensive
Kennenlernen von Paaren und Gruppen. Gerade Swinger werden an dieser
Edition Gefallen finden, da manche Karten sich nicht nur auf die eigene
Person, sondern auch auf den einen oder anderen Mitspieler beziehen -
Aber sollte Euch eine Karte zu intensiv
sein, könnt Ihr von Eurer Tauschkarte Gebrauch machen, aber um ehrlich
zu sein - brauchst Du die wirklich? Lass Dich ein auf das Spiel mit dem
Feuer und genieße die knisternde Atmosphäre, die in der Luft liegt.
Dabei gilt auch für die Eisbrecher Tatsachen wie für alle anderen
Editionen - Ihr könnt diese z.B. mit den Eisbrecher Geheimnissen oder der
Eisbrecher Züchtigung mischen und die Regeln ändern, ganz wie es Euch
beliebt. Eurer Kreativität und Lust sind keine Grenzen gesetzt.
Eisbrecher Züchtigung - für unerschrockene Paare und Gruppen, die tabulose LEIDENschaften erleben möchten. Mit den Eisbrecher Züchtigung Karten
wird es jetzt richtig prickelnd. Diese Edition wird Paare
und Gruppen begeistern, für die alle vorherigen Eisbrecher Karten das
reine Kinderspiel waren. Diese Karten laden Euch dazu ein, Eurer Lust
nachzugeben und dafür auch den einen oder anderen Schmerz mit Freude und
Stolz zu ertragen. Hier werden Tabus gebrochen, über Grenzen gegangen
und dem Verlangen freien Lauf gelassen. Lass Dich ein auf das Spiel mit
Eisbrecher Züchtigung treibt das Eisbrecher Spiel auf die Spitze
und verspricht ein unzüchtiges und aufregendes Spieleabenteuer - egal
ob zu zweit oder mit mehreren, hier ist das Spiel grenzenlos und kann
ganz nach Eurem Gusto gemischt oder verändert werden. Risiken & Nebenwirkungen

An dieser Stelle sehen wir uns gezwungen, Dich über mögliche Risiken und Nebenwirkungen aufzuklären:Das Spiel ist fertig konzipiert und muss nur noch in ausreichender Menge produziert werden, um einen möglichst geringen Verkaufspreis zu haben.Sollten wir das Kampagnenziel nicht erreichen, dann werden wir die bestellten Spiele dennoch produzieren, allerdings können wir dann keine weiteren Spiele verkaufen. Das wäre sehr schade, denn mit jedem verkauften Spiel wächst auch die Community, die wir um das Spiel herum aufbauen möchten. Je mehr Leute Eisbrecher spielen, desto eher hast Du die Chance, gleichgesinnte und spielfreudige Leute in Deiner Nähe kennenzulernen. Und sonst noch?Wir freuen uns über Eure Unterstützung und Bekanntmachung unserer Kampagne, indem Du Deine Freunde und Bekannte darauf aufmerksam machst. Am besten machst Du das per Facebook, per Email an alle Deine Freunde, erzählst davon am nächsten Stammtisch oder in der Damenrunde. Jeder weitere, der von diesem Spiel erfährt, hilft uns, um unseren Traum eines eigenen Spiels und unserer Weltreise Wirklichkeit werden zu lassen.Bei allen Fragen zum Spiel, zu den Perks oder zu weiteren Möglichkeiten uns zu unterstützen, sende uns bitte einfach eine Nachricht.Außerdem haben wir für Eisbrecher - Das Kartenspiel - eine eigene Internetseite mit weiteren Informationen und Hintergründen online. Nun sind wir mehr als gespannt und würden uns über nichts mehr freuen, als dass unser erstes eigenes Spiel in die Produktion gehen könnte!Wir danken Euch schon jetzt für Eure Unterstützung!",5.0,0,"1 Campaign

Gem State Gaming Convention (GSGC) was created to provide the ultimate community gaming experience in Idaho. Co-founders Derek Howard and Sean Wainwright have dedicated themselves to growing the Idaho gaming community by working with friendly local game stores, gaming manufacturers, and other local conventions to offer the fantastic world of gaming to everyone. Our dream is to bring to Idaho what conventions like Origins and Gen Con bring to their communities.

GSGC is returning for its second year on April 1st-3rd in 2016, and with your help it can only get bigger and better. We'll be able to provide new experiences for attendees and guests, upgrade the services and technology for video gaming, and attract gaming manufacturers to join us in our cause. Let us introduce ourselves.

-Derek Howard loves to either run or help run conventions. After getting out of the United States Coast Guard Derek got into the convention scene through a friend. After helping run Tomodachi Fest in 2011 he got hooked and hasn't looked back. Derek loves everything that has to do with gaming, whether it's Role Playing games, video games, card games, and board games. Now the co-owner of multiple fan conventions and a staff member at others, Derek works hard to put on the very best conventions possible.

-Sean Wainwright became immersed in the tabletop gaming world one Christmas when his father-in-law brought a new game to the table each day for his version of the 12 Games of Christmas. Suddenly, games weren't just Monopoly and Tripoly anymore. 5 years ago, Phoenix Fire Games was born on that premise. Sean has worked hard to build the gaming community through partnering with other local game stores, volunteering with gaming manufacturers at conventions like GenCon and Origins, and outreach programs to grow appreciation for this great industry. He also runs the Table Top Gaming areas at many of the other local fan conventions. GSGC is the next huge step in this ongoing adventure.

column2: >Honestly, we're upgrading everything! We've found a new location that we feel provides a more welcoming atmosphere for our gaming community, and we've made many great partnerships with other gaming groups like Idaho Miniature Wargamers' Club and Treasure Valley League of Legends so we need more space! The Riverside Hotel offers ample parking, a very comfortable layout, an on-site restaurant and bar with a huge variety of options (we'll even have our own menu!), and fantastic accommodations for those deciding ""why leave when I can stay and play all weekend long!?!?!"". On that note, special rates will be available for stay and we highly, highly recommend doing so. There will be some events available for only hotel guests.

column1: Backing this project early gets you some pretty great benefits. The obvious one is the discounted pricing! Badges at the door will be $35. Get on board early and save $10! That's like getting a free lunch! Additionally, with your early contributions we get to start working on adding even more content and keeping you up to date as the excitement grows.

The overall campaign goal is to cover the cost of the convention space and the upgraded internet services they provide for the attendees and events we run. That way we can focus on giving you the amazing experience you deserve.
<div>Beyond covering the cost of the new space, w<span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >e're adding a larger variety of gaming including, but not limited to:
>Live Action versions of popular board games
>Free programs like learning how to paint a basic miniature to creating your own RPG armor that you then use in a live campaign!
>Crowd-run role playing games! Most RPGs are designed for 4-6 players with a game master. Take part in one where the roles are played by audience participation!
>Regional Warhammer 40K tournament with space for 60 participants, and it's FREE to play in with prizes of course!
>""Super-sized"" free events using basic games with prizes like Fluxx and Love Letter
>Pokemon State Championships returns bigger and better with 3 days of side events added to the schedule
>Free to play board game tournaments with popular games like DC Deck Building Game by Cryptozoic Entertainment, Lanterns by Renegade Game Studios, and King of Tokyo by Iello with special prizes
>Daily events like scavenger hunts and trivia. Free to enter, prizes for completing!
>COO-Interactive Entertainment will be on-site providing games and entertainment for all. Check them out here!
>Special guests and panelists will be reserved all throughout the campaign, and will be announced as they are available.

column1: We do have some stretch goals prepared as well!

column2: >$12,500: Swag bags to all attendees filled with goods and promotional items for some of your favorite games. Thank you to our sponsors!

>$15,000: GSGC will purchase the 10 PCs required for the League of Legends Tournament and keep them upgraded for future years. Currently the participants will bring their own gaming computers to set up and use in the provided tournament space. This is a huge step, and we would absolutely love to hit this goal. The impact it would have on players being able to just show up is immeasurable.

column1: GSGC's first year was a success with the highest first year attendance of annual Idaho conventions of its kind, however, we want to provide an OUTRAGEOUS success story for Idaho. Idaho deserves its own convention like GenCon, and this is where it begins! The founders and staff members of GSGC work and volunteer at many of the other local conventions and have years of experience each in this line of work.

We know the road to a successful convention is wrought with many pitfalls, but we have enjoyed overcoming them all as they come. The support we have been given by the other members of our many diverse social circles as well as by the general public, has all been very positive, uplifting and characteristic of the kind of impression we want to impart with our convention. We will continue to seek out space so that we can grow with the community, so that we can incorporate as many of our attendees' interests as possible, and make this an enjoyable memory for everyone!

We greatly appreciate any support you can provide for this wonderful adventure we are on, whether it's through contributing in this campaign, sharing our event on your social media pages, or joining our volunteer team!

FAQ
Q: Why is this being run as a Flexible Funding Campaign?
A: GSGC is returning for a second year whether this campaign is the success it should be or not. The flexible funding allows the convention to start adding better programming immediately and keeping you, the contributors, aware of all the great new additions.
Q: If the goal is not reached, will I still receive the Perks I backed?
A: Absolutely! The huge benefit of running a flexible funding campaign allow the convention to go on planning for bigger and better programming while it's active. Think of this campaign as an early ticket sales opportunity for you to save money!
Q: If I don't back this campaign can I still buy tickets?
A: Yes, tickets will be on sale for $35 on the website and at the door. But why wait and pay more?

eSports Underground: New eSports Movement. Unique Competitive Platform for All Gamers!

""We’re confident that these efforts will bring gamers to a whole new level of gaming that they didn’t even know existed. It will seamlessly fit into the eSports community guaranteeing that people can take their gaming passion even further than they ever imagined, whether you want to go pro or make more cash, this will be the platform for you.”

eSports Underground is the next ambitious competitive platform built for players of ALL skill levels to compete and fight for ultimate glory. With a core focus of competitiveness and sportsmanship, eSports Underground wants to create the same atmosphere professionals live and breathe by giving players and teams the opportunity to call the shots and witness those heart stopping clutch moments and feel the non stop action for themselves.

column5: >As the eSport industry has grown into the phenomenon it has become today, winning and earning money through eSports is a legitimate way for people to make a living. Professional gamers earn hundreds of thousands of dollars through prize money and touring however the eSports market only really caters the these top tier players, the smallest part of the pie chart. We want to create a platform that is unique to the eSports community.

column1: everyone wants to win and earn the big dollars but in the end there is only one winner, and to add to that, these prizes pools or tournament money's all come few and far between. With our ESU Pro League, we want to give players the ability to win and earn cash fast. Through the pro league on any given day players or teams can challenge one another for set wagers, agreed beforehand and battle it out for a winner take all
column5: >experience, feel the hype as you challenge for any amount of money on a one game do or die or say perhaps a best of three small tourney. Whatever the players want our mission is to develop this platform so players can get a feel into what it's like to be a professional gamer!

column1: Yeah the ESU Pro League sounds awesome!... if I'm winning....why should I take the risk?
column5: >Here at ESU we have put a lot of thought into this, our number one goal is make this platform appeal to players of ALL skill levels.
column9: >So we believe the implementation of a few key features will make this platform enjoyable for ALL! First a dynamic RANKING SYSTEM, for each game played receive experience towards your ESU rank. These ranks will be publicly viewed so players can challenge one another based on their ESU rank. And secondly the REPUTATION (+RP) feature. We believe this will keep players coming back for more, Here's why. Win or lose after each game played you will receive (+RP) depending on the game mode, length of match and wager set. This (+RP) can be used in later matches which amounts into real cash. Yes that's right after each game played you'll be earning more money to be used against another opponent. Along with this we have a range of other features that will make ESU unique and appealing to all gamers..

column1: Introducing eSports Underground into the scene requires a dynamic and adaptive system to keep up with the pace of this every growing industry. ESU will provide the ability for players and teams to CREATE MATCHES, WIN REWARDS and EARN CASH all whilst climbing a built in RANKING SYSTEM to prove your might in the eSports community. along with this ESU will boast a solid MESSENGER FUNCTION and an IN-DEPTH STATISTICS board for players to use and view. On top of various GAME LADDERS and TOURNAMENTS, ESU will plan scheduled CLAN WARS to stamp your team into ESU history books. with all these great features mentioned keep scrolling to see  for more information regarding ESU's most ambitious feature, the ESPORTS UNDERGROUND PRO LEAGUE.

column2: >Delivering eSports Underground into the community requires a unique and enjoyable system for ALL. With the debut of the eSports Underground Pro League we are giving members who sign up the ability to compete for cash online. challenge players or teams for set wagers for a winner take all experience. win or lose earn reputation points ( +RP) to use in later matches that amounts into real cash. feel the hype as you challenge teams for any amount of money taking your skills to new heights and experiencing what the professionals live and breathe!

column7: >Here's how the ESU Pro League works!

column1:
SHOW YOUR SUPPORT

To put it simply, we need you help! With such an ambitious platform planned out, creating this movement will require support and backing from you! Feel our movement? Take advantage of our limited edition ESU style mousepads only available here on Indiegogo. We also have ESU printed tshirts and USB flash drives for those who get behind our name! There are many ways to show your support here on Indiegogo but if you really want to help us out, please share the word to your friends, the more support we can get the further we can take eSports Underground. Here's links to our social media pages.

eSports Underground is the next ambitious competitive platform built for players of ALL skill levels to compete and fight for ultimate glory. With a core focus of competitiveness and sportsmanship eSports Underground wants to create the same atmosphere professionals live and breathe by giving players and teams the opportunity to call the shots and witness those heart stopping clutch moments and feel the non stop action for themselves.
Which competitive games will be featured on our platform?
eSports Underground will host competitive games such as
column2: League of Legends, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Call Of Duty: Black Ops 3 and many more. ESU will conduct a poll to survey the most anticipated games for next year to be feature on our platform.
>Can I play SOLO (1v1) on eSports Underground?

column1: Yes, eSports Underground will host many solo (1v1) style ladders giving gamers the chance to fight against one another for the ultimate bragging rights.

column2: >eSports Underground will endeavor to find the safest way for gamers to compete online without the worries of losing their money. With the implementation of ESCROW services, both parties will initiate their match by adding funds to the ESCROW hold until the match is complete and the winner has been decided.
column3:
>When will the ESU platform be launched?

The eSports Underground platform will go through rigorous testing and beta stages before its launch. ESU will keep everyone updated via social media and newsletter subscribers.
column7: >To be clear, here is our schedule for release..

column1: These are just some of the questions being asked right now, stay tuned for more updates on our platform here or head over to our website www.esuleague.com
Here at ESU we are always thinking towards the future and how we can better our platform for the fans. After our release we plan to add features such as Live streaming via Twitch,
column5: >Video game integration for ease of confirming a winner,
column9: >Matchmaking to pair up teams or players for suggested underground battles and many more!!

column2:
CHALLENGES

At ESU our ultimate goal is to develop, test and launch a full proof system for all gamers to enjoy. We have devoted a lot of time and effort already in planning our idea and we understand that there any many challenges that await us.

column1: Our biggest challenge to date has been identifying our place in the industry, from the start we've always wanted to be different not to just blend into the noise but stand out and bring more people together to expand the eSports community. With the creation of our ESU Pro League we are confident in our ability to enter the market and instantly be recognized as a true name in eSports.

As with all big projects like this there are many unforeseen obstacles that will come our way, but our team is pumped and anxious to take on these challenges with our openness and transparency for all our fans. Our promise to the community is to keep everyone updated on the progress of our platform and always be upfront and honest with everything related to eSports Underground.

As the eSport industry has grown into the phenomenon it has become today, winning and earning money through eSports is a legitimate way for people to make a living. everyone wants to win and earn the big dollars but in the end there is only one winner, and to add to that, these prizes pools or tournament money's all come few and far between. Whatever the players want our mission is to develop this platform so players can get a feel into what it's like to be a professional gamer!

Yes that's right after each game played you'll be earning more money to be used against another opponent. Along with this we have a range of other features that will make ESU unique and appealing to all gamers..

Introducing eSports Underground into the scene requires a dynamic and adaptive system to keep up with the pace of this every growing industry. ESU will provide the ability for players and teams to CREATE MATCHES, WIN REWARDS and EARN CASH all whilst climbing a built in RANKING SYSTEM to prove your might in the eSports community. along with this ESU will boast a solid MESSENGER FUNCTION and an IN-DEPTH STATISTICS board for players to use and view. On top of various GAME LADDERS and TOURNAMENTS, ESU will plan scheduled CLAN WARS to stamp your team into ESU history books. with all these great features mentioned keep scrolling to see  for more information regarding ESU's most ambitious feature, the ESPORTS UNDERGROUND PRO LEAGUE.

Delivering eSports Underground into the community requires a unique and enjoyable system for ALL. With the debut of the eSports Underground Pro League we are giving members who sign up the ability to compete for cash online. challenge players or teams for set wagers for a winner take all experience. win or lose earn reputation points ( +RP) to use in later matches that amounts into real cash. feel the hype as you challenge teams for any amount of money taking your skills to new heights and experiencing what the professionals live and breathe!
Here's how the ESU Pro League works!

SHOW YOUR SUPPORT To put it simply, we need you help! With such an ambitious platform planned out, creating this movement will require support and backing from you! Feel our movement? Take advantage of our limited edition ESU style mousepads only available here on Indiegogo. We also have ESU printed tshirts and USB flash drives for those who get behind our name! There are many ways to show your support here on Indiegogo but if you really want to help us out, please share the word to your friends, the more support we can get the further we can take eSports Underground. Here's links to our social media pages.
ESU Printed T-Shirts - Black/ Grey - XL/L/M

eSports Underground is the next ambitious competitive platform built for players of ALL skill levels to compete and fight for ultimate glory. With a core focus of competitiveness and sportsmanship eSports Underground wants to create the same atmosphere professionals live and breathe by giving players and teams the opportunity to call the shots and witness those heart stopping clutch moments and feel the non stop action for themselves.
Which competitive games will be featured on our platform?
eSports Underground will host competitive games such as
column2: League of Legends, Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, Call Of Duty: Black Ops 3 and many more. ESU will conduct a poll to survey the most anticipated games for next year to be feature on our platform.

column1: Can I play SOLO (1v1) on eSports Underground?
Yes, eSports Underground will host many solo (1v1) style ladders giving gamers the chance to fight against one another for the ultimate bragging rights.

eSports Underground will endeavor to find the safest way for gamers to compete online without the worries of losing their money. With the implementation of ESCROW services, both parties will initiate their match by adding funds to the ESCROW hold until the match is complete and the winner has been decided.When will the ESU platform be launched?The eSports Underground platform will go through rigorous testing and beta stages before its launch. ESU will keep everyone updated via social media and newsletter subscribers. To be clear, here is our schedule for release..
These are just some of the questions being asked right now, stay tuned for more updates on our platform here or head over to our website www.esuleague.com

Here at ESU we are always thinking towards the future and how we can better our platform for the fans. After our release we plan to add features such as Live streaming via Twitch, Video game integration for ease of confirming a winner, Matchmaking to pair up teams or players for suggested underground battles and many more!!

RISKS & CHALLENGES At ESU our ultimate goal is to develop, test and launch a full proof system for all gamers to enjoy. We have devoted a lot of time and effort already in planning our idea and we understand that there any many challenges that await us.

Our biggest challenge to date has been identifying our place in the industry, from the start we've always wanted to be different not to just blend into the noise but stand out and bring more people together to expand the eSports community. With the creation of our ESU Pro League we are confident in our ability to enter the market and instantly be recognized as a true name in eSports.

As with all big projects like this there are many unforeseen obstacles that will come our way, but our team is pumped and anxious to take on these challenges with our openness and transparency for all our fans. Our promise to the community is to keep everyone updated on the progress of our platform and always be upfront and honest with everything related to eSports Underground.",10.0,0,"1 Campaign

0,"

 Summary

I have always been fascinated by space and space exploration and just by the sheer adventure of it all  and it excites me that I could actually send my own mission to the edge of space and with your help i can do just that.

Where the Funding goes

I require the funding in order to buy the equipment required to get to the edge of space, this includes the high altitude balloon, payload container, black box for mission flight recording and scientific data capturing, 2 HD camera's, heating equipment, battery backups, video feed transmitter and receiver, filling the balloon with gas, payload GPS tracker, Payload Parachute to retrieve the equipment after the mission etc.
With your contribution I can make this mission a reality, even the smallest contribution will get me one step closer to making this mission happen.

column2:
Challenges

the challenges we may have on the mission would be adverse weather conditions and would have to delay launch, we could lose communication with the camera during ascent , we might lose gps signal from the payload once it lands back on earth and may struggle to locate it if this happens. we need to ensure the camera equipment stays sufficiently warm in order for them to operate at that altitude.

column1:
Other Ways You Can Help

if you aren't able to to contribute financially please share this project far and wide so that it can get off the ground.

• Please also use the Indiegogo share tools!
