column7:
>Brief Introduction

We are creating a 1st and 3rd person shooter Game for Android, IOS which could be linkable to PS4 and XBOX ONE console with Virtual Reality capabilities. During the game player could experience playing as a first person shooter or a third person shooter option. And during the game the player could drive a simulated ship like the flight simulator, and also play the game as flight commander where shooting enemy ship from a first person view. Other than that in the game player could ride a flying scooter, drive a rover, and other vehicles while fight the enemies. Also best of all in the game in some levels there will be a hand on fighting combat where players could fight the enemy like Tekken!

column1: Concept Design And Introduction of the TEOT Universe:
Here are some of the Design we have been working on and there will be more. Also including some rendering of the game character.

It was set in 2024, 14 years after the war, where the people is finding the true answers to what has causes the war. Still unexplained that what has started all this chaos, some people have their own theory, some said it was political benefits and some think it was the machines and some even mention about the aliens invade earth. However up till now no one knows what has happen. As everyone are just trying to survive each day, rather to think what's for the future.

People started to see changes everywhere after the attack. First it was the machine that attack and govern them but somehow now organism are starting to taking over the breed of enemies. Enemies are getting larger and larger each time were seen.

Human are taking refuge underground and those who still above ground, when seen would be exterminate or being turn into the being like a zombie kind. In many places people are trying to gather around and find ways to create a group of resistance, to fight for their family. some even turn themselves into a machine that can only live for months just to protect their family.

Now the resistance have found a new info that could reveal what is the true cause and to eliminate it for good. This story would be about retribution. Getting back what has taken from them. The mission are:
This is an action pack and horror genre game.
The game would be split into 2 different version. The 1st person for the VR experience as of Examples:
and the 3rd person shooter which gamer would play as the character.
The game itself conclude a few ways of playing:
1st Person As Team or Zombies as Alliances
Also there will be a co-op in mission where players could connect and play the mission together.

Edsenses have been in the CG industry for about 5 years, we worked mostly for for visual on film and television. As we also did some of the game cinematic for some games. Here in Edsenses the artist comes from different background as some worked in Lucas, Blizzard, squaresoft, and Basefx. Artist with different background contributes the special part of the games, such as the bike racer, ship fighter, hand on combat and the 1st or 3rd person player.

We hope that with different set of experience artist working on different platform, and could come up with a game that gamer could experience a different kind of game play while enjoying the thrill of the story.
Our passion is our live, that is our purpose in life. We are going to create a game that we always wanted to play, as not just having a good story but also have a good experience playing the game.
• We hope that we would have a chance to introduce our project to you in the year end of 2015
column2: currently we have produced a short trailer v2 which is the introduction to the world of TEOT. Then we are introducing which is still progress trailer that would introduce all the game capabilities and the difference of our game and current available games existed. We will also introduce you to the world of the project with our concept work and ideas propose. Mainly our target source would be going in to VR game-play and giving players first-hand experience.

column1: • Our plan is to 1st create awareness of the project to the public and within the process of producing the game, we would create a few mini games and trailers to the audience. For the completion of the game it will take 3 years, but within the 3 years production we will release started pack and then the expansion pack. Gamer could start playing while we in the process of developing it. And the gamer could continuous upgrade their game play without interruption. At the same time we could get feedback from the gamer in improving the game play and tactics of marketing our in game tools. With your help our project will flourish and there's a day in light in our heart in seeing the game come to life.

Our first thought is self funding, trying our best sleepless night to create our dream, but as we work further we realized that it will take quite some time before we could complete the production. But with your help we could boost our production and hopefully that we could finish and distribute the game in 10 months. We hope that we could change the way people are making games, by having different game play in a single story there are more challenges ahead for developer to create more exciting games.
The funding will definitely be funding the main production as now most of the asset is done and to boost up the programming side on Unreal engine.

What are we offering?

Here are some of the perks that might interest you:

column9:
>Presentation of the company

Reeco Games is an independent video game studio born in Bologna, Italy on January 2015. The founders are two graduate students in business-management and marketing and a computer engineering. The initial idea has always been from the beginning to develop videogames for mobile devices on major operating systems (IOS and Android). After working for ten months on the ""BlackMind"" project, Reeco Games has opted for a crowfunding campaign to receive the funds needed for the development and the correct promotion of the game.
column11:
>


BlackMind is a first-person zombie shooter videogames. The main objective is to survive as long as possible to different rounds against hordes of zombies. It provides two modes of play. The first is a classic offline mode where the player clashes alone against the hordes of zombies in the maps. The second one is an co-op online mode where two players are playing together in the same scene, and must try to survive the most long-helping each other. The game will be available for free on the most important online stores for smartphoneand tablet but access to the online mode will be possible only by paying 2,99 € once. Also in the game you will be given the opportunity to the player to earn money and perks via matches or you can buy packages that allow you to buy what they need to increase the number of rounds and his skill to survive. There will also be bestowed with various rewards that connect to various social networks and will be able to earn the extra through advertising, these actions will be chosen by the player therefore not become invasive and time consuming.

column1: The goal of crowfunding campaign  is to receive the funds needed to develop the game in both the offline or online for that . A part of the budget collected will serve to:

column5: >finish the game dynamics in the offline mode
><b><i>hire a person that improves the quality and repair the different lag of the game
><b><i>hire the servers required to ensure that the game is also available in co-op online mode
><b><i>create new maps, new characters and weapons
>The remainder of the budget will be used in advertising and promotion of video games to make sure that it downloads from the catchment expected.

column1: The story is set in 2042 and begins after a zombie apocalypse. The player was born within a building not knowing what's going in against. Tains the game provides a limited number of weapons and accessible areas of the map will be limited. Most are overcome the hordes of zombies will be more able to raise the money, which will serve to buy weapons more and more powerful, more wide open areas of the map and activate the objects that will help the player to survive longer.

Every match is divided into rounds. Each round creates different mix of zombies and more the number of rounds increases the zombies become more numerous, strong and fast. unfortunately in the video presentation was not possible to enter the high round of gameplay since the game it has different lag and would result not fluid.

Inside the map, there are eight categories of zombies. Each of which has 8/9 animations depending on the game situation. Each animation recalls a specific function based on the action of the player and what happens in the game. So each character has such different death animations based on areas that the bullet hits him or has different attack animations and cammianata / running. Besides the characters have textures in high definition and many tris in a way that makes more probable movements and virtual reality. All the characters in the game are set in such a way that calculate the road faster and possibly amend it during the match to get to attack the player, so you can not hide. Each character his death releases money that goes to fill the portfolio of the player, not all release the same amount of money. This varies from the round in which the player is and the difficulties that will meet in killing the zombies. Also some characters to their death issue in addition to the money even objects useful to the survival of the player, such as ammunition, life, etc ..

The main map of BlackMind is an old quarter inside of ""TheCity"". You can not run off the map because the area is quarantined. But you can open a lot of doors and areas within the district that allow you to survive the most long in the match. Attention: opening up new areas on the map will activate the spawn points that will create more zombies. The district was created on different levels to give the possibility to play both of spaces more extensive in both rooms and restricted based on the preferences of the player and the money they earn in the game. The map is full HD and has many props that make it unique, creating a perfect combination of ancient and post-apocalyptic. Also it has inside of climatic variations and time to make the gameplay more engaging. There are pitfalls that can injure and even kill the player, you have to pay attention to the fire and drops.

Reeco Games is already working on a second map with a totally different ambience to give the possibility to the player to immerse themselves in different scenarios and carry on the history of the game.

Within the setting of the game there are many objects that the player could activate at will. Activation is going close to it, and pressing the ""Tap To ..."" that will appear on the screen. Buy weapons, open doors, activate items, etc. .. All involve a cash outlay of gambling money, money that is earned by killing zombies. Each object has activated animations.

Gates and Doors are open around the map and define the various areas of the game. The gates are more slowly but  open areas much more extensive and useful for escape. While the doors are open and many more confined spaces in different levels of the game area.
The boxes are objects of different sizes located in the interior map. Each has different animations both when opening and closing. Activation releasing random objects.
Random objects may be special weapons, ammunition, bombs, money, invincibility, etc .. These items can be purchased through the speakers or can be released to the death of some zombies.

The ""Deadpack"" items are objects that can be activated within the game that kill zombies without being controlled (individually). ""Turrets"" locate targets near and kill with gusts of shots at a very high lethal potential. The ""Agonyzer"" immobilize the zombies in the area and they agonize and then explode. The ""Helicopter"" flies over the area in which it has been activated and allows a lethal support from above. Finally, the ""Scouts"" are a team of robots patrolling the area and kill all the zombies. All products by this package have a short duration and could be used in most critical situations of the game. They are activated from different locations according to their lethality.

The rooms are three weapons in the game and allow the player to buy different types of weapons based on the money to the preferences. Currently, there are 15 types of weapons purchased in the game to give the player the option to choose between guns, snipers, machine guns, assault rifles and cannons. All weapons are in high definition (HD) and present a lot of particularities and animations based on action (charging, fire, race, etc ..).
Lifts help the player to escape by moving levels.
Reeco games has opted for a variable funding because even if you were to reach the goal of 40,000 euro will commit to invest in and finish the game on spring 2016.

finish the game dynamics in the offline mode
hire a person that improves the quality and repair the different lag of the game
hire the servers required to ensure that the game is also available in co-op online mode
create new maps, new characters and weapons
The remainder of the budget will be used in advertising and promotion of video games to make sure that it downloads from the catchment expected.

This varies from the round in which the player is and the difficulties that will meet in killing the zombies. Also some characters to their death issue in addition to the money even objects useful to the survival of the player, such as ammunition, life, etc ..

The main map of BlackMind is an old quarter inside of ""TheCity"". You can not run off the map because the area is quarantined. But you can open a lot of doors and areas within the district that allow you to survive the most long in the match. Attention: opening up new areas on the map will activate the spawn points that will create more zombies. The district was created on different levels to give the possibility to play both of spaces more extensive in both rooms and restricted based on the preferences of the player and the money they earn in the game. The map is full HD and has many props that make it unique, creating a perfect combination of ancient and post-apocalyptic. Also it has inside of climatic variations and time to make the gameplay more engaging. There are pitfalls that can injure and even kill the player, you have to pay attention to the fire and drops.

Reeco Games is already working on a second map with a totally different ambience to give the possibility to the player to immerse themselves in different scenarios and carry on the history of the game.

Within the setting of the game there are many objects that the player could activate at will. Activation is going close to it, and pressing the ""Tap To ..."" that will appear on the screen. Buy weapons, open doors, activate items, etc. .. All involve a cash outlay of gambling money, money that is earned by killing zombies. Each object has activated animations.

Gates and Doors are open around the map and define the various areas of the game. The gates are more slowly but  open areas much more extensive and useful for escape. While the doors are open and many more confined spaces in different levels of the game area.
The boxes are objects of different sizes located in the interior map. Each has different animations both when opening and closing. Activation releasing random objects.
Random objects may be special weapons, ammunition, bombs, money, invincibility, etc .. These items can be purchased through the speakers or can be released to the death of some zombies.

The ""Deadpack"" items are objects that can be activated within the game that kill zombies without being controlled (individually). ""Turrets"" locate targets near and kill with gusts of shots at a very high lethal potential. The ""Agonyzer"" immobilize the zombies in the area and they agonize and then explode. The ""Helicopter"" flies over the area in which it has been activated and allows a lethal support from above. Finally, the ""Scouts"" are a team of robots patrolling the area and kill all the zombies. All products by this package have a short duration and could be used in most critical situations of the game. They are activated from different locations according to their lethality.

The rooms are three weapons in the game and allow the player to buy different types of weapons based on the money to the preferences. Currently, there are 15 types of weapons purchased in the game to give the player the option to choose between guns, snipers, machine guns, assault rifles and cannons. All weapons are in high definition (HD) and present a lot of particularities and animations based on action (charging, fire, race, etc ..).
Lifts help the player to escape by moving levels.
Reeco games has opted for a variable funding because even if you were to reach the goal of 40,000 euro will commit to invest in and finish the game on spring 2016.
For more information please contact us at info.reecogames@gmail.com and visit our social networks pages:

column1: Hi. My name is Richard. I am the owner of The Camo Dragon. I'm a veteran, a single father of 2, and a child grown in the heart of the Gaming/Comic industry. I've been a comic book enthusiast since the age of 5 when my Grandpa's brother gave me his comics he was done reading. Then at 8 during a summer camp someone I met (who would turn out to be my lifelong best friend) taught me to play D&
column2: D from the old blue book when Elf was a character class not a race. In high school my History teacher introduced a group of us to Avalon Hill strategy games where I discovered a gift for tactics and resource planning. I have run campaigns, designed my own world, and discovered computer gaming (Civ and others). During my last 2 years in the military I discovered M:TG as Beta was released. When the pro tour started I played competitively (I still enjoy my Type 1 Chains of Meph/Stasis Deck). Upon leaving the military (Honorably Discharged) I worked conventions for several years to support my family as a rep for a major gaming company pushing books and LARP products.

column4: >During that time I met and worked with a lot of great people including guests, con staff, dealers, writers, artists, game designers and others related to the industry. This time culminated with the opening of the first Camo Dragon store on my own in Chattanooga, TN. An investor believed in my business plan and vision (that was in 1998) and for three years the store did VERY well coming within touching distance of breaking even the first year then growing from there. Running the business was the one thing I was great at and this was before the Internet could be a large component of sales and a major leg that would support a thriving business.

column1: Then I had to make a decision that was really no decision at all. I had to shut down the store to become a single parent and care for my son (he's now 25 has been to college and will be working the store with me). It was painful to walk away from the business I had built, but I did it for my family. I missed the people, the friends I had, and all of the contacts I had made - but I never once regretted it. After a time, I moved to Knoxville, TN for work. Every Friday FNM turned into time for my son and I. I offered advice to some of the small shop owners and tried to help them. It was a way to keep my hand in with the industry I loved. And I thought that would be the extent of it...

column3: >Currently The Camo Dragon has Comics, CCG Singles, Trading Card Inserts, Autographed Materials, Gaming Books, and a few Video Games available through other online sources (ebay/Puca Trade/TCG Gamer). To increase profitability we will change to our own website to make navigation easy and offer a wider variety without slowing down bandwidth. Each line will have its own section. This will consolidate our offerings to be easier to find.

column1: We will be adding product lines. Currently because we do not have open doors in a brick and mortar location there are product lines we are unable to offer. Distributors are prohibited from offering them to us by the manufacturers. We will remedy this with a location and  expand into CCG boxes/packs, and miniatures with accessories.

Creating the ONLY Anime viewing room and Anime Club in Knoxville. Currently there are no options other than mail order for local fans. It seems a tragedy that Knoxville hosts an Anime con but has no dedicated Anime offerings right here. We will be offering a large variety of DVD/Blu-Ray movies, wall scrolls, fans, figures, and just about anything fans might need.

General things: Tables and chairs for gaming (Heavy Duty Comfortable Chairs), Vertical displays (for maximum viewing and space saving), Custom Miniature Terrain and sundry other items for support of the store.
We will be building smarter not harder...

Our perks are generous. We developed this perk tree that way with a purpose. We are in this for the long haul and want people to extend the discounts through donations to 10 years or more if that is possible. This store will be happening! Personal funding will ensure that but there is a difference between open and thriving - which is where you come in. Negotiations for the location are almost completed and we are looking at May the 4th for the location opening. There is a Death Star grill that we are planning on acquiring to host a grand opening party with burgers and dogs. The discounts on individual lines are tailored to meet the needs of any gamer and their interests with an emphasis on building a huge online component to the business. So the Line Categories to choose from are:

column1: As I stated earlier I spent about 12 years working the convention circuit and working as a goodwill rep for a major gaming company. What this provided for me was a large number of people who were friends in the industry. As happens with life as it changes, paths change and diverge meaning you lose track of people. Since I made the decision last September to do this I have been reaching out to old friends and acquaintances. Mostly to remind them I'm still alive and to jog ancient memories.

As a result many of the Artists, Game Designers, Writers, Actors, and others in the industry have agreed to help me. They will be offering workshops, critiques, game sessions, play-testing, signed and original work, and other unknown help at this time.

ALSO - As we grow and are able to create dependable venues we will begin offering Camo Dragon Gaming weekends for cash. Just like the tournament opens, grand prix and qualifier schedule offered by other companies. It may take a year or two for those to get started but once they do they will be a pillar of the business on a regular schedule.

The upside of this for all you contributors is this - If you have donated to a tier where you have one of the aluminum Camo Dragon Keyfobs you will have access. For the tournaments, entry will be free with presentation of the Keyfob for life. If there are limited quantities of autographed stuff they will be offered to those with Keyfobs first then the general public. When there are events with a guest of some type you will be notified and if you are present will be included in private dinners, signings, game nights or other things that will not be available to the public.

column2: >A Last Perk Only For Active Duty And Veterans

column1: I spent 8 years in the U.S.Army from 1986 to 1994. Three and a half years in the Republic of S. Korea and three and a half years at 229th Airborne at Ft Rucker with a year-ish at Ft Eustis and Ft Dix for training. Being overseas access to any hobby materials is almost non-existent.

Our military deserve much yet receive so little. Our little bit to give to them is a 10% discount across the board with proof of status weather they contribute to this fund campaign or not. Also Every shipment sent to an APO will come with a shipping label to send the items from the APO/FPO to your home of record on request. It will come in the box with your items. It isn't much but thank you for the sacrifices you and your families make.

column2: >The Gaming Community Deserves This Gem of a Store

column5: >Why This is Important...For All of Us

column1: Sometimes things happen. Life throws you curve balls and you roll with the punches and keep moving. When I closed my store just after the turn of the millennium (that's just fun to say...ahem) I thought my chance to build something from the industry I enjoy had passed. That having famous people on speed dial (No I will not name drop) was a thing of the past...glory days stories for my son to tell his friends for them to think he was cool as a teen. Then life changes again. A single snowflake tumbles and begins to fall down a mountain...collecting other snowflakes with it and eventually there is an avalanche. Well this avalanche is a new wellspring of life - collecting a lifetime of experience into a renaissance of sorts and a new beginning.
When two things contradict the only logical thing to do is create a solution.

As a parent it is a joy to watch your children grow. To begin to explore and be curious, to get into things you put away just because they want to know about you and the world, and to experience a sense of wonder and imagination. (Come with meeee...and you'll seeee...) As a single father of an intuitive, bright eight year old girl you are also protective. All the cliches apply here. You want a place for her to be safe and able to enjoy being creative. The crushing weight of the world can and should wait decades. She wants me to add her to my AD&
column2: D game. She wants to go to the game store and watch me and her brother play M:TG (She wants to be the first female Worlds champion, on par with Melissa DeTora). She ADORES Superhero TV, Face Off, her comic books, The Hobbit/LOTR trilogies, and anything imaginative. She even came running into a game session after learning the Vulcan hand gesture yelling ""Live Long and Prosper! I'm the Queen of the Nerds!!!"" That's thing 1 and it is precious beyond all measure.

column1: Have you ever been to a game store that is PRISTINE...where they hover to wipe the glass of fingerprints if you point at a card? Or where as soon as you walk in the door they are looking to make a sale then push you out the door as quickly as they can? Where you are JUST a dollar sign and sitting at the gaming tables isn't allowed because it isn't game night? How about playing FNM where someone is going on about the horrible player they just crushed and how they shouldn't have even put the deck together - loudly so everyone can hear - they are thirty and the other player was 14? Or maybe the guy playing who always has a flask of ""adult beverage"" that is occasionally left open with minors playing next to him? Or the teens whose egos get bruised being beaten by a ""girl into girls"" because real girls support their boyfriends in being great not playing M:TG? Or the store that all the gaming books smell of cigarettes and the lighting is nonexistent - more like something out of an underground club? I've seen all of these things over the years here in the chain stores and as long as the profits are good nothing is ever said because the offenders spend money. That's thing 2 and it's an abomination to all chivalrous gamers. It's not an environment I want my daughter in...or anyone else's son or daughter either.

So after a 15 year hiatus...the only rational solution is to re-open a store. But not just any store...to re-open The Camo Dragon. Not a chain, not an exploitative profit grab, but a great quality, well maintained, safe for growth/creativity/learning, teaching new players the love of all the avenues of this hobby kind of store. A place that can grow itself, become larger and better over the years and support the whole gaming community.

What is a gaming store? Or more accurately - what should a gaming store be to the community? It is my belief that a game/comics/hobby store should be one very simple thing. It should be a Pub without the alcohol. The staff should know their products and have a genuine interest in them. If a kid wants to come in to get his comics and discuss the latest plot lines then that should be a fun discussion for all involved. If a person wants to discuss the new combo for their deck they just figured out then the staff should be able to discuss it and its merits to help the player improve. Weather it is anime plots or 40K strategies and armies the people at the store should be able to discuss, help and encourage the player. Personality and an unfeigned interest in what players needs are - to me - is the hallmark of great customer service. This is the key to creating a store that services a community not a clique of individuals who own a store because they have deep pockets.

In closing I would just like to say thank you to all those who are making this store thrive from the beginning. The risk in this fundraiser is minimal because even if we fail to receive the full amount of funding (or more) the perks are easily fulfilled. This store will open whether this funding is 100% (or more) funded or not. The goal here is not only to have strong opening, but to expand and create a much more stable platform to grow from. Online will continue to grow, we will add other lines as able, and we will get there. What this fundraiser really does is build a community who supports us and in return we support them in as many ways as possible. It saves years of offering the services we want to provide from the very beginning. We understand if you are not able to donate - although you donation is certainly requested and greatly appreciated - But if you can not then please PASS IT ON. Send it to friends and family, use the Indiegogo share tools, send it to EVERY Military member - Soldier, Sailor, Marine or Airman - we are enthusiastic to ease their burdens with products to entertain, and just spread the word. Community is what we are building and community is what we want to invite you to join. Thank you and we eagerly await your business.
","Welcome to the Camo Dragon Who I Am...

Hi. My name is Richard. I am the owner of The Camo Dragon. I'm a veteran, a single father of 2, and a child grown in the heart of the Gaming/Comic industry. I've been a comic book enthusiast since the age of 5 when my Grandpa's brother gave me his comics he was done reading. Then at 8 during a summer camp someone I met (who would turn out to be my lifelong best friend) taught me to play D&D from the old blue book when Elf was a character class not a race. In high school my History teacher introduced a group of us to Avalon Hill strategy games where I discovered a gift for tactics and resource planning. I have run campaigns, designed my own world, and discovered computer gaming (Civ and others). During my last 2 years in the military I discovered M:TG as Beta was released. When the pro tour started I played competitively (I still enjoy my Type 1 Chains of Meph/Stasis Deck). Upon leaving the military (Honorably Discharged) I worked conventions for several years to support my family as a rep for a major gaming company pushing books and LARP products.

During that time I met and worked with a lot of great people including guests, con staff, dealers, writers, artists, game designers and others related to the industry. This time culminated with the opening of the first Camo Dragon store on my own in Chattanooga, TN. An investor believed in my business plan and vision (that was in 1998) and for three years the store did VERY well coming within touching distance of breaking even the first year then growing from there. Running the business was the one thing I was great at and this was before the Internet could be a large component of sales and a major leg that would support a thriving business.

Then I had to make a decision that was really no decision at all. I had to shut down the store to become a single parent and care for my son (he's now 25 has been to college and will be working the store with me). It was painful to walk away from the business I had built, but I did it for my family. I missed the people, the friends I had, and all of the contacts I had made - but I never once regretted it. After a time, I moved to Knoxville, TN for work. Every Friday FNM turned into time for my son and I. I offered advice to some of the small shop owners and tried to help them. It was a way to keep my hand in with the industry I loved. And I thought that would be the extent of it...
Where the Money Will be Used...

Currently The Camo Dragon has Comics, CCG Singles, Trading Card Inserts, Autographed Materials, Gaming Books, and a few Video Games available through other online sources (ebay/Puca Trade/TCG Gamer). To increase profitability we will change to our own website to make navigation easy and offer a wider variety without slowing down bandwidth. Each line will have its own section. This will consolidate our offerings to be easier to find.

We will be adding product lines. Currently because we do not have open doors in a brick and mortar location there are product lines we are unable to offer. Distributors are prohibited from offering them to us by the manufacturers. We will remedy this with a location and  expand into CCG boxes/packs, and miniatures with accessories.

Creating the ONLY Anime viewing room and Anime Club in Knoxville. Currently there are no options other than mail order for local fans. It seems a tragedy that Knoxville hosts an Anime con but has no dedicated Anime offerings right here. We will be offering a large variety of DVD/Blu-Ray movies, wall scrolls, fans, figures, and just about anything fans might need.

General things: Tables and chairs for gaming (Heavy Duty Comfortable Chairs), Vertical displays (for maximum viewing and space saving), Custom Miniature Terrain and sundry other items for support of the store.
We will be building smarter not harder...

Our perks are generous. We developed this perk tree that way with a purpose. We are in this for the long haul and want people to extend the discounts through donations to 10 years or more if that is possible. This store will be happening! Personal funding will ensure that but there is a difference between open and thriving - which is where you come in. Negotiations for the location are almost completed and we are looking at May the 4th for the location opening. There is a Death Star grill that we are planning on acquiring to host a grand opening party with burgers and dogs. The discounts on individual lines are tailored to meet the needs of any gamer and their interests with an emphasis on building a huge online component to the business. So the Line Categories to choose from are:
Anime and Accessories - DVD/Blu-Ray, Scrolls, Art, Figures etc.
Board/S&T Games - Tabletop Wargaming and Drink/Pretzel Games
CCG Sealed Product - Boxes, Packs, Cases, Duel Decks etc.
CCG Singles - This is a Separate CCG Line (We will price by TCG Median)
Comic Books and Trading Cards - Subscriptions, Bags/Boards, Inserts, Sets
Artwork - Prints, Lithographs, Limited Runs, Portfolios, Autographs etc.
Jewelry/Decorative Pewter - Great Gifts by Alchemy England and Others
LARP/SCA - Costumes, Garb, Swords, Mail, etc
Miniatures - Figures, Paints, Brushes Carry Cases (Tactical and RPG lines)
RPG's and Accessories - Books, Maps, Dice etc.

As a result many of the Artists, Game Designers, Writers, Actors, and others in the industry have agreed to help me. They will be offering workshops, critiques, game sessions, play-testing, signed and original work, and other unknown help at this time.

Why This is Important...For All of Us

Sometimes things happen. Life throws you curve balls and you roll with the punches and keep moving. When I closed my store just after the turn of the millennium (that's just fun to say...ahem) I thought my chance to build something from the industry I enjoy had passed. That having famous people on speed dial (No I will not name drop) was a thing of the past...glory days stories for my son to tell his friends for them to think he was cool as a teen. Then life changes again. A single snowflake tumbles and begins to fall down a mountain...collecting other snowflakes with it and eventually there is an avalanche. Well this avalanche is a new wellspring of life - collecting a lifetime of experience into a renaissance of sorts and a new beginning.
When two things contradict the only logical thing to do is create a solution.

As a parent it is a joy to watch your children grow. To begin to explore and be curious, to get into things you put away just because they want to know about you and the world, and to experience a sense of wonder and imagination. (Come with meeee...and you'll seeee...) As a single father of an intuitive, bright eight year old girl you are also protective. All the cliches apply here. You want a place for her to be safe and able to enjoy being creative. The crushing weight of the world can and should wait decades. She wants me to add her to my AD&D game. She wants to go to the game store and watch me and her brother play M:TG (She wants to be the first female Worlds champion, on par with Melissa DeTora). She ADORES Superhero TV, Face Off, her comic books, The Hobbit/LOTR trilogies, and anything imaginative. She even came running into a game session after learning the Vulcan hand gesture yelling ""Live Long and Prosper! I'm the Queen of the Nerds!!!"" That's thing 1 and it is precious beyond all measure.

Have you ever been to a game store that is PRISTINE...where they hover to wipe the glass of fingerprints if you point at a card? Or where as soon as you walk in the door they are looking to make a sale then push you out the door as quickly as they can? Where you are JUST a dollar sign and sitting at the gaming tables isn't allowed because it isn't game night? How about playing FNM where someone is going on about the horrible player they just crushed and how they shouldn't have even put the deck together - loudly so everyone can hear - they are thirty and the other player was 14? Or maybe the guy playing who always has a flask of ""adult beverage"" that is occasionally left open with minors playing next to him? Or the teens whose egos get bruised being beaten by a ""girl into girls"" because real girls support their boyfriends in being great not playing M:TG? Or the store that all the gaming books smell of cigarettes and the lighting is nonexistent - more like something out of an underground club? I've seen all of these things over the years here in the chain stores and as long as the profits are good nothing is ever said because the offenders spend money. That's thing 2 and it's an abomination to all chivalrous gamers. It's not an environment I want my daughter in...or anyone else's son or daughter either.

So after a 15 year hiatus...the only rational solution is to re-open a store. But not just any store...to re-open The Camo Dragon. Not a chain, not an exploitative profit grab, but a great quality, well maintained, safe for growth/creativity/learning, teaching new players the love of all the avenues of this hobby kind of store. A place that can grow itself, become larger and better over the years and support the whole gaming community.

What is a gaming store? Or more accurately - what should a gaming store be to the community? It is my belief that a game/comics/hobby store should be one very simple thing. It should be a Pub without the alcohol. The staff should know their products and have a genuine interest in them. If a kid wants to come in to get his comics and discuss the latest plot lines then that should be a fun discussion for all involved. If a person wants to discuss the new combo for their deck they just figured out then the staff should be able to discuss it and its merits to help the player improve. Weather it is anime plots or 40K strategies and armies the people at the store should be able to discuss, help and encourage the player. Personality and an unfeigned interest in what players needs are - to me - is the hallmark of great customer service. This is the key to creating a store that services a community not a clique of individuals who own a store because they have deep pockets.

In closing I would just like to say thank you to all those who are making this store thrive from the beginning. The risk in this fundraiser is minimal because even if we fail to receive the full amount of funding (or more) the perks are easily fulfilled. This store will open whether this funding is 100% (or more) funded or not. The goal here is not only to have strong opening, but to expand and create a much more stable platform to grow from. Online will continue to grow, we will add other lines as able, and we will get there. What this fundraiser really does is build a community who supports us and in return we support them in as many ways as possible. It saves years of offering the services we want to provide from the very beginning. We understand if you are not able to donate - although you donation is certainly requested and greatly appreciated - But if you can not then please PASS IT ON. Send it to friends and family, use the Indiegogo share tools, send it to EVERY Military member - Soldier, Sailor, Marine or Airman - we are enthusiastic to ease their burdens with products to entertain, and just spread the word. Community is what we are building and community is what we want to invite you to join. Thank you and we eagerly await your business.

column4: >We are a team of skilled Anime, Manga, and Cute girl enthusiast.

column1: This genre of game is not very well represented within the mobile gaming market, this is why it is up to our team to bring this game to the Apple and Android stores as well as Mac and PC, for Neko, cute, and anime girl lovers to enjoy.
column2: >Our goal is to create a beautiful and stunning game, which immerses you into a 2D Harem, that features high quality art, animation, voice acting and gameplay.
>  This game will be fully animated and voiced and feature an original story that ties into the theme.
column3: >All your Nekos will have unique personalities you must cater to in order to train them. Once trained you can sell your nekos to purchase new ones, or, keep them.

column1: We plan to incorporate this story to have missions and goals within the game, and with constant updates, patches and improvements, there will always be something to do!

column1: Creating this game will be a challenge for everyone involved, we will have several rough drafts of scripts and stories and games and animations before we are eventually completely happy.
Our team is dedicated and we have a clear vision for the type of game we would want to play, even if one like this does not currently exist. This is how we will overcome these hurdles.

Other Ways You Can Help

   Feel free to share this campaign with your friends! there are several perks that will make it worth your while.
Available in ""Early Neko"" perk for a cheaper price!
Also available in ""Cat"" and the perks that follow it.
","We are a team of skilled Anime, Manga, and Cute girl enthusiast.

This genre of game is not very well represented within the mobile gaming market, this is why it is up to our team to bring this game to the Apple and Android stores as well as Mac and PC, for Neko, cute, and anime girl lovers to enjoy.  Our goal is to create a beautiful and stunning game, which immerses you into a 2D Harem, that features high quality art, animation, voice acting and gameplay.

This game will be fully animated and voiced and feature an original story that ties into the theme.  All your Nekos will have unique personalities you must cater to in order to train them. Once trained you can sell your nekos to purchase new ones, or, keep them.
We plan to incorporate this story to have missions and goals within the game, and with constant updates, patches and improvements, there will always be something to do!
Our funding will go into all aspects of making a game, this includes paying for Devs, Artist, Voice Actors, software and hardware, et.c

There are many perks to having a small and less corporate team, we plan to include several features you wouldn't normally get in a typical game of this genre, we will add excitement and refreshment to the typical mobile and computer game.
If you want to see this game happen please donate, any amount counts.
We plan to also eventually release a 18+ patch, available on Mac and PC only.
If we do not reach our funding goal we will still do our best to get this game out there.
Creating this game will be a challenge for everyone involved, we will have several rough drafts of scripts and stories and games and animations before we are eventually completely happy.
Our team is dedicated and we have a clear vision for the type of game we would want to play, even if one like this does not currently exist. This is how we will overcome these hurdles.
Other Ways You Can Help    Feel free to share this campaign with your friends! there are several perks that will make it worth your while.

What exactly are we creating?
We are creating a mix of survival RPG and weather forecast app. :)
- Unpredictable game process, it depends only on the user and the weather
- Challenges mode: Be better than your friend while trying to survive in the most interesting places of the real world during a day
- Find all game secrets and solve game main quest faster than other players.
It has a scenario and a hero, named “Oliver”. How you access the game’s main quests is dependent on the actual weather in your real-life location.

Throughout Oliver’s adventures, you will think about your priorities and make decisions influencing the game process, but you will always refer to the weather forecast for several days ahead for guidance.
In the end you will have a lot of fun. You will also know whether to take along an umbrella for tomorrow’s walk in the park.
What exactly should I do in the game?

It is the beginning of autumn, and you are living in rainy London. Your quest inside the game is to ""Help Oliver travel along the river toward the mysterious village close to the old forest"". You have to design a raft or a boat to cross the river. You therefore need to explore the map to find suitable materials, but don't forget that it is raining in London and you need to build your craft as quickly as possible. You will need to keep your fire going, preserve your food rations and shelter Oliver from the rain to maintain his health.
Oliver’s stress levels need to be kept low to enable him to work hard and effectively (explore, invent and craft).
As you can see, the game is about the chain of needs and unique situations influenced by the actual climate. We hope you find this idea as exciting as we do!

We currently spend all our spare time working on the game, while still fulfilling the demands of our regular jobs and day-to- day responsibilities. This situation inevitably impacts upon our graphics and art because these tasks take time. Working on projects spread across several locations also has an influence. With your help, we can undertake our work better and faster.
- New game process in which  Oliver will be able to explore the game world
We will keep you apprised of every step and all developments. We really want Weathery to become not only mine and my team’s dream, but yours too. I hope we can do it together.
We’ve also prepared some nice gifts for you, for example our designer Varvara has made a t-shirt for you:

Creating computer games is my personal dream, one that I share with my team. I have been playing video and PC games for 22 years and have often thought how great it would be if some of the scenarios from my everyday life could inspire the gaming process or influence the hero’s journey.
I want to share our first steps with you. I hope we can take this journey together and make ""Weathery"" as good in reality as it in our dreams.
Like in any other project in the world there will be problems. But that's only part of the fun, right?
The game is already in development, the core mechanic of the game is there  What we need is the ""stability"" and reassurance to devote all our time to this and complete it.
And you have our word that we will do the impossible and more to realize what we’ve promised here!

Hi, you are still reading, it is great! Why not contribute to the campaign? )
If you cannot or simply do not like games at all, don't worry...we love you anyway <
column2:
3. But please help us spread the word and share this project with all your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and anyanyany social network you have! It is means a lot for as! 
Repost and share please!

Flying Witch Mania is the ULTIMATE one touch arcade game on the market! In this game, help the witch fly through the flames! Flying Witch Mania is a new kind of addicting arcade game that you can play with one hand.

The witch constantly moves forward through the courses while you use a variety of jumps to navigate. Characters will behave differently depending on the timing of your taps, so it's up to you to show off particularly smooth moves, collect bones, and advance to the next level!

Choose between 8 amazing characters to play! Show off your stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world. Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you collect bones.

Your next adventure awaits! Collect as may bones as you can. Unlock new characters. You can even use gadgets and equipment to help your hero advance to the next level. Climb to the top of the leaderboard and challenge your friends today.
• Use unique gadgets and equipment to help the witch
• Climb to the top of the leaderboard
Let’s see how far can you fly!

column1: Your contributions will go a long way in the development of Flying Witch Mania in all platforms in 7 major languages for people of all ages to enjoy playing.  Even if you're not a gamer, we are sure that someone in your family and friends are.  As of the moment we are getting favorable reviews for our iOS app but we are not sitting on our laurels.  We want to make it the best arcade game available across all platforms.

The only risk we face at the moment is the lack of contributors thus not reaching our goal to make Flying Witch Mania the ultimate arcade game.  As an entrepreneur, I am used to these kinds of challenges.  It drives me to analyze what problems our campaign are facing.  With a qualified team for much needed support, we strongly believe we could reach and even exceed our campaign goals.

We understand that not everybody can contribute to our campaign but we would appreciate it very much if they can spread the word to their friends and families through social media and other offline means or they can download the app and share their feedbacks to us so we could further improve the app and provide better playing enjoyment.

Balance of Kingdoms is a competitive multiplayer strategy game with a twist! You must build  your kingdom on a beam balanced on top of a mountain while attempting to defeat your opponent!

Online multiplayer will have a matchmaking and lobby system where players can create or join random lobbies with people ready to play or invite friends to play. Hosts will have control over many match rules such as winning conditions, starting resources, player number and time limits.
Local Multiplayer is currently working and in the game for closed Beta testers. This is split screen and can be played with either controllers or mouse &
Each Kingdom will have their own Singleplayer Campaign with a series of AI battles, build challenges and boss battles.
- Singleplayer / Multiplayer Sandbox and Build Challenges
There will be a Sandbox mode where players can build absolutely anything they like! This will also be multiplayer if you would like to build with friends!

In the first public release of Balance of Kingdoms there will be 3 different kingdoms to choose from and we plan to release a brand new kingdom every few months after release! Each kingdom will have different strengths and weaknesses.
Ruled by King Julius Sprinkles II, The Knights of the Sword focus on strong stone buildings and mighty cannons
column2: a well organised and balanced army.

column1: Defender of the Magic Arts, Maggie Mage, commands the Arcane Order - a defensive kingdom - using magic to deflect incoming attacks and towers forged using the toughest metals.
Chief Clive Axebeard is the fearsome, axe-wielding leader of Clan Axebeard, who build flimsy wooden huts but use powerful catapults and brave warriors to crush their enemies.
We are planning to release the game for PC / Mac / Linux, mobile and consoles!
Contributors will be able to gain early access to the game, get Indiegogo exclusive items in game and merchandise!
This IndieGoGo campaign will help us put all of our time and passion into developing the game full time. The funding will also help with gaining licenses for console releases.
If you cannot contribute then you can also make a huge impact by sharing this campaign on social media!

Boss Battle Games is an arcade and gaming center packed with some of the best games ever made, but we're a little different than the arcades of yesterday. All you have to do is pay admission and you can play as much as you want, all day long.

Since opening our doors 3 years ago we've become a community hub for gaming in the Indianapolis area. We've worked hard to bring you games you can't play anywhere else, and revive that real life community atmosphere that's been lost in the internet age. We want to continue doing this in 2019 and beyond, so we're moving to an even better location at the start of the new year.
We could use an extra life, or two.

Over the past two years we've been saving funds and collecting arcade equipment to make our next location the hands down best arcade in the state. We've signed our lease, hired contractors to renovate the new space, and are working on getting more arcade machines ready for service. All the while keeping our current location running until we're ready to move at the end of January.

We've had so many people ask us ""How can I help?"" At the end of the day most people can't troubleshoot a monitor or install an electrical panel, so the best way you can give us a hand is by donating to the cause.

All donations we get will go towards covering any shortfalls we have when renovating the new space and getting our treasure trove of games in storage ready for showtime. It will also help keep us alive while we work through what's probably going to be the most demanding 4 weeks of our lives. We've got extensive electrical work that needs done, truck loads of arcade machines that need attention, less time than we need to do it, and we have to stay afloat if anything unexpected goes wrong. Anything that's left over, every single dollar we have, will go towards making the new arcade better in some way.
Giving Indy gamers a place to call home.

Good arcades and gathering places for gamers are rare today outside of conventions and special events. That atmosphere is what we aim to create every day, right here in your backyard. We want to continue being a place where you can always find other players who share your hobby and passion for video games in a real life, face to face environment. By helping us get over this hill, you're helping keep the doors open to a community space for yourself and all your friends.

Our biggest challenge right now is preparing for the unexpected. A lot of things have to go right for us to pull this off, and if there is one thing we have learned, it's that things rarely go exactly as planned. We really just want a safety net in case things go sideways and we come up short in some way, so we don't have to make any compromises in our vision for this new location. We've had a lot of our community offer to help, and this is the best thing you can do to make our jobs easier.

We could definitely use every dollar we can get, but letting people know about us and this campaign is also a huge help. Word of mouth has been our best advertising and that's not going to change going forward. Also visiting us, paying admission, and buying a used game or two allows us to keep doing what we're doing. Thanks for taking the time to read all this, and we look forward to seeing you in Castleton in 2019.

Boss Battle Games is an arcade and gaming center packed with some of the best games ever made, but we're a little different than the arcades of yesterday. All you have to do is pay admission and you can play as much as you want, all day long.Since opening our doors 3 years ago we've become a community hub for gaming in the Indianapolis area. We've worked hard to bring you games you can't play anywhere else, and revive that real life community atmosphere that's been lost in the internet age. We want to continue doing this in 2019 and beyond, so we're moving to an even better location at the start of the new year.
We could use an extra life, or two.

Over the past two years we've been saving funds and collecting arcade equipment to make our next location the hands down best arcade in the state. We've signed our lease, hired contractors to renovate the new space, and are working on getting more arcade machines ready for service. All the while keeping our current location running until we're ready to move at the end of January.We've had so many people ask us ""How can I help?"" At the end of the day most people can't troubleshoot a monitor or install an electrical panel, so the best way you can give us a hand is by donating to the cause.All donations we get will go towards covering any shortfalls we have when renovating the new space and getting our treasure trove of games in storage ready for showtime. It will also help keep us alive while we work through what's probably going to be the most demanding 4 weeks of our lives. We've got extensive electrical work that needs done, truck loads of arcade machines that need attention, less time than we need to do it, and we have to stay afloat if anything unexpected goes wrong. Anything that's left over, every single dollar we have, will go towards making the new arcade better in some way.
Giving Indy gamers a place to call home.

Good arcades and gathering places for gamers are rare today outside of conventions and special events. That atmosphere is what we aim to create every day, right here in your backyard. We want to continue being a place where you can always find other players who share your hobby and passion for video games in a real life, face to face environment. By helping us get over this hill, you're helping keep the doors open to a community space for yourself and all your friends.
Life keeps increasing the difficulty setting.

Our biggest challenge right now is preparing for the unexpected. A lot of things have to go right for us to pull this off, and if there is one thing we have learned, it's that things rarely go exactly as planned. We really just want a safety net in case things go sideways and we come up short in some way, so we don't have to make any compromises in our vision for this new location. We've had a lot of our community offer to help, and this is the best thing you can do to make our jobs easier.

We could definitely use every dollar we can get, but letting people know about us and this campaign is also a huge help. Word of mouth has been our best advertising and that's not going to change going forward. Also visiting us, paying admission, and buying a used game or two allows us to keep doing what we're doing. Thanks for taking the time to read all this, and we look forward to seeing you in Castleton in 2019.",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

>Summary:

 Cubicverse Inc has a virtual world called Cubicverse MMORPG which has been referred to by several people as a mix between Minecraft and RuneScape. I am needing to raise funding to pay the coder that has joined the Cubicverse team to improve Cubicverse by adding more features to the game, hire a couple of in-game support techs, and to pay for and upgrade server hosting since right now the server hosting is on a very small package that is causing the game not to run as smoothly. We are also working on joining the Enjin Coin Spark program to implement their blockchain technology into Cubicverse MMORPG and with this players will be able to earn real life money within the game. The Enjin Coin team has stated to me in private conversations that once I can show that the game has the Enjin Coin SDK testnet integrated into it then there shouldn't be an issue with joining the Spark program. I would just need to raise the funding to pay the developer to get the integration done. Once that is completed then I will host another funding round with other perks and blockchain based items as rewards for donating. Thank you all for reading about my project and I have listed below a description of Cubicverse MMORPG, a Q&
column4:
A's of the game, and a link to a couple of YouTube videos for Cubicverse since I couldn't get the videos to upload onto here.

Game Information:

Cubicverse: a world full of fun and opportunities! Now, where did you hear that before? You've probably heard it many a time before! Cubicverse, though, is a full world awaiting you, where you are able to wander around, battle monsters, discover new places, help your fellow players or solve mysteries. Whatever you like best! And what will this cost you? Time, only your time and perhaps a little luck, adventurer, will do you well. But your courage to join our community... that’s all you really need.

Features: Infinitely sided world

Full player to player chat and interaction

Craft your own equipment

Fully realised ore/mining system

Full isometric/3D world Unique, strange and unusual setting

Player owned areas and buildings

Not quite like anything else you've ever played...

Game Q&
column5:
A's:

Why Early Access?

“We are releasing the game early based on a playable but unoptimised build. We are doing so because we think this an interesting, unique product and want people to have the chance to play. We are in the process of totally overhauling the original framework and will have a slicker, more advanced version out soon.""

Approximately how long will this game be in Early Access?

“ Only a few months we hope.”

How is the full version planned to differ from the Early Access version?

“The full version will have a slicker user interface, animations will be smoother and the whole thing will run quicker in general.”

What is the current state of the Early Access version?

“Alpha version. Some bugs and a lot that needs smoothing out, but still a very significant amount of playable and unique content.”

How are you planning on involving the Community in your development process?

“ All fan feedback will be treated with the utmost seriousness and we will implement any feasible changes the community at large wants us to make.”

Game Links:

IndieDB Profile Link: https://www.indiedb.com/games/cubicverse (downloadable Early Access client is available at this link as well as more detailed information about the game.)

Facebook Profile Link: https://www.facebook.com/cubicverse

Telegram Group: https://t.me/Cubicverse

Twitter Handle: @Cubicverse

YouTube Video Links:

Introduction: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uquTrmC1Gso

Map Editing: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h4ftfZYut7g

Fan Trailer:

Indiegogo Campaign Information:

 Cubicverse Inc is looking to raise $1,000 USD from this fundraising campaign. We need as much funding as we can get to do other things besides the actual development such as advertising and promoting the game, dedicated server hosting costs, and more. There might be more campaigns as time goes on with other donation perks.

I am developing a game to promote cooperation and peace for humanity. The game will be an MMO survival-horror game, utilizing Alternative Reality Game techniques (ARG) and another app I am developing called TacMAP. I hope have an app for smartphone involvement as well.


The funds gained here are to support me in all the costs associated with game/app creation. The details about the game are published in my google docs on my associated channel, which most of you should have already and can obtained by contacting me directly.


I love you all and many thanks for supporting my work! <

column1:
0,"

Project Explained

My name is Dmitriy Kushnir.  I am the author of such book series as The Slavic Way and Rodnover.  Time and time again, it has been suggested to me that building a temple where Slavic and Norse pagans (or heathens) can come together and honor their deities would be a good idea.  Recently, it was brought up yet another time.  So I said ... ""Why not?!"" ... ""Let's do it!""  My family has a plot of land near Zhitomir, Ukraine, which would be an ideal spot for the Temple.  It is secluded, near a forest and near a river.  A perfect spot for the Temple.

This project will consist of several phases:

Phase 1:  The Design

It takes money to hire an architect in order to create an individual project for a building.  On average, a complete project by an architect to the last nail costs approximately $5,000.  However, I know an architect, and he became very passionate about the idea of a Slavic / Norse Temple, he agreed to complete it for approximately $2,000

Cost of Phase 1:  $2,000

Phase 2:  The Foundation

It doesn't take much to complete this phase, but the foundation has to settle of the period of several months.  This way it will not crack or crumble in the long run.  It has to be done right the first time.

Cost of Phase 2:  $2,000

Phase 3:  The Box

Again, I know an owner of a lumberyard and a construction firm.  The cost of building with 30cm logs will be approximately $300/square meter.  The Temple itself will be somewhere between 80-120 square meters (depending on the funds collected).  This phase will be completed within several months.

Cost of Phase 3:  $24,000-$36,000

Phase 4:  Roof and Windows

This phase will have to be completed immediately following phase 3.  Roof and windows, depending on materials and size, will cost between $5,000 and $10,000.

Cost of Phase 4:  $5,000-$10,000

Phase 5:  Communications

There are several things each home needs:  water, power and heating.  The goal here is to make this Temple completely self-sufficient.  For power it would have to be either wind energy or water energy (there is a river within reach), and the cost for that will be approximately $5,000.  For water, it would have to be an artesian well, the cost for that will be approximately $2,000.  Heating will be done with firewood, and there is a forest nearby ... no cost.

Cost of Phase 5:  $7,000

Phase 6:  Interior Decoration

I will be completely honest with you.  If this project makes it this far, I will find craftsmen and masters, who will carve the idols and set up the interior of the Temple at my own expense.

Now ... LET'S TALK ABOUT THE PERKS!!!

I am going to create some very exciting perks, in order to get you as excited about this project as I am.

Perk #1:  If you give $10 to this project, I will write you a personal email, thanking you for your support.

Perk #2:  If you give $25 to this project, I will send you any one of my books from The Slavic Way series or Rodnover series.

Perk #3:  if you give $50 to this project, your name will be carved into one of the logs on the interior of the temple, as one of the contributors to the project.

Perk #4:  if you give $75 to this project, your name will also be carved into one of the logs on the interior of the temple, plus, I will send you a handcrafted figurine of either Odin or Svarog (your choice).

Perk #5:  if you give $100 to this project, your name will be carved into one of the logs on the interior of the temple, plus, I will send you an all-in-one Hardcover book of The Slavic Way series.

Perk #6:  If you give $250 to this project, your name will be carved into one of the logs on the interior of the temple, plus, I will send you a pantheon collection of either Slavic or Norse deities (16 figurines total).

Another Way You Can Help

You do not need money, in order to be able to help.  We all use social media, so let's make this project go viral.  Share ... Share ... Share.  Odds are, you may know someone, who would love to help and support this project.

Thank you for your support!

Slava and Hail!

A  mother's epic frantic journey in search of her lost daughter, to the lost civilization of the Indus Valley - An untold saga of true love. Follow the enigma Darkarta who is trying to create the ‘Elixir of Life’ using your daughter to resurrect his lost bride.  

What sacrifice will you make to save your only daughter from death?

  *  Explore ‘unforeseen’ environs and original puzzles. Over 5 hr Collector's Edition premium game play

  *  Bonus Chapter “Rising of the Phoenix”– Play in 'god' mode.

  *  Prequel Comic Book, Mom's diary pages, 30 Nostalgic memory collectables,

  *  36 Hall of Fame Medals, 28 Morphing Objects, Concepts, Wallpapers and Sound tracks

  *  Replay Mini Games/HOP/Cut-scenes

  *  7 Fantasy Levels and Bonus ""Shangri-La"" Level

column17: >Tuttifrutti Interactive is a Cochin Kinfra park based Indie game studio launched with a vision to develop premium quality adventure games. Visit us at www.tuttifrutti.in  for more info. Our past adventure hidden object game ""Antique Mysteries: Secrets of Howard's mansion""  developed for US client got rave reviews, was 2nd in gamezebo reader's all time favorites.  It was #2 in MSN, and #1 in iWin  and Pogo during launch. Casual game guides rated it 3/3 for uniqueness!
column22: >This gave us the inspiration to start Darkarta project 4 years ago in Nov 2012. But the project was seriously delayed due to funding difficulties. Darkarta project got ""Best in Showcase: Audience Choice"" runners up Indie Prize award in Casual Connect 2014.
column24: >This gave us the fuel to expand ourselves to a crew to  22 with combined game industry expertise of over 170 years . Our team members have worked with Zynga, Disney, Pocket Gems, Chillingo in AAA titles like Farmville, Hidden Shadows, Secret Passages to name a few..

We are #5 popular developer in this community with ~40000 page views and over 1100 comments. Subsequent fine tuning based on audience feedback ensure game is up to the adventure hidden object lovers expectations! And we run till last Xmas.

column1: The crew is now switching to service side projects till we have enough funds to complete all our dreams!  Darkarta was our dream project, and just because of this burning passion we got few International, national awards till date!  If funding goals are not met, it will take so much more time to catch our dream  stars! Pls support team tuttifrutti by pledging any perk/amount you found suitable.

PC steam build we so much wish to launch this month end. And Mac, 6 language builds and Linux by March 30th. iPad, iPhone and Android builds we aim for May 30th. All our deadlines depends on whether we could raise funds from Indiegogo, else it will be pushed till we have the needed funds.

column2: >Sequel project story/design pipeline was all set for Xmas 2017 launch but in current financial circumstances don't know when it will happen!

column1: We request you to give Darkarta project a supportive push by pledging a perk which caught your interest. And pls share this crowdfunding campaign  in your facebook, twitter and other social circles. If you've any other questions, please mail me at ajish@tuttifrutti.in.

More than the monetary value, every backer is a big morale booster for tuttifrutti these days, a candle light in the dark tunnel for our crew who started this long journey 4 years back!!  And your all moral promo support in social circles is invaluable for us as this will help us catch our dream stars one day....
To support Darkarta project please chose among the below perks or donate any amount.
Thanks once again from the bottom of our hearts!

","Darkarta just got nominated few days back for 'Game Connection America Development Awards' 2017 in 3 categories - Best Casual Game, Best Desktop/Downloadable and Most Creative & Original by Legendary Jury members!
Pls give us a supportive push by clicking above red ""BACK IT"" button or
Pls donate any amount through PayPal!
We really need your support to survive these tough days!

GAME STORY  A  mother's epic frantic journey in search of her lost daughter, to the lost civilization of the Indus Valley - An untold saga of true love. Follow the enigma Darkarta who is trying to create the ‘Elixir of Life’ using your daughter to resurrect his lost bride.  What sacrifice will you make to save your only daughter from death?  *  Explore ‘unforeseen’ environs and original puzzles. Over 5 hr Collector's Edition premium game play  *  Bonus Chapter “Rising of the Phoenix”– Play in 'god' mode.  *  Prequel Comic Book, Mom's diary pages, 30 Nostalgic memory collectables,  *  36 Hall of Fame Medals, 28 Morphing Objects, Concepts, Wallpapers and Sound tracks  *  Replay Mini Games/HOP/Cut-scenes  *  7 Fantasy Levels and Bonus ""Shangri-La"" Level   *  Replay over 12 theme tracks composed by Justin James, Peter Gundry & Joshua R Mosley     *  16 main game characters!  Tuttifrutti Interactive is a Cochin Kinfra park based Indie game studio launched with a vision to develop premium quality adventure games. Visit us at www.tuttifrutti.in  for more info. Our past adventure hidden object game ""Antique Mysteries: Secrets of Howard's mansion""  developed for US client got rave reviews, was 2nd in gamezebo reader's all time favorites.  It was #2 in MSN, and #1 in iWin  and Pogo during launch. Casual game guides rated it 3/3 for uniqueness!​     ​This gave us the inspiration to start Darkarta project 4 years ago in Nov 2012. But the project was seriously delayed due to funding difficulties. Darkarta project got ""Best in Showcase: Audience Choice"" runners up Indie Prize award in Casual Connect 2014. This gave us the fuel to expand ourselves to a crew to  22 with combined game industry expertise of over 170 years . Our team members have worked with Zynga, Disney, Pocket Gems, Chillingo in AAA titles like Farmville, Hidden Shadows, Secret Passages to name a few..Darkarta was steam green lighted as #2 among 2412 games with 10720 votes. We are beta testing the game extensively with pondfriends (community of over 1200 bigfish ex-forum members ). We are #5 popular developer in this community with ~40000 page views and over 1100 comments. Subsequent fine tuning based on audience feedback ensure game is up to the adventure hidden object lovers expectations! And we run till last Xmas.Sadly fund was all over and we hit the crisis wall!  Darkarta just got nominated few days back for 'Game Connection America Development Awards' 2017 in 3 categories - Best Casual Game, Best Desktop/Downloadable and Most Creative & Original by Legendary Jury members! The Finalists will be declared on Mar 1 during the Game Connection Event at AT&T Park, San Francisco. But we don't even have the fund to take part in Game Connection America :( The crowd funding campaign is to complete the PC build launch this month and subsequent launches of Mac, Linux & 6 language builds(English, French, German, Japanese, Spanish & Portuguese).From our side we assure that every single $ you spent on this campaign will be utilized only for project goals! And if you all are with us we can catch our dream star stretch goals!DARKARTA: DEATH, LOVE & LIFE BEYOND...The dream sequel is all about ""Love"" in an untold unheard dimension! It was supposed for 2017 Xmas but fears need to be postponed due to our severe fund crisis!

The crew is now switching to service side projects till we have enough funds to complete all our dreams!  Darkarta was our dream project, and just because of this burning passion we got few International, national awards till date!  If funding goals are not met, it will take so much more time to catch our dream  stars! Pls support team tuttifrutti by pledging any perk/amount you found suitable.

PC steam build we so much wish to launch this month end. And Mac, 6 language builds and Linux by March 30th. iPad, iPhone and Android builds we aim for May 30th. All our deadlines depends on whether we could raise funds from Indiegogo, else it will be pushed till we have the needed funds.
Sequel project story/design pipeline was all set for Xmas 2017 launch but in current financial circumstances don't know when it will happen!

We request you to give Darkarta project a supportive push by pledging a perk which caught your interest. And pls share this crowdfunding campaign  in your facebook, twitter and other social circles. If you've any other questions, please mail me at ajish@tuttifrutti.in.

More than the monetary value, every backer is a big morale booster for tuttifrutti these days, a candle light in the dark tunnel for our crew who started this long journey 4 years back!!  And your all moral promo support in social circles is invaluable for us as this will help us catch our dream stars one day....
