0,"

Who we are:  

At Sanctuary Game Studios, we like making games. It's as easy as that. But this game is something special to us, because we really wanted to make something that our friends and family could use to help building up good brushing habits with their kids.

Our game, Tooth, does just that. You would create your character, clean and take care of it, and watch it grow with you. We wanted the game to appeal to kids, but also remain as a useful tool for parents who are not at home but still want to help their children build healthy habits to take care of their teeth.

We are aiming to release our game in January in the United States and Europe for Android and iOS. But that is for starters. Every child should be able to brush their Tooth in their own language, and this money would help to doing just that!
We are at 90% of the game now, with android release on Sunday and ios 2 weeks from then.
Over the past few months though, we've been going through different proofs of concepts, toying with different ideas, and most importantly making sure we do the research right!

As you play, your Tooth would have 11 different states of whiteness, 5 different stages of decay, 6 possible different eye sets, 10 different expressions, and around 9 different outfits. In order to take care of your tooth, you would need to use the toothbrush with toothpaste, floss, and use mouthwash in the right order. Even the outfits themselves change the world around you. The dental mask gives you a permanent discount on in-game items when worn. The kitty hat unlocks the kitty expression. The ninja outfit turns the background into stars and curled dragons.

With the push notification system, the Tooth would remind you when you need to take care of it, gradually becoming on key with your own brushing habits. With Tooth, we are gamifying brushing your teeth and making it an adventure that would last a lifetime.
The reason we are doing this campaign is to raise awareness and funds for better advertising with Tooth.

The money though would be split under to categories with our game. We are going be releasing Tooth in the beginning of January for North America and Europe, with starting languages of English, Spanish and French. Our advertising budget is then split between the two regions, 50/50.

The 20,000 USD that we are aiming for would help pay for a month of advertising, with a split budget of 10k per region. We would be able to continue the advertising campaign after those three months ourselves, if the worst case scenario happens with us.

Out of the remaining 20,000 USD - 75% of that would be aimed at bringing more languages for our users faster. This would also let us gamify brushing your Tooth in more ways than before. More expressions for instance, or have it so that when you visit a dentist, they can take care of your in-game Tooth as well!

The remaining 25% would let us pay for development costs, like better music and sound effects for the game, more ui/ux testing to make sure it feels just right, and of course making sure that the team can keep giving it 120%.
We can't do a campaign and not offer you something in return.
*The Specialize the Game Perk allows you to customize the game as a gift for a loved one or child. You can have the following things changed in this version, such as:
• Leaving a special note in the about page.
• Having a custom set of eyes and facial expressions that would show at various stages of whiteness.
• Having a special splash screen for your loved one to see every time they open the game.
• A special costume that is only available in your version of the game.
• Having your Tooth game released in a different language ahead of our time frame.
The following perks are Branding Opportunities for Businesses:
These for Perks are split between the North America (NA) and Europe (EU) releases.

For the 10k perks, when selected, your brand becomes the ""Pharmacy"" that players will go to in order to purchase items, accessories, and points. If you are a dentist as well, this allows you to also place your name under the Dentist bar, as well as a link in the ""About"" scene regarding your Dentistry office or chain. This form of branding will last 3 years from release in the either North America and Europe.

The 40k perks are aimed at larger companies or businesses. Do you have a brand of toothbrush, toothpaste, floss, or mouthwash? By selecting this perk, for either North America or Europe, your brand will be used by players and replace the stock equipment in game. In addition to that, the game in the zone of release would also have a splash screen of Sponsored by _______, and information regarding your brand in the ""About"" scene. Finally, during the duration of this perk, we can change or add different types of toothbrush, toothpaste, floss, or mouthwash to promote new products you have.
This form of gamifying your brand will last 5 years.
What happens if the goal isn't reached?

If by the end of the campaign we didn't reach our entire goal, we would still be releasing the game in the beginning of January. The money that remains would go to paying for advertisement, first and foremost. If we fall between 60k and 80k though, we would make sure that we use the money for paying people to translate, and keep on testing the game so we can keep the ball going.

The Impact

One of the biggest inequalities in life is Education, and at Sanctuary Game Studios, we believe we can help change that. When we were coming up with this game, we wanted to make something that would gamify education for children, as well as build and reinforce hygiene skills.

As it stands now, a majority of people that have access to the internet now in the world use handheld devices. With the money that we are asking to be pledged to help us advertise we can spread Tooth worldwide faster.

With our advertising campaign, we are putting the money at 25% to Facebook and 75% to Youtube to hit our markets directly. At 20k a month, that would mean that we can be showing our campaign to almost 400k people a month. With a conversion rate of 30% for Ads to App download average, we would be at around 125k registered app downloads a month. But then again, not everyone sticks around when they download a new game, which means that we have a 55% conversion rate of downloads to Monthly Active Users, or MAU for short. That leaves us with almost 68,750 monthly active users for the first month, almost 137,500 MAU the second month, and 206k monthly active users the third month.

This isn't taking in account the decline of monthly active users over a course of 4 months, and this isn't our best case scenario either. But what this information tells us though, is that we can reach our goal of universalizing education that much closer with your help!

Challenges and bumps on the road

The biggest challenge we faced so far in making the game was finding the right people to put the game together with a shoestring budget. We didn't want to make a game that is just another flappy bird clone, but instead something that we can look at and say, ""Creativity isn't dead!"" So over the dozens of different revisions, and versions that we made for this game, this was the one that stood out.

And as it stands now, we are at 50% to completion. The main gameplay is done, with bits and pieces still missing from the art and sound fx. The background doesn't move as it should, the sprites aren't behaving right, but this isn't our first rodeo either with making games. And I'm confident we can make it to the 29th with the game pretty much done, and then ready for release come early January.

Not everyone can help contribute to us, but that is okay. I would say keep in tune with this page and our website, because we do have a couple of contests that will happen during the campaign. Also, if you tweet, then #Tooth and #ToothGame. Or just help us make as much noise about the game, because this is going to be one of the top 10 games for kids next year.

join up with other players to share in a  battle with, or against, the corrupted
government called S.I.C. On your adventure, you will face many challenges like:
huge bosses, epic battles, enthralling quest lines, and much more. As soon as
you set forth on your journey, you will begin making your mark upon the Realm
will you be Good? I don't know, I think you might be Neutral. No, WAIT! You are
definitely EVIL! You get to have a say in which path you take, be the sweet
angel of goodness, the lazy ass of neutrality or the coldness of evil. It’s
your choice, so make it already!

column2: you will have an amazing adventure in the world of

column1: Tainted Realm.  Be prepared to laugh, cry and get mad!  Tainted Realm
will steal your heart and your imagination.
Storyline:                                                           A dramatic scene unfolds in Tainted
character whose world is at peace. Suddenly, her world takes a dark turn when
someone arrives to tell her that the Realm is in danger and she has to fight.
Along her journey, she meets some amazing people who quickly become
friends and trusted companions in the middle of battle.  She finds love, but
it’s not easy love.  This love could put their lives in even more danger.
More and more villages and towns are being raided and put under the thumb
of the S.I.C.  Our group of heroes struggle to focus on the main goal of
their journey, as people pull on them to help in other life threatening
situations.  Do they stop to help, or do they pass on by with the greater
goal in mind?  In Tainted Realm, you will read about creatures and places
that you have yet to imagine.  You will meet all the classes and learn
skills from every town and city, just as our Hero and her companions do in the
story.  Tainted Realm is a story of adventure, love, sacrifice, betrayal,
revenge and loyalty.  You’ll want to know what happens to each and every
character and you’ll find yourself immersed in their world of adventure and
Didn't your mom ever tell you not to play with a stranger’s pets? I mean
really, you never know if that cute looking pet may actually turn out to be a
ferocious, flesh eating mushroom. Ain't lying, I learned the hard way! What do
you think happened to my finger? Well, try your hand at pet breeding. You can
breed just about anything. Keep in mind
column2: you might not want to abandon that

column1: ugly thing, for it might just be that super rare pet that will either haunt you
forever or save your ass in battle!  In case you were wondering, all classes can have and breed pets. Now, I know
there are some non-pet lovers out there. Just see it like this: they might run
errands for you, pick up loot, or just be cute and cuddly. I even see some of
you using them as bait for bosses or your
scape goat as you run for your lives.
But seriously, whether you choose to
breed, own, or sell your pets,  we want you to have a blast, dang it!
Don't forget to pick up ""treats"" at the black market
enhanced pets. I mean, what..? That’s illegal... Be on your way to greatness.
How would you like a special little place you can call home? Tainted Realm is happy to announce
that we will have personal dwellings for your enjoyment. How about an upgrade
for bigger dwellings? Everything from apartments and cabins to houses and mansions
will be available!! Which would you like to call your home?
want you to feel like this world is all yours. Not like the guy living next to
you. We will be providing all the décor you could possibly need in a multitude

Traveling around the Realm, you’ll find yourself needing to
restock your supplies or find that special part you need to create your next
weapon.  You’ll head on in to town and find the Black Market kiosk.
This machine will open a world of trade to you.  Buy or sell, and gain
all that you hope for.  You won’t have any trouble finding what you need,
just type it in... no need to spell it correctly
items shown in a column.  Starting from those closing soon, all the way
down to those most recently added to the Black Market.  It’s dealing made simple
The Emporium is the biggest Mall in all of Tainted Realm.
Well actually it’s the only mall.  It’s glitz and glam for your characters enjoyment.  Fashion and

column2: weapons, materials and mounts.  You’ll find everything you need

column1: for life in Tainted Realm.  There’s no dealing here though, the price tag
seldom changes.  You pay for the glitz and glam.  If you want it
enough, then you’ll find a way to pay.  Dig deep into your pockets so you
can plan ahead for that next house party or fashion battle.

I am the badass. Need me to save
you? Take all those hits and be your prince in shining armor? Well, shove off.
I come from Fortify, the hidden stronghold. Seriously though, do not mess with me. I am a freaking paladin. I got

RAWR!! Ignore the egomaniac. Can I

Please feel free to visit my home in New Forest.
Yeah, you really heard the rattles
of bones. Meet me, the Deadeye from BoneYard. Unlike them, I like to be ranged
and use things like bows and small magic. Want to see something cool? Look, all
my arrows are made from bone, that's from a thigh bone, this is from deer

limit what Mr. Macho and Mr. Furball over there have to keep away from me.
Oh, do you think I'm beautiful?
Well, I should be. I do magic. This means unlike these dimwits, I am the best
mage around, a prophet. I stand in the background and amaze all with my power
as multitudes fall before me. Sunken Cove is my home. Feel free to find it.
Oh yeah, my bad, meet my counterpart
Mr. Shaman. You need him. Although, all that lazy ass does is sit on the ground

so visit if you ever get near.
Grunt, well no team is complete
without me. Forget Mr. Paladin and others. Watch! Are you impressed? I'm a

shit, but I even fight with my
claws. I know awesome, right? Feel free to visit my home in the
pit. Yeah, you  know it baby! I'm from Ground Zero.
Ewww, reeks of death? That's what
you’re thinking right? Dead on. I'm a Necromancer.
Visit my corpse collection in Haunted Island. One day when these fools die, my
kids will play with their corpses. Yeah, got a death reaper scythe, what you
Boo?  Ahh, poor poor thing, did
I scare you? I'm a ninja. My home lies far away in the Temple Ruins. I
specialize in poofing! Ok, sounds uncool,
but yeah I said it. Need someone
to sneak around, I'm your man. But about the whole fighting thing.. I think
imma stay in the background with my cool throwing stars, daggers, and brass
Bang, your dead. Sorry buddy, the
shadows are mine. I'm a joker
if you’re looking for me, DON'T!
But, some of my familiar haunts are in Metropolitan. I specialize in pistols,
cudgels, and knives. I prefer not to be seen at all. If I work with others, I can easily identify and remove
Well guys, see this mismatched team?
Choose your favorite and do your thing! Own it and make it yours! Welcome to
Imagine being able to do the normal
game customizations but with great depth. Take 5 people in a row in an MMO and
3 out of the 5 look the same. This INFURIATES
me! Has anyone felt this way? Here at Tainted  that’s what we want!  Complete control of what our characters
look like.  You can make one arm longer than the other, put a third eye in
the middle of your forehead.  Look as real to life or as anime as a
cartoon.  Implants, scars, tattoo’s are just some of the details that you
will be able to use to create your ideal character.  Height, weight, skin
colour, class.  Our default looks will be as varied as we can create, just
so your imagination can take over and make changes that pop into your mind.
What if you want to be a Archer that looked human or robotic?  You
can, you can look any way you choose.  You don’t have to be bound to one
kind of physical appearance, or one kind of clothing.  Your totally
customizable character can dress in any kind of style you dream of.  You
want to look like a Knight or a cyberpunk dancer?.. go for it.  You want
to look like a goth or emo?... it shall be so.  You like the designs on
that male character’s pants?  Well you can wear them too, no matter if you’re male or female.
what S.I.C. stands for.  Imagine FBI, CIA, Army and Government liaisons,
all rolled into one and as evil as can be.  There is no justice under the
watch of the S.I.C.  Their leader is ruthless and cold hearted.  He
will stop at nothing to achieve world domination!

As we sit here and drool from the

mouth, we continue to work on

This is the signature of our Nick,
and it wouldn’t be a meeting without hearing that funny send-off.

this is why we have come to Indiegogo, where we can go directly to the people

The Sanctuary of Grace Mobile Chapel

We are currently in the beginning stages of developing a mobile ministry to the truck drivers of America. They keep our great country moving through their hard work and long hours. I have driven for over 20 years, running long haul, local, and dedicated. With over 3 million miles behind me, I know the loss of not having a home church. Our goal is to develop a network of mobile chapels that will minister at the same truck stops in a small area, all having the same Christ centered beliefs and teaching, and then link them all together on the web so that drivers will be able to find a mobile chapel near where they will be stopping. Though we will be many small chapels we are all still part of the same church. Please keep us in your prayers while we get this project under way.

There are 650 Pilot Flying J travel centers, 250 TA – Petro travel centers, and 140 Love’s travel stops. One trucking website says that there are over 2300 truck stops in the lower 48 states, and less then 5% of them have on site chapels. Many of them do have churches that come in on Sunday and hold a short service, but they just come in for a short time and then leave.

What I am proposing is mobile chapels that can go to 3 to 5 truck stops a week, and spend all day ministering to a much larger group of drivers and the traveling public. If one mobile chapel can cover 3 to 5 truck stops a week, and minister to as many as 100 or more drivers, with 200 mobile chapels we can minister to over 10,000 drivers a week. All of the chapels will be linked over the internet, with their locations and times posted so that the drivers can plan their stops where a chapel is. We plan to make all of our messages available on line for free down load. I know that this will not happen over night, but I just wanted to share the scope of my vision with you.

This beginning of this project will be in 5 steps.

1. Obtaining our 501c (3) and creating the legal entity.

2. Converting our motor home into a mobile chapel.

3. Acquiring the necessary recording equipment, so that we can post all of the messages on line.

4. Creating the website and mobile app for the ministry.

5. Funding for the first month(s) of ministry.

Steps 1 thru 4 will cost approximately $4500 to $6000.

Step 5 will cost between $7500 and $10,000 a month.

Our first funding goal is $5000.00+ for getting everything ready to go.

Our second funding goal is $8000.00+ for the first month of ministry.

Our third and final funding goal will be $30,000.00 for 4+ months of ministry.

By God's Grace,

Johnnie and Karen Amberson

Back at it again! The Ambras Court and Hunting Playing Cards
Please don't forget to check out the contest at the end of the story.
A bit about me and my company Guinevere’s Games

Hi everyone! As my title suggests I am back at the fundraising again for two sets of historical playing cards again! This time I want to make the Ambras Court Hunting Deck and the Ambras Court Deck. This campaign is to help raise funds for the licensing agreement of both playing cards.
****Update**** Exciting news! I am working on Downloading the artwork right now!
****Update****  Just waiting on the artwork to send to the printers now.
**Updated**  The museum has a signed contract by me to produce the playing cards. Now I need your help with the funding for the images I am still short of my goal .

This is exciting news for me. But the licensing rights are going to be expensive though around $3.000 Canadian (with exchange rate) to pay for the exclusive rights to legally produce both decks of these playing cards.

Let me tell you a little bit about myself. My name is Jeanette Dunnett and I am a proud owner of a small company that opened their doors to the world in April 2013. I call myself Guinevere’s Games.  I am a company that produces small batches of handcrafted historical board games from many centuries, from the Roman times to the renaissance. I have been working hard to make rule books and game boards for card games
column2: I also make board games, playing cards and dice games. I am a very small company and it is just me doing all the work from marketing to selling, manufacturing and everything in between.

column1: The Ambras Court Deck and the Ambras Hunting Deck, are playing cards that are from the mid 15th century. These playing cards are currently on display at the KHM Museum in Vienna, Austria. I contacted the museum to see if they would be willing to give me rights to produce sets of these playing cards for the history enthusiast or the living history enactor to use at living history events.

column5: >Once again these cards are NOT going to be collector’s cards, they are meant for everyday use. If you want the collector’s editions you can purchase them directly from the KHM website. The collector’s editions are the version that Piatnik made for the KHM Museum.

column1: This is where you come in, I am hoping that you can help me come up with a portion of the $3,000 Canadian dollars to help pay for licensing agreement and ***Updated*** now production of the cards.

I am  offering some of my company’s products up as perks. Some of the products includes  Twelve Man Morris, (also known as Mills), Corner the Rabbit, and lastly Alquerque board games.  These are leather board games, the Alquerque is made from wood.
The games of Noddy (plays similar to modern day cribbage) and Cribbage (with the original rules from the 1600’s when the game was invented).
The Moorish Playing cards a deck of playing cards from the early 1400’s), and a few of the sets of the Flemish Hunting Deck of playing cards.

As well as printed versions of the Alfonso X Book of Dice games, and some print version of the Book of card games from Francis Willughby. The rules in these books are my version of the rules based on historical manuscripts.
You can go to my website to get the descriptions of the games offered. Any games awarded through this campaign will be shipped at the end of the campaign. My website is www.guineveresgames.ca.
If you want to get more than one perk there are two ways of claiming the second perk:
• You can make two separate contributions one for each perk.

column2: contribute the amount for the second perk and send me a comment or a message.

column1: Run down of the Perks (including worldwide Shipping)
• Set of any three rule booklets  - Pledge $8.00
**** Please note that if you want more than one perk, I will combine into one parcel.
Please note the peg colors may vary

column1: The Playing cards I am trying to produce
Here are some pictures of the cards that I am looking to get licensing for.

column2: >
column8: s=882319d0ebdeeaebe13b73a7b1af28e6"" src="""" style=""""/>

column1: Here is the link to the see the full set of the Ambra hunting deck.
These are the specs for the playing cards I am producing:
• The cards are being printed on modern day 300 gsm coated playing card stock
• Deck size is poker card size (standard playing card size)
• Deck will come with a metal storage case

I am choosing to use the modern day playing card stock for ease of use, As well as, for durability of the playing cards for everyday use. The poker deck card size is also for ease of use. Playing cards with Tarot sized cards is more difficult due to the size of the card.
The original sizes of these cards are very large, and difficult to hold in the hand. I tested the theory because I own the Piatnik edition of both sets of the Ambras Playing Cards

The deck for the court hunting deck will contain 56 playing cards. I am modifying two of the playing cards to make the deck usable for playing card games with. The missing two of hounds suit and the 8 of hawks/falcons will be added back into the deck to make this a fully functioning deck

I hope that you are able to help me towards my goal, and help me grow my company. Thank you for taking the time to read through my campaign, and thank you for stopping by. I hope that you have a great day!

Risks and challenges

The two challenges I see for my project are time and production. I say time because I am working with an overseas museum that I may have to ship the documents through the mail to, and over seas mailing takes time.

The production challenge I have solved. I have found a printer that I can print on demand for the project that I am working on. They can print on the paper that I need them to print on. If I cannot use these printers, I have found an additional printer that I can use to print the cards as well. But the paper choice will have to change.

Indiegogo provides me with a way to track who shares my link
and the how much they have earned in referral contributions.
to count as a referrer, you must log in to your Indiegogo account and share my campaign with Indiegogo’s share
otherwise, your unique ID won’t be attached to any resulting contributions or
you are logged into you account and use Indiegogo’s share tools to send

You can make two separate contributions one for each perk.

The Playing cards I am trying to produce
Here are some pictures of the cards that I am looking to get licensing for.
The Playing Cards!Here is the link to see the Ambras Court Cards
Here is the link to the see the full set of the Ambra hunting deck.
These are the specs for the playing cards I am producing:
The cards are being printed on modern day 300 gsm coated playing card stock
Full color printed on both sides
Deck size is poker card size (standard playing card size)
Deck will come with a metal storage case

I am choosing to use the modern day playing card stock for ease of use, As well as, for durability of the playing cards for everyday use. The poker deck card size is also for ease of use. Playing cards with Tarot sized cards is more difficult due to the size of the card.
The original sizes of these cards are very large, and difficult to hold in the hand. I tested the theory because I own the Piatnik edition of both sets of the Ambras Playing Cards

The deck for the court hunting deck will contain 56 playing cards. I am modifying two of the playing cards to make the deck usable for playing card games with. The missing two of hounds suit and the 8 of hawks/falcons will be added back into the deck to make this a fully functioning deck

I hope that you are able to help me towards my goal, and help me grow my company. Thank you for taking the time to read through my campaign, and thank you for stopping by. I hope that you have a great day!

Risks and challengesThe two challenges I see for my project are time and production. I say time because I am working with an overseas museum that I may have to ship the documents through the mail to, and over seas mailing takes time.The production challenge I have solved. I have found a printer that I can print on demand for the project that I am working on. They can print on the paper that I need them to print on. If I cannot use these printers, I have found an additional printer that I can use to print the cards as well. But the paper choice will have to change.Referral  Contest

0,"

                               Mammoth Gaming

My name is Jacob Wall and I am a student studying management information systems at the University of Akron. Mammoth Gaming is an idea and a dream created by two of my peers and myself. The plan is to eventually become a respectable and competitive esports team, but we lack the funds to begin our journey.

What We Need

We are looking for any funding we can acquire. These funds will be used for the development and running of Mammoth Gaming. This includes creating our website, travel expenses, and venue fees. Mammoth Gaming has potential players interested in representing our name and logo, but we need something to offer them in return. These players are extremely talented and dedicated and are sure to compete at a high level. Mammoth Gaming wants to be a name people look out for in the future.

We have hardworking players and managers who are willing to focus on facing any challenges. We will keep moving upwards towards greatness and never settle. One challenge we might face is remaining competitive, but with practice and dedication our players will look to perform at a high level every chance they get.

Our Mission Statement

Mammoth Gaming, formed in February of 2015, strives to
create an iconic gaming brand and will work to increase the reputation of both
the name and the players. By showing dedication and seizing opportunities as
they emerge, Mammoth Gaming hopes to be a name our players can wear with pride.
We will seek players who are dedicated and talented to find success in a way
that benefits both parties. Our future goal is to be recognized and respected
across the globe, and to positively represent our partners, players, and

sponsors once acquired.


Every bit of funding is greatly appreciated. Please help spread the word and follow us on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/Mammothesports

column3:
>An eSports Organization

     iLL Gaming was founded as a community for competitive gamers across the Xbox One platform. Starting in 2012, our community took flight in the early Halo and Call of Duty scenes. As a community, our goal has always been to achieve one thing: Bring Gamers Together. With successions such as the Xbox One, iLL Gaming has transitioned into a competitive eSports sponsor across the Xbox One platform. Since our transition, we have not lost sight of our goal, and have brought together and developed some great teams along the way!


     Currently, our pinnacle is Team EnTitlement, iLL Gaming's newest and strongest team on Rainbow Six: Siege. Its members are spread throughout the U.S. and Canada, although you'd never know it...With strong team chemistry and powerful communication, you would think they are roommates. iLL Gaming is proud to sponsor one of the iLLest teams in the game.

     We help support the teams we sponsor in more ways than one. Many sponsors pursue a hands off approach and allow for the team to work itself out, but iLL Gaming takes on a completely different perspective. We believe in keeping a team happy and the morale up, providing anything and everything they need to take on the next level of gaming. Whether it be for LANs or for online tourneys, nothing is more important than to bring a team together in unity. Helping our players develop skills through specialized drills is key to creating the iLLest. Sometimes it isn't easy, and sometimes you play with the cards you are dealt. But nothing has stopped us from molding great teams into iLL teams.

     iLL Gaming only pursues the mature, respectful, and influential gamers
column4:
because there's more to eSports than winning. Our teams don't go with the flow, they revolutionize it. As eSports is still fresh with its clean boots on the ground, the expectations are high to set an example. Do you have what it takes to be the iLLest?!

     Why is our goal set at $1,000?

column1: • We need to keep our website online
• We need to help our teams buy-in to online tournaments
• We need to support our teams with gear and incentives
• We need to spread brand-awareness through product giveaways
• We just need that little boost to get our Org to the next level
• We need YOU to join us in supporting the iLLest gamers out there!

If we fail to reach our goal, all of the funds will go towards developing stronger teams so that they can take on the next level of competitive gaming. Anything helps! If you are unable to donate, that is OK!

Other ways to help:
• Visit our website at www.iLLgaming.us !

>My story

My name is Damir Tudić,I'm 16 years old.I come from Rijeka,a city in Croatia.I do 3D modeling and programing for about 3 years and for the last 3

months I'm working on my first game.This game was originally made for some sort of contest in Unreal engine 4 called ""Unreal GameJam"" but I

column1: decided to finish it but I have some problems with further development of this game because I work on a unsuitable and old computer I also need
some professional softwares for modeling and programing...etc. All stuff that I made until now is made with the free tools and I can't continue
the development of this game on a higher level with those free tools.All the things that you can see are made by me in Unreal engine 4.All I need
is a professional equipment,a new computers and a professional softwares and I don't have the money for all of that.If I get what I asked for I am
planning to open a Game development studio until my 18th birthday.I am not able to give some big perks except my game when it's finished and also some extra special vehicles.
Current version of the game has 3 vehicles and I'am currently working on a 4th vehicle. Finished version of the game will have around 15 vehicles.
Current version of the game has only 1 world but final game will have around 10 worlds or more.

• What is Rotten Core?
• We Need Your Help

column9: >Hello! Thank you for stopping by our campaign. We are Team Aiduzzi, a small group of artist and developers. We're working on Rotten Core, an original old-school 2D fighting game that revels in the bizarre and the grotesque. The game has a motley case of characters that are sure to delight anyone who has even a passing interest in the dark and offbeat. The style of Rotten Core blends elements of horror and comedy, and the result is a fighting game that is at once unsettling and funny. The idea of this game has been in progress for a long time. Our team has had the opportunity to collect tons of feedback, which we have incorporated into our plans little by little. Although we have just four characters right now (Ella, Ubu, Giano, and Kuando), we have plans for many more. Our ultimate goal is to publish Rotten Core for PC so it will be available on Steam and if we meet certain stretch goals, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. We would love to have Rotten Core on all of these platforms so that the maximum number of people are able to play and enjoy it.

column1: game is in collaboration with Elecbyte, the studio that made the M.U.G.E.N
engine. We're working on a new engine to optimize and run
Rotten Core at its full potential on many more platforms as possible.
Core is an old school 2D fighting game. We've been reliving the good
old days to bring you something you could find in a 90's coin op arcade.
But also you'll find modern and sophisticated 2D sprites graphic arts
and animations as well as original gameplay features.
unusual mood of the game, especially our characters. They are not
classic heroes and in fact, they don't want to be heroes. Their skills in
game and their story tell that they are “villains”. Rotten Core has a wicked and
grotesque fashion that makes it different from other fighting games.
You'll never find a “hero who fights for honor”.
There are no “martial arts tournaments”. Here you'll find only
ROTTEN scoundrels, consumed by an inextinguishable destructive madness!

column2: >We have created four completely unique characters during the very little off time we could find in between our work and home life. By helping us reach our funding goal we can spend a full time commitment to Rotten Core’s development and also bring in other talented artist and programmers into our development circle.
column5: >Our funding model is all or nothing otherwise known as fixed funding. We believe this is the best type of funding for our project since if we do not meet our goal, all of the funds will go back to their respective backers.
column8: >We were able to bring you four unique characters in the little allotted
column9: > time that we had over the past several years. Just imagine how awesome we can make the new characters if we can devote full time! With your donations we can bring an amazing addition to the fighting game world.

column1: Rotten Core follows the story of Ubu Vagrante, a lonely,
insignificant man who is as unmemorable to others as he is unremarkable to
himself. One night, while walking along a city street, he hears a noise coming
from an alleyway, and despite his usual cowardice, is drawn to the dim corner
where he finds a box nestled between two corpses. When he opens it, inside he
finds a strange organ that is anything but human, and is overcome by an impulse

After he consumes the organ, called loboeucarixtus, it transforms him from a weak individual into a virile, amoral, violent, hedonistic, all-powerful being. Going forward, Ubu will fight anyone simply for the sake of fighting.
column4: > For each character in the game, it is the consumption of the loboeucarixtus

column1: that gives them the power and personality that it takes to make them worthy of

Ubu is an arsonist obsessed with blowing things up. His style is sloppy and he is prone to losing his train of thought, sometimes even falling asleep while he is standing. However he is still a versatile fighter. He uses his hands as guns and that’s quite literal, as he can hit opponents either from close range with high explosive punches, or from long range with powerful cannon shots and bursts of “machine gun fire”.

Ella’s mysterious origins are known only to Ubu. Her power is held inside the disturbing objects that she carries, most notably, her slimy, talking teddy bear known as ‘Trauma’. Her fighting style is unpredictable, as these objects will burst forth from where they are hidden inside her body. Most notable of these hidden objects is Trauma himself, who is also heavily armed.

Giano is Ubu’s brother. Tortured by bipolar disorder and schizophrenia, he is prone to violent and unprovoked attacks, and is believed to be haunted by more than one-hundred entities. He looks old, but his punches are heavy. Giano's gameplay is focused on combos, and his moves involve launchers that devastate opponents, especially from close range.

Kuando is a dirty street boxer with no empathy, who loves to make anyone he can suffer as much as possible. Though he is constantly dressed in a motorcycle outfit, as far as anyone can tell, he does not own a motorcycle. His unorthodox style uses 3 different stances to cover short, middle and long distances, and he is both versatile and deadly.
In addition to our original four characters, Ubu, Kuando, Giano and Ella, funding will be used to add the following rotten bunch to the game.
Perro is one of Ubu’s bodyguards. With an unrequited crush
on the mysterious Ella, this wrestler on a constant masochistic bent,
seeks out pain in his underwear and suspenders while dishing out a flurry of sadomasochistic throws.

LSD is a psychiatrist based out of the Asylum where Giano was formerly committed. Though bound by a straitjacket, his feet are a deadly force, and he counterbalances this situation by using his flexible and highly evasive body along with lethal kicks and sharpened teeth.

Enda Ashisa is a ninja, and Persian mercenary bomber. She has not eaten the loboeucarixtus, but rather, has been hired to retrieve it. Filled with self-loathing, she is an expert fighter with a gift for speed, who uses a plethora of traps and explosives to confuse her opponent.

Zatto is another mercenary hired by the Yakuza to retrieve the loboeucarixtus, and therefore he has not eaten it either. He's called (and feared as) “The Human Rock”. If you don't fear his slowness, you'll get a character with a lot of powerful stun attacks that can easily destroy his opponent.
Rotten Core has many well designed features and graphics that give the game a unique and colorful overall look, whilst still paying homage to the design of classic fighting games.
*Handmade dynamic lights on characters bodies, Some special moves have that dynamic lights effect
2. Animated stages
column7: > that move and breathe during gameplay.

column1: 3. All New HD E

column4: >4. Engaging Story Mode
column7: > - Follow the story of your character

column1: 5. Arcade Mode - Play rounds upon rounds of tournament style fights.
6. Training Mode -  Learn the ins and outs of favorite characters and their moves.
7. Tag Mode - Pick a partner and tag them at will during a match

Pressing a specified button allows each character to perform his own peculiar moves. Every character has his own distinctive move which can be an evasive one, an attacking one or maybe a move useful for a combo startup... or maybe something else!
Some special moves can be enhanced with a little amount of the power meter bar
Each character has some powerful Super Moves called Rotten Arts. They can be performed at the cost of one power meter bar segment.
Each character has some very devastating Super Moves called Uber Rotten Arts. They can be performed at the cost of two power meter bar segments.
5. Cross Impact (CI), Perfect Cross Impact (PCI) and Cross Charge Reaction (CCR)  (Check out the trailer above for an example)

Cross Impact (CI) and Perfect Cross Impact (PCI) System is a new kind of mechanics in a Beat’em’up.  When you are in a difficult situation, you can now try to defend with an attack! Some attacks have auto guard impact properties which can transform a defense into a lethal opening window for an attack. Maybe a devastating combo! But don’t think that it will be easy! Your opponent can react with a Cross Charge Reaction (CCR). Every CCR brings each character to an unique spectacular scene where two fighters challenge each other (every character has a different reaction with each opponent that he(or she) fights!) with the result of charging their power meters. So CI, PCI and CCR are a technical and spectacular new system to attack an opponent and also defend yourself from him!
6- Madness Power Bar  (added for Rotten Core: Purple Pain Edition)
Each character has an extra own power meter used for new powerful special ESM.
7- End of the World (EOTW)
column4: >(added for Rotten Core: Purple Pain Edition)
>Each character can cause the end of the world with an ultra devastating final blow which instantly kill the opponent.

>Team Aiduzzi has hand drawn and coded Ella, Ubu, Giano, and Kuando on our own. As stated previously, with your donations we will bring in additional coders and ""spriters"" to assist us full time. If we reach our funding goal of $87,000 the following features will be added to the complete game at their respective costs.

column1: Includes all character sprite art, portrait art, programming, voice over, balancing and etc.

M.U.G.E.N Engine Optimization ($5,000) - Optimizing the source code of M.U.G.E.N to correspond even better with Rotten Core and characters. We will also add new features to M.U.G.E.N that are custom made for Rotten Core.
If we surpass our initial funding goal of $87,000, the following stretch goals will be added to the final Rotten Core game!
$103,000 development of Rotten Core for PlayStation Network
$119,000 development of Rotten Core for Xbox One
$169,000 GGPO  - GGPO middle-ware helps minimize any issues with lag when players fight each other online.
In addition to the previously mentioned Rotten lineup, we have four more characters that can come to life with your help!

column8: >Imperia is a young mistress who prior to eating the organ was a washed-up stripper, and even now has a love for Perro that is un-reciprocated. She is a killer both on and off the pole, and an acrobatic wrestler who can summon her personal tool of the trade to do some lethal attacks.

column1: Embargo is the only character to retain his original features after eating the loboeucarixtus. Known as “The Cursed,” he is haunted by a pink unicorn. He can throw devastating black flames that consume anything in their path, however, the unicorn often tries to assist him by replacing his deadly attacks with colorful rainbows and lovely little stars.

The Man with The Hammer is a white-collar worker who, unbeknownst to himself, works as a hitman while he is unconscious. Wrongly believing himself to be unlucky, he is a master with his talking hammer and leads an otherwise quiet life. Initially appearing to be weak and defenseless, his hammer can change his personality, making him a very disturbing and dangerous fighter.

Fortuna is a self destructive girl who has nearly reached immortality. An autophagist, bulimic, and a cannibal, she enjoys suffering and fights mostly with cutlery that can be controlled as she wishes, to set up many traps. She enjoys launching herself at her opponent and summoning her cutlery to do damage both to her opponent and herself. These skills make her a perfect zone fighter.

And at $174,000 we will be bringing to you Rotten Core Purple Pain: A new addition to the Rotten Core story that focuses on the feared Embargo! An enhanced version of Rotten Core with a new and more intense part of the story, all 12 characters and new NPCs, new gameplay features (Madness power bar,  End of the world), better animations and handmade lights effects.
These are the rewards that will be packaged in various
combinations for supporters. You can check out our reward tier for more
1. PERSONAL THANK YOU - Backers will get a personal thank
you for their contribution and also will be kept up to date on the development
process of Rotten Core. They will also receive a  shoutout on rottencore.net
2. DIGITAL ART PACK - Several campaign exclusive wallpapers
as a Thank You for your donation, a one of the kind post card with amazing
3. EARLY RELEASE COPY OF THE GAME ON STEAM - Steam copy
4. BETA VERSION ACCESS - Get your hands on an early release
5. DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK - A creative mix of blood pumping
tunes for you to blast at your leisure
6. DIGITAL ART BOOK - Features never before seen art for
Rotten Core such as concept art and full colored illustrations of the Rotten
Crew. This book will be jam packed full of rare art goodness! Furthermore,  a digital mini-book containing
some significant frame data for all characters.
7. CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT -  Rock an Indiegogo exclusive
Rotten Core T-shirt that proudly displays how rotten you really are. Style and
design will be of one of the following
8. PHYSICAL CD - The digital soundtrack on a physical CD.
9. VIRTUAL MEETING WITH TEAM AIDUZZI - where you chat with
us about our development process and get a behind the scenes look at Rotten
POSTER AND “XL” POSTER - An exclusive standard size poster or an high quality XL poster.
11. PHYSICAL ART BOOK - A physical art book that we will
print and send to you jam packed with even more exclusive art. The book will
include concept sketches, full color illustrations. If it's not enough for you, there is also a limited edition hardcover artbook (with extra special sketches and other never before seen
artworks done by Aiduzzi). It will be our honor to personally sign this limited edition book with
a special rotten dedication to you.

12. PHYSICAL ART MADE TO ORDER - Team Aiduzzi will draw a custom piece of physical art which can be one of the Rotten Core cast, your own character done in our style, or something else that we can both come up with.

13. NPC (Non Playable Character) - Have us transform you or your original character into a pixel creation featured in one of the stages in Rotten Core! Your character will have a front row seat to brawling mayhem for eternity.
14. FIGHT STICK - A limited fight stick done in Rotten Core fashion. Will be similar to the model below (design is still a W.I.P).
15. APPEAR IN A SPECIAL SCENE - Team Aiduzzi will draw you or your character in a special scene in the game! (L.S.D. will be happy to see you there, we're sure.)
unique handmade (autographed and with the original date when it was
drawn) sketch of Aiduzzi. A very important “piece of history” of
(You can choose what you want, but keep
in mind that they are unique pieces, so each chosen sketch by someone

17. UNIQUE ACTION FIGURE - That's the very last step. An unique sculpture totally handmade by Aiduzzi. This action figure it's a unique piece of art. The base of the sculpture is autographed and reports the original date of creation. We have just 1 piece of it and it will be never reproduced.
Designer, Lead Programmer, Lead Graphic Artist
Team Aiduzzi is small group of talented artists and programmers who came together in our spare time to create something that we love
column2: fighting games. We believe in this project, because we are fighting game fans just like you, who loved the genre so much that we put our blood sweat and tears into code and pixels to bring something exciting to the world.

column1: Every dollar counts, and even if you cannot donate at this time, we ask that you share our campaign on your social media to get the word out to your fellow gamers. Any questions or comments, you can leave them below and we’ll try to answer them as best we can.
Thank you for your support, and for taking the time to read this!

>We estimate about one year of work to reach the final form of Rotten Core. Estimated release is July/August 2017
>2. Is Rotten Core graphics HD?
>Rotten Core combines low res pixel art characters with HD stages and HD explosions. All menus, game intro and comic strips (in the story mode) are HD.
>3. All characters, voices, stages and visual effects (explosions) will be original?
>Yes. We want to draw these ones from scratch
column5: >. All characters are original (we want to fix Ubu and make him original), all voices are original, all stages too. We want to draw new original explosions and replace them or some other, new ones.

column3: >4. Characters are ripped from other games?
>5. M.U.G.E.N is a freeware engine?
>Yes. We are making this game in a collaboration with Elecbyte. We purchased a licensed version of M.U.G.E.N. for commercial use.
>6. Who is Aiduzzi?
>Aiduzzi throughout the M.U.G.E.N. community is a well-know characters and stages creator. Now he's rising up a team to develop Rotten Core. It's Team Aiduzzi.
>7. Why aren't you offering a box version of the game?

>We would love to offer a version of the game in box form but  producing a physical box, printing a game manual and burning CDs is too much expensive for a small indipendent software house as actually Team Aiduzzi is. We are very sorry.
>8. Why is the PS4/Xbox One version of the game a stretch goal?

>As stated previously, we would love to offer a console version of the game. Actually making a console version of Rotten Core is very expensive, so we are forced to put PS4/XBOX ONE version of Rotten Core as stretch goals
>9. Does Rotten Core run at 30 or 60fps?
>10. What are the system requirements for Rotten Core?
>We don't yet know the exact numbers, but we can assure that this game will run at 60fps fairly low minimum spec. We'll give you specifics as soon as we know ourselves.
>11. How do you know which  T-shirt I want (Physical Bits for Your Mitts perk)?
>Once the campaign has ended we'll be sending out surveys to find out which T-shirt you'd like.
>12. How do you know which  unique handmade sketch of Aiduzzi I want (Rotten Scoundrel perk)?

>Once the campaign has ended we'll be sending out surveys to find out which sketch you'd like. Keep in mind that they are unique pieces, so each chosed sketch by someone else is gone forever.  Orders shall be settled in chronological order, so if you are interested in this perk, try to donate as soon as possible to have a wider choice.

column1: Hello! Thank you for stopping by our campaign. We are Team Aiduzzi, a small group of artist and developers. We're working on Rotten Core, an original old-school 2D fighting game that revels in the bizarre and the grotesque. The game has a motley case of characters that are sure to delight anyone who has even a passing interest in the dark and offbeat. The style of Rotten Core blends elements of horror and comedy, and the result is a fighting game that is at once unsettling and funny. The idea of this game has been in progress for a long time. Our team has had the opportunity to collect tons of feedback, which we have incorporated into our plans little by little. Although we have just four characters right now (Ella, Ubu, Giano, and Kuando), we have plans for many more. Our ultimate goal is to publish Rotten Core for PC so it will be available on Steam and if we meet certain stretch goals, Xbox One and PlayStation 4. We would love to have Rotten Core on all of these platforms so that the maximum number of people are able to play and enjoy it.
game is in collaboration with Elecbyte, the studio that made the M.U.G.E.N
engine. We're working on a new engine to optimize and run
Rotten Core at its full potential on many more platforms as possible.
Core is an old school 2D fighting game. We've been reliving the good
old days to bring you something you could find in a 90's coin op arcade.
But also you'll find modern and sophisticated 2D sprites graphic arts
and animations as well as original gameplay features.
We push so much on the
unusual mood of the game, especially our characters. They are not
classic heroes and in fact, they don't want to be heroes. Their skills in
game and their story tell that they are “villains”. Rotten Core has a wicked and
grotesque fashion that makes it different from other fighting games.
You'll never find a “hero who fights for honor”.
There are no “martial arts tournaments”. Here you'll find only
ROTTEN scoundrels, consumed by an inextinguishable destructive madness!

We have created four completely unique characters during the very little off time we could find in between our work and home life. By helping us reach our funding goal we can spend a full time commitment to Rotten Core’s development and also bring in other talented artist and programmers into our development circle. Our funding model is all or nothing otherwise known as fixed funding. We believe this is the best type of funding for our project since if we do not meet our goal, all of the funds will go back to their respective backers. We were able to bring you four unique characters in the little allotted time that we had over the past several years. Just imagine how awesome we can make the new characters if we can devote full time! With your donations we can bring an amazing addition to the fighting game world.
Rotten Core follows the story of Ubu Vagrante, a lonely,
insignificant man who is as unmemorable to others as he is unremarkable to
himself. One night, while walking along a city street, he hears a noise coming
from an alleyway, and despite his usual cowardice, is drawn to the dim corner
where he finds a box nestled between two corpses. When he opens it, inside he
finds a strange organ that is anything but human, and is overcome by an impulse

After he consumes the organ, called loboeucarixtus, it transforms him from a weak individual into a virile, amoral, violent, hedonistic, all-powerful being. Going forward, Ubu will fight anyone simply for the sake of fighting. For each character in the game, it is the consumption of the loboeucarixtus
that gives them the power and personality that it takes to make them worthy of

Ubu is an arsonist obsessed with blowing things up. His style is sloppy and he is prone to losing his train of thought, sometimes even falling asleep while he is standing. However he is still a versatile fighter. He uses his hands as guns and that’s quite literal, as he can hit opponents either from close range with high explosive punches, or from long range with powerful cannon shots and bursts of “machine gun fire”.

Ella’s mysterious origins are known only to Ubu. Her power is held inside the disturbing objects that she carries, most notably, her slimy, talking teddy bear known as ‘Trauma’. Her fighting style is unpredictable, as these objects will burst forth from where they are hidden inside her body. Most notable of these hidden objects is Trauma himself, who is also heavily armed.

Giano is Ubu’s brother. Tortured by bipolar disorder and schizophrenia, he is prone to violent and unprovoked attacks, and is believed to be haunted by more than one-hundred entities. He looks old, but his punches are heavy. Giano's gameplay is focused on combos, and his moves involve launchers that devastate opponents, especially from close range.

Kuando is a dirty street boxer with no empathy, who loves to make anyone he can suffer as much as possible. Though he is constantly dressed in a motorcycle outfit, as far as anyone can tell, he does not own a motorcycle. His unorthodox style uses 3 different stances to cover short, middle and long distances, and he is both versatile and deadly.
In addition to our original four characters, Ubu, Kuando, Giano and Ella, funding will be used to add the following rotten bunch to the game.
Perro is one of Ubu’s bodyguards. With an unrequited crush
on the mysterious Ella, this wrestler on a constant masochistic bent,
seeks out pain in his underwear and suspenders while dishing out a flurry of sadomasochistic throws.

LSD is a psychiatrist based out of the Asylum where Giano was formerly committed. Though bound by a straitjacket, his feet are a deadly force, and he counterbalances this situation by using his flexible and highly evasive body along with lethal kicks and sharpened teeth.

Enda Ashisa is a ninja, and Persian mercenary bomber. She has not eaten the loboeucarixtus, but rather, has been hired to retrieve it. Filled with self-loathing, she is an expert fighter with a gift for speed, who uses a plethora of traps and explosives to confuse her opponent.

Zatto is another mercenary hired by the Yakuza to retrieve the loboeucarixtus, and therefore he has not eaten it either. He's called (and feared as) “The Human Rock”. If you don't fear his slowness, you'll get a character with a lot of powerful stun attacks that can easily destroy his opponent.
Rotten Core has many well designed features and graphics that give the game a unique and colorful overall look, whilst still paying homage to the design of classic fighting games.
*Handmade dynamic lights on characters bodies, Some special moves have that dynamic lights effect
2. Animated stages drawn in Full HD Resolution that move and breathe during gameplay.
4. Engaging Story Mode - Follow the story of your character
5. Arcade Mode - Play rounds upon rounds of tournament style fights.
6. Training Mode -  Learn the ins and outs of favorite characters and their moves.
7. Tag Mode - Pick a partner and tag them at will during a match

Pressing a specified button allows each character to perform his own peculiar moves. Every character has his own distinctive move which can be an evasive one, an attacking one or maybe a move useful for a combo startup... or maybe something else!
Some special moves can be enhanced with a little amount of the power meter bar
Each character has some powerful Super Moves called Rotten Arts. They can be performed at the cost of one power meter bar segment.
Each character has some very devastating Super Moves called Uber Rotten Arts. They can be performed at the cost of two power meter bar segments.
5. Cross Impact (CI), Perfect Cross Impact (PCI) and Cross Charge Reaction (CCR)  (Check out the trailer above for an example)

Cross Impact (CI) and Perfect Cross Impact (PCI) System is a new kind of mechanics in a Beat’em’up.  When you are in a difficult situation, you can now try to defend with an attack! Some attacks have auto guard impact properties which can transform a defense into a lethal opening window for an attack. Maybe a devastating combo! But don’t think that it will be easy! Your opponent can react with a Cross Charge Reaction (CCR). Every CCR brings each character to an unique spectacular scene where two fighters challenge each other (every character has a different reaction with each opponent that he(or she) fights!) with the result of charging their power meters. So CI, PCI and CCR are a technical and spectacular new system to attack an opponent and also defend yourself from him!
6- Madness Power Bar  (added for Rotten Core: Purple Pain Edition)
Each character has an extra own power meter used for new powerful special ESM.
7- End of the World (EOTW) (added for Rotten Core: Purple Pain Edition)
Each character can cause the end of the world with an ultra devastating final blow which instantly kill the opponent.

Team Aiduzzi has hand drawn and coded Ella, Ubu, Giano, and Kuando on our own. As stated previously, with your donations we will bring in additional coders and ""spriters"" to assist us full time. If we reach our funding goal of $87,000 the following features will be added to the complete game at their respective costs.
Includes all character sprite art, portrait art, programming, voice over, balancing and etc.

M.U.G.E.N Engine Optimization ($5,000) - Optimizing the source code of M.U.G.E.N to correspond even better with Rotten Core and characters. We will also add new features to M.U.G.E.N that are custom made for Rotten Core.
If we surpass our initial funding goal of $87,000, the following stretch goals will be added to the final Rotten Core game!
$103,000 development of Rotten Core for PlayStation Network
$119,000 development of Rotten Core for Xbox One
$169,000 GGPO  - GGPO middle-ware helps minimize any issues with lag when players fight each other online.
In addition to the previously mentioned Rotten lineup, we have four more characters that can come to life with your help!

Imperia is a young mistress who prior to eating the organ was a washed-up stripper, and even now has a love for Perro that is un-reciprocated. She is a killer both on and off the pole, and an acrobatic wrestler who can summon her personal tool of the trade to do some lethal attacks.

Embargo is the only character to retain his original features after eating the loboeucarixtus. Known as “The Cursed,” he is haunted by a pink unicorn. He can throw devastating black flames that consume anything in their path, however, the unicorn often tries to assist him by replacing his deadly attacks with colorful rainbows and lovely little stars.

The Man with The Hammer is a white-collar worker who, unbeknownst to himself, works as a hitman while he is unconscious. Wrongly believing himself to be unlucky, he is a master with his talking hammer and leads an otherwise quiet life. Initially appearing to be weak and defenseless, his hammer can change his personality, making him a very disturbing and dangerous fighter.

Fortuna is a self destructive girl who has nearly reached immortality. An autophagist, bulimic, and a cannibal, she enjoys suffering and fights mostly with cutlery that can be controlled as she wishes, to set up many traps. She enjoys launching herself at her opponent and summoning her cutlery to do damage both to her opponent and herself. These skills make her a perfect zone fighter.

And at $174,000 we will be bringing to you Rotten Core Purple Pain: A new addition to the Rotten Core story that focuses on the feared Embargo! An enhanced version of Rotten Core with a new and more intense part of the story, all 12 characters and new NPCs, new gameplay features (Madness power bar,  End of the world), better animations and handmade lights effects.
These are the rewards that will be packaged in various
combinations for supporters. You can check out our reward tier for more
1. PERSONAL THANK YOU - Backers will get a personal thank
you for their contribution and also will be kept up to date on the development
process of Rotten Core. They will also receive a  shoutout on rottencore.net
2. DIGITAL ART PACK - Several campaign exclusive wallpapers
as a Thank You for your donation, a one of the kind post card with amazing
3. EARLY RELEASE COPY OF THE GAME ON STEAM - Steam copy
4. BETA VERSION ACCESS - Get your hands on an early release
5. DIGITAL SOUNDTRACK - A creative mix of blood pumping
tunes for you to blast at your leisure
6. DIGITAL ART BOOK - Features never before seen art for
Rotten Core such as concept art and full colored illustrations of the Rotten
Crew. This book will be jam packed full of rare art goodness! Furthermore,  a digital mini-book containing
some significant frame data for all characters.
7. CAMPAIGN EXCLUSIVE T-SHIRT -  Rock an Indiegogo exclusive
Rotten Core T-shirt that proudly displays how rotten you really are. Style and
design will be of one of the following
8. PHYSICAL CD - The digital soundtrack on a physical CD.
9. VIRTUAL MEETING WITH TEAM AIDUZZI - where you chat with
us about our development process and get a behind the scenes look at Rotten
POSTER AND “XL” POSTER - An exclusive standard size poster or an high quality XL poster.
11. PHYSICAL ART BOOK - A physical art book that we will
print and send to you jam packed with even more exclusive art. The book will
include concept sketches, full color illustrations. If it's not enough for you, there is also a limited edition hardcover artbook (with extra special sketches and other never before seen
artworks done by Aiduzzi). It will be our honor to personally sign this limited edition book with
a special rotten dedication to you.

12. PHYSICAL ART MADE TO ORDER - Team Aiduzzi will draw a custom piece of physical art which can be one of the Rotten Core cast, your own character done in our style, or something else that we can both come up with.

13. NPC (Non Playable Character) - Have us transform you or your original character into a pixel creation featured in one of the stages in Rotten Core! Your character will have a front row seat to brawling mayhem for eternity.
14. FIGHT STICK - A limited fight stick done in Rotten Core fashion. Will be similar to the model below (design is still a W.I.P).
15. APPEAR IN A SPECIAL SCENE - Team Aiduzzi will draw you or your character in a special scene in the game! (L.S.D. will be happy to see you there, we're sure.)
unique handmade (autographed and with the original date when it was
drawn) sketch of Aiduzzi. A very important “piece of history” of
(You can choose what you want, but keep
in mind that they are unique pieces, so each chosen sketch by someone

17. UNIQUE ACTION FIGURE - That's the very last step. An unique sculpture totally handmade by Aiduzzi. This action figure it's a unique piece of art. The base of the sculpture is autographed and reports the original date of creation. We have just 1 piece of it and it will be never reproduced.
Designer, Lead Programmer, Lead Graphic Artist
Mimi Von Lace Social Media/Marketing Manager
Team Aiduzzi is small group of talented artists and programmers who came together in our spare time to create something that we love
column2: fighting games. We believe in this project, because we are fighting game fans just like you, who loved the genre so much that we put our blood sweat and tears into code and pixels to bring something exciting to the world.

column1: Every dollar counts, and even if you cannot donate at this time, we ask that you share our campaign on your social media to get the word out to your fellow gamers. Any questions or comments, you can leave them below and we’ll try to answer them as best we can.
Thank you for your support, and for taking the time to read this!
What is the release date of Rotten Core?
All characters, voices, stages and visual effects (explosions) will be in orginal?
Characters are ripped from other games?
Why aren't you offering a box version of the game?
Why PS4/Xbox One version of the game is a stretch goal?
Do Rotten Core runs at 30 or 60fps?
What are the system requirements for Rotten Core?
How do I know which T-shirt I want (Physical Bits for Your Mitts perk)?
How do I know which unique handmade sketch of Aiduzzi I want (Rotten Scoundrel perk)?
1. What is the release date of Rotten Core?
We estimate about one year of work to reach the final form of Rotten Core. Estimated release is July/August 2017
Rotten Core combines low res pixel art characters with HD stages and HD explosions. All menus, game intro and comic strips (in the story mode) are HD.
3. All characters, voices, stages and visual effects (explosions) will be original?

Yes. We want to draw these ones from scratch. All characters are original (we want to fix Ubu and make him original), all voices are original, all stages too. We want to draw new original explosions and replace them or some other, new ones.
4. Characters are ripped from other games?
No, all characters will be original
Yes. We are making this game in a collaboration with Elecbyte. We purchased a licensed version of M.U.G.E.N. for commercial use.
Aiduzzi throughout the M.U.G.E.N. community is a well-know characters and stages creator. Now he's rising up a team to develop Rotten Core. It's Team Aiduzzi.
7. Why aren't you offering a box version of the game?

We would love to offer a version of the game in box form but  producing a physical box, printing a game manual and burning CDs is too much expensive for a small indipendent software house as actually Team Aiduzzi is. We are very sorry.
8. Why is the PS4/Xbox One version of the game a stretch goal?

As stated previously, we would love to offer a console version of the game. Actually making a console version of Rotten Core is very expensive, so we are forced to put PS4/XBOX ONE version of Rotten Core as stretch goals
9. Does Rotten Core run at 30 or 60fps?
10. What are the system requirements for Rotten Core?
We don't yet know the exact numbers, but we can assure that this game will run at 60fps fairly low minimum spec. We'll give you specifics as soon as we know ourselves.
11. How do you know which  T-shirt I want (Physical Bits for Your Mitts perk)?
Once the campaign has ended we'll be sending out surveys to find out which T-shirt you'd like.
12. How do you know which  unique handmade sketch of Aiduzzi I want (Rotten Scoundrel perk)?

Once the campaign has ended we'll be sending out surveys to find out which sketch you'd like. Keep in mind that they are unique pieces, so each chosed sketch by someone else is gone forever.  Orders shall be settled in chronological order, so if you are interested in this perk, try to donate as soon as possible to have a wider choice.",56.0,0,"1 Campaign

column7: >if you are interesting to contribute but can't decide, contact us! We decided to give every potenital donator a little demo of our game, so you can play around with our dwarf and see is it worth your contribution. If you are here for the first time, read more about this project in text below. Thank you!

column1: We are Yupi Games. Developing games for about 3 years and realy enjoy in programming and making games. More about us, and who we are you can find on profile.
We are here because we need your help to keep our project alive. We hope that you will like the idea of our campaign and support it. So lets start!

Because we always loved stories about ancient kingdoms, kings, dragons, miths and creatures from fairytails we got an idea to make a game based on one of the stories like that. Our hero is dwarf. We have to say  we were inspired by movies like Lord of the Rings but this time unlike that movie where  dwarfs are playing supporting roles, this time in our game dwarf is main actor. We are working on this project for about half year. In section ""What have we done so far?"" you can find out more about this project. Click on Gallery to see more images! We are working on video presentation. Stay tuned!

Snowy mountain is home of dwarfs. They used to live there in their mines and caves. Digging ore, iron, gold, silver... They were good in trade and Snowy mountain was the richest place. But wealth bring curse too. It atracts many eyes, to many greedy eyes were looking in Snowy mountain. And they are waiting. Orcs are waiting...

They are waiting for annual fair in summer when liders of dwarfs leave they homes and gather together to talk about trade and digging ore. Fair was lasted from summer until winter. After king, with best warriors in his guard left the mines, orcs attacked. Dwarfs successfuly fight off but then they started to hold siege and countinue attacking again and again.
Dwarfs almost endrued but orcs brought trolls and dwarfs, without they king and best warriors, couldn't withstand anymore. Orcs enterend in mines in late fall and killed everyone on they path.
On his way back the king  was ambushed just one of his guards survived. It seemed the world of dwarfs is going to end.
But where is our guy. Our guy was in the kings guard and he was only who survived orcs ambush. He is the one of the best warriors.

He is comming back to his home thinking about the bigest disaster. They lose their king.  But instead of warm home he founds out that his home is taken over by orcs, goblins, trolls... From many dwarfs who used to live in mountain just few survived.
- Enter the Hall of Dwarfs and kill the dragon
You have to enter in to the caves and mines which are now full of enemies. You must fight them if you want to live and try to find survived.

You will also need to find a special shield and spear to defeat the dragon. There are specially made for the dragon because without the shield you can't hold out his fire and without the spear you can't stab him. And most important thing is to survive. You will have to face with orcs, goblins, trolls, cyclops...  You are gonna test your skills.

We have already finished about 60% of our game. We have playable character, enemies who can patrol, chase and attack as you can see from images and videos. We desgind about 70% of landscape from assets that we have bought. Things that we have to do are:
- Buy and import more assets to make our landscape more unique and more interesting
- Improve our player(adding more features like possibility to throw the spear or axe)

We are here because we are not able to finish this project without your help. We are alredy depleted all that we have for this project and unfortunately that wasn't enough. In project is alredy invested hundreds of dolars but we need more funds to make this project release. We are able to programm our game entirely so we don't need to pay programmers and we are able to set up environment but things that we need are assets (more environmnet assets, sounds etc.). It's too expenssive to pay professional designers to make assets so we have to buy them, and try to combine them to make the game more unique.
Sounds(backgrounds sounds, sounds for player and enemies) - $200
If we reached the goal you will be able to track progress of the game on Indiedb:
We will inform every supporter how we spend money.

If somehow we collect more than $700 rest of the money will be spend to add more features to the game, to make it more unique, to add additional levels, to get better equipment etc. We will notice you about that of course.

column2:
ChallengesThere si always risk that we are not gonna achieve the goal. If that happens we will probably stop developing this game for a while and future of this game will be uncertain. At best we will publish this game but without stuff that we need and it preformance will be much poorer than as planned.

We can respond to the challenges which are ahead of us but not without your help.

column1: We know that everyone can't donate but there are other ways to help. You can share this project on social networks. Make some noise about this campaign!

We appreciate any kind of help. Be part of the team!


Thanksgiving cards for those who donate $50!

For those who donate $50 we will also send a thanksgiving card with some nice message so you don't ever forget us and we will always remember you!

We know that $100 is not small amount of money so we want to thank on an appropriate way those who donate. We limited they number on 5. First five people who donate $100 or more can choose which color of T-shirt they want, size and color of logo. They will be able to customize text on T-shirt if they want. And of course we are paying shipping.

First five people who donate $100 or more can choose which color of T-shirt they want, size and color of logo. They will be able to customize text on T-shirt if they want. Short Summary

  • Hey there, we're Isaiah Spradlin and Hayes Fleming. We are committed members of our local faith family, Church 212. Both of us work together on a weekly basis serving alongside of the worship department in setting up and tearing down for the weekly worship experience.
• We are committed to local disciple-making and want to participate further in God's great global purpose.

• We are currently raising money to participate in the Philippines trip this August as our ministry teams travel and prepare for two pastor's conferences.
  • With donations made by you, we will be able to make this hope a reality and be on a plane the first week of August 2015!

    • What We Need and What You Get

    • We need to raise $5,000. Both round trip expenses are half the price at $2,500. Since we are collaborating to raise money, two round trip expenses of $2,500 become a total of $5,000. We have decided to split the raised funds 50-50.
    • 100% of the funds will cover the entire trip for both of us.

    The Impact

    • Our church team is traveling over seas to equip local pastors. We will be having two large pastor's conferences. The first one is in General Santos City at the southern tip of the Philippines. Then we will travel six hours north to Davao City to the second pastor's conference. We will be traveling with the pastoral team to assist, support, and serve.
    • On the simplest scale, we will be videoing the events and interviewing our team and natives so we can film and document the trip.

• We look forward to serving in all other capacities the Lord has for us.

    • Risks &
column2:
Challenges
  • We feel qualified to overcome possible challenges because of who we stand by. Walking alongside Jesus has and will continue to help us get through difficult situations financially, emotionally, and spiritually.  
  • Our plan for overcoming challenges we may face on this journey is to turn to our Lord and Savior and pray.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't contribute due to financial circumstances you can still help us by getting the word out by sharing our link on social media sites!
  • You can use Indiegogo share tools as another way to spread the news about our site.
