column3: showinfo=0"">An example of how JACK KUDOS can change your life in positive ways (this was also our first Indiegogo campaign video).

column1: JACK KUDOS is a mobile game featuring Jack (a hippo from South Africa and our logo and mascot) and his mission possible choices to grab kudos, represented by each piece of strawberry in the game (now thereafter, ""KUDOS"").

column3: >Kudos are within reach, and it is possible to have fun at the same time.

column1: JACK KUDOS lives to tell this message:  Whether you're the child with his mother selling crafted jewelry in front of the fine sandy beaches of the majestic Yasawa Islands in Fiji
column2: the entrepreneurial woman hustling to sell Banh Mi to tourists and businesses on their way to Ha Long Bay from the port of Haiphong in Vietnam
column3: or the full time game tester building the latest mod in the heart of Silicon Valley with fully loaded headsets and mouse —You are destined for glory.
>Ha Long Bay, Vietnam. Even though it was once bombed with Agent Orange during the war, it is still a place of beauty.

column1: Why are we raising funds? Scroll down to Our Funding Goals to learn more about where your money is going and to Perks to learn about Indiegogo-only items and discounts we will give you in return.
In exchange for backing this project, we'll give you these awesome rewards. Scroll down to Perks for more info.
Please find our Press Kit with everything you need. Thank you for writing about us!
JACK KUDOS | Grab Kudos for Glory, A Socially Conscious Game for Kids
JACK KUDOS: Destined for Glory, A Mobile Game

This is a partnership for anyone interested in cross-promotion activities. We're all about community. Partner with us to help get the word out about our campaign and we'll help share your content across our extensive distribution channels.

We live in a world where it may be easy to lose hope. Just listen to the cries of abandoned, neglected children. Look into the eyes of the elderly seeking to find ""home."" Smell the skin of the homeless wearing their pride with two extended hands.  Feel the twirl of the earth when you discovered a betrayal by your beloved, when your hard work was coldly unrecognized or even simply when you lost your keys. With JACK KUDOS, we thrive to make a little difference in your life - by making you smile, giving you hope, letting you know that you are destined for glory.

JACK KUDOS lets you grab KUDOS jumping from platform to platform.  Think of the KUDOS as little victories in your life - the little star sticker that your 5th grade teacher gave you for knowing all the countries in the world, your first car and all the loving memories it carried, the man (or the woman) who caused rapid heartbeats, the inability to concentrate and extreme sophistication over choice of apparel. :) We are meant for glory.

column3: >Our interns Owen and Maher had fun creating this campaign video.

column1: Games are meant to give you FUN. Combined with the message that you are indeed awesome and the mission to grab KUDOS to earn the highest points, we hope that you are not lost in escapism (in a virtual reality that is far from home) but instead we hope that you are subconsciously - with all of your being (belief, thought, emotion and action) - making ""home"" within. We want you to believe that you are meant for glory. We want you to think that there is hope. We want you to have fun. We want you to grab that KUDOS.
And with JACK KUDOS, we want to make that difference.

It was an ordinary day in 2013. Michelle had made a choice to build a company, something that people would love, from scratch and with a few values. Leaving the past behind her, she started with a brick of faith.

Michelle wanted a logo and mascot that would represent the values of this new company including the values of playfulness and fun. Jack is thus born. As you know, hippopotamus means ""Water Horse"" and it is symbolic of emotional depth, protection of family, creation, imagination and birth of new ideas - a perfect logo and mascot for BondsWell since bondswell.com is a platform that allows you to create, contextualize and publish your expression (or ""bond""). You earn kudos when someone gives your bond a strawberry.

column3: >When you like a bond, you give your friend a Kudo! Click the image to see it on bondswell.com!

column1: Since strawberries represent KUDOS, JACK KUDOS is thus an extension of the company in a way that combines fun, resilience and glory in a game. JACK KUDOS takes place in the heart of South Africa when Jack is enjoying his basket of fruits when a devilish blue rhino beetle flies in and deprives him of his pleasure. Instead of accepting his fate, Jack jumps from platform to platform grabbing bananas, apples and KUDOS.

column3: >The animated magical story behind the game.

column1: In a deeper sense, JACK KUDOS could be Michelle or any one of us. You are JACK KUDOS because you faced adversity in some way, learned valuable lessons from them, accepted yourself for who you are and then proceeded to grab KUDOS, consciously creating a harmonious life.
Instead of creating a random game just for the sake of creating a game, JACK KUDOS is different because it focuses on the game play of grabbing KUDOS.

column3: >Each player may face challenges, learn lessons and achieve glories.

column1: JACK KUDOS focuses on the authenticity of the player, circumstances and the world rather than on victimization or escapism of gaming. By playing the game, you learn to be empowered to adjust your thoughts and circumstances in your physical reality while having fun at the same time.

JACK KUDOS subconsciously shows you that you want to earn KUDOS by taking action, by jumping from platform to platform to grab KUDOS. You are no longer a victim just because a rhino beetle takes a basket of fruit from you. You learn that you have all the power within yourself to change your reality, that you are indeed destined for glory.

column3: >You have the power to change your life!

column1:
By backing JACK KUDOS and supporting us, you will receive Perks that are only available through this campaign.

 

Wall of Fame - Ranked by First to Pledge

By backing JACK KUDOS with any dollar amount, even with as little as $1, your name will be entered in our JACK KUDOS Wall of Fame hosted on our blog (blog.bondswell.com) because we know that you got our back and every dollar counts. The earlier that you pledge, the higher your name will be respectively honored there.

 

Thank You Credits in the iOS Game - Ranked by First to Pledge

By backing JACK KUDOS with $10 and above, your name will be included in the JACK KUDOS Thank You Credits in the iOS Game. Act fast, as the earlier you pledge, the higher your name will be included in the Thank You Credits.

 

$1 Perk | Wall of Fame &
Get exclusive access to behind-the-scenes project updates about JACK KUDOS provided by Lou and/or Michelle
column2:
and have your name on our Wall of Fame. Think we cannot be funny? Find out yourself. Check out your shoutout for our Wall of Fame (blog.bondswell.com)

 

$10 Perk | Thank You Credits &

column1: Receive early access to JACK KUDOS before it is released to the public
column2:
and have your name in our Thank You Credits. Plus all of the above.

 

$25 Perk | Comic, Stickers &

column1:
Want to be featured on our main Twitter account for marketing, promotion and exposure to 10,000 followers? Looking to tell the world about your product or business? Or simply wanting a little bit more exposure? We will share about you or your business to our followers on Twitter.

In addition, you will receive a comic of our JACK KUDOS story here on Indiegogo, autographed by the BondsWell team! Plus 10 JACK KUDOS stickers and all of the above perks!
Own these beautiful 3D printed wired earrings and be in the forefront of technology
column2: a unique piece that will amaze your friends. These come in a sturdy nylon plastic in the color of your choice
column3: see the options here: http://shpws.me/I6Dt. Also receive a JACK KUDOS limited edition white tank.

column1: And of course, all the Perks above are included!
Get a limited edition of the JACK KUDOS t-shirt made specifically for our backers—because you rock! Wear it with pride as you are destined for glory.
Plus, you will receive our Tag by bondswell3D—this is 3D printed in nylon plastic in the color of your choice.  Be part of the cool crowd and the forefront of technology.

And of course, all the Perks above are included!

 

$100 Perk | VIP Party Time &
Party with us at the JACK KUDOS VIP Launch Party, bring a guest and meet the whole BondsWell team!  Ask lots of questions about JACK KUDOS and have tons of fun!

Spend 30 minutes in a video power chat with Michelle. Ask anything: travel, food, film, billiards, dancing, leadership, payments, drones, fashion, crafts, games, etc. And don't forget to grill her:  Why did she quit her job with a hefty salary to build something people would love from scratch? What are some of the challenges she faced? Why is a strawberry chosen to represent KUDOS?

And of course, all the Perks above are included!

 

$250 Perk | A Traveling Experience

JACK and his hippo friends are from South Africa—exclusively for this pledge, Michelle will share her curated South African experience with you. Having visited South Africa with her camera and an AR Parrot drone, you will receive a limited edition slideshow containing beautiful photographs of the natural wonders seen there.

You will also receive a personal written message from Michelle.  And of course, all the Perks above are included!

 

$300 Perk | The Fruit of Your Choice &

Be part of JACK KUDOS by giving us a fruit to be placed into the game. We now have apples, bananas and strawberries. Your fruit of choice will be ranked between the bananas and strawberries in terms of points, and the earlier that you pledge for this Perk, the more points your chosen fruit will have. Be a part of our decision making process!

JACK KUDOS is about celebrating glory, and we have designed a ring about celebrating little victories in life. Get this 3D printed ""Victory"" Ring in your metal of choice. Every time we show this ring to folks at a trade show, they have fallen in love with it. We are confident you will too! More significantly, let it remind you to celebrate little victories in life that you have every day.

And of course, all the Perks above are included!

 

$500 Perk | Social Media Marketing, Promotion &

You, your company and/or brand will be featured on our social media channels (Twitter - multiple accounts, Vine and Facebook) of about 45,000+ followers, which is a lot of marketing, promotion and exposure for you and your business for a fraction of the market advertisement cost.

And of course, all the Perks above are included!

 

$1000 Perk | Choose Your West Coast Dinner

Michelle will have dinner with you and your friend at one of her favorite culinary establishments in the Silicon Valley. Chat about anything over dinner. Wondering where to go? She will share her travel experiences with you. Passionate about food? She will share about her favorite restaurants as well as dives. Want to do things that scare you? Michelle will share about some of her fears and things that she did that scared the heck out of her—and at the same time made her feel alive. Love photography? She will share tips on how to be a better photographer. Building a company? She could share her knowledge to jump start your venture.

Are you from, or want to visit the Northwest? Meet Lou, our Design Consultant near Portland Oregon for a friendly dinner with her and her husband. They know the hot restaurants in Portland that you will love to go to! Pick her brain about anything design related, graphics, print, display, exhibition, user interface and experience—you name it! What to talk about something else? How about games, hiking, dogs, horses, biking, camping, traveling, crafting, crochet, painting, puzzles, weddings or gardening? Want to meet in Seattle instead? Lou can do that too!

Of course, all the Perks above are included!

 

$1500 Perk | Gamify Me!

This Perk is good for 2 people. Join Michelle and gamification guri Yu-kai Chou over dinner at one of the best culinary establishments in Silicon Valley. Learn about the use of gamification concepts in the creation of your product, in attracting engagement and in ensuring that your team is happy and grabbing KUDOS! Yu-kai will provide for you a signed copy of his book
column5: keywords=actionable+gamification"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">Actionable Gamification, which has a near perfect rating on Amazon. Check out Yu-kai's site!

column1:
And of course, all the Perks included above!

 

$0 Help | No Money? You Can Still Help
If you're not in a place to financially contribute to JACK KUDOS, please share this campaign below and by going to our support page: bondswell.com/JACKKUDOS. THANK YOU!

Our Team is comprised of some awesome minds from different ages, backgrounds and stories. Below is a little background story on our leaders.

 

Michelle | Developer

Michelle begins drawing when she was a child. She loves using pencil, acrylic, oil, watercolor and tools such as airbrushes, cameras and video cameras. During lunch time in high school, she would lug a watercolor brush from right to the left of the canvas, noticing how it fades in accordance with distance, time and pressure. She would draw a model with a pencil, ensuring that her pupils pop and her upper lips shaded.  She would create comics on the Apple Classic computer, print them and share them with friends. She would own one of the first digital cameras and capture professional photographs of their emotions, style and weddings. She would make video clips during her travels and later could not believe that she could share them on Vine.

Michelle loves technology and now, she is truly grateful to be at the intersection of technology and creativity as well as humanity (as she is involved in a number of non-profit organizations in high school and beyond).

Her favorite games are Contra, Tetris, Duck Hunt, Time Crisis, Paper Toss, Fruit Ninja, Words With Friends, Chess With Friends, Draw With Friends and Daytona USA.

 

Lou Stone | Design

Lou is a design-animal, crazy dog mom and avid gamer. Favorite games include: Skyrim (Xbox), Fallout Shelter (iOS) and The Sims 3 (PC). She also loves camping with her family, hiking with her friends and watching movies with her hubby.

Lou's love for art and design started early. Drawing, painting or anything involving glue and materials was a main-stay of childhood—and encouraged by her wonderful grandmother, Susan Stone, who is also a talented artist.

Unsure of the path to be taken after high school, Lou spent 4 years at a community college trying to figure it out. Leaving with 2 degrees, one in Graphic Design and one in General Studies (both with honors), she set her sights on San Jose State University.

At SJSU, she worked very hard to qualify for the BFA program in Graphic Design. Lou received the Fang Quai New Media Achievement Award for a 3 part video series in 2011. In 2013 she graduated early from the Fine Arts program with honors and moved to Washington state with her husband.
Our mission is to finish JACK KUDOS game and publish it on the IOS platform.

We have finished the most challenging milestones: all pre-production research, planning, design, sprites and graphics are complete for Part 1 of JACK KUDOS (mobile game on IOS platform). We will be honored if you joined us in the finalization of development and publication of JACK KUDOS on the IOS platform.
We want a quality and fun game, and thus your money will go into quality. We are making JACK KUDOS with love and passion, and there are many vital steps of finalizing and publishing an iOS game:

A portion of the funds will go into developers and animators to work over the course of the year to complete the game. In the future we will add sound effects and music. To say the least, we are more than excited to make this happen!
Telling the world about JACK KUDOS is as important as developing and publishing it, and therefore, a portion of the funds will go into marketing.

We are just like any other community crowdfunding a campaign. It is up to you, the community, if JACK KUDOS will live or die. So let's band together and make this prevail!

 

Game Art
This is an example of JACK KUDOS unit and their respective sprite sheets.

The objective of the game is to grab as many strawberries (Kudos) as possible. Each strawberry is worth 25 points. You will earn 1 Kudo for each strawberry. The banana is worth 5 points and apple is worth 15 points. Jack only has three (3) lives so make it count!

 

Gameplay Preview
You could play a draft of level 1 of Jack Kudos on the web on bondswell.com/jackkudosgame.
• Level 1 of the game will change as we continue to develop and refine it.
• Once Jack Kudos is on iOS, the game will be free on iTunes with ads and $0.99 without ads.

We have been able to keep costs low while maintaining the quality of the JACK KUDOS game. Therefore, every dollar you give to JACK KUDOS will go straight to the quality of the game as well as the rewards and products you get from us.

We intend to release JACK KUDOS on the iOS platform in Summer 2016. We have completed the design and planning. Now it's the development and publishing on the IOS platform.  Since we have already coded Level 1 of the game, we are confident that we are able to finalize and publish JACK KUDOS.

Delays: There is a chance that JACK KUDOS may not come out until after Summer 2016. Our team may from time to time focus upon aspects of JACK KUDOS outside of making the game that still requires quality time (such as running this campaign, fulfilling rewards and further fundraising).

This campaign, however, will finance developers and marketers who will speed up the game making process and make JACK KUDOS absolutely awesome. Your contributions are the key to making JACK KUDOS on the iOS platform.

We just want to throw you a strawberry KUDO for reading our story. Please help us by visiting bondswell.com/jackkudos where you can easily share our campaign with your world. Remember, you are destined for glory and together we will get our fruit back from that Rhino Beetle!  :)
An example of how JACK KUDOS can change your life in positive ways (this was also our first Indiegogo campaign video).

JACK KUDOS is a mobile game featuring Jack (a hippo from South Africa and our logo and mascot) and his mission possible choices to grab kudos, represented by each piece of strawberry in the game (now thereafter, ""KUDOS"").
Kudos are within reach, and it is possible to have fun at the same time.
JACK KUDOS lives to tell this message:  Whether you're the child with his mother selling crafted jewelry in front of the fine sandy beaches of the majestic Yasawa Islands in Fiji
column2: the entrepreneurial woman hustling to sell Banh Mi to tourists and businesses on their way to Ha Long Bay from the port of Haiphong in Vietnam
column3: or the full time game tester building the latest mod in the heart of Silicon Valley with fully loaded headsets and mouse —You are destined for glory.

column1: Ha Long Bay, Vietnam. Even though it was once bombed with Agent Orange during the war, it is still a place of beauty.
Why are we raising funds? Scroll down to Our Funding Goals to learn more about where your money is going and to Perks to learn about Indiegogo-only items and discounts we will give you in return.
In exchange for backing this project, we'll give you these awesome rewards. Scroll down to Perks for more info.
Please find our Press Kit with everything you need. Thank you for writing about us!
JACK KUDOS | Grab Kudos for Glory, A Socially Conscious Game for Kids
JACK KUDOS: Destined for Glory, A Mobile Game

This is a partnership for anyone interested in cross-promotion activities. We're all about community. Partner with us to help get the word out about our campaign and we'll help share your content across our extensive distribution channels.

We live in a world where it may be easy to lose hope. Just listen to the cries of abandoned, neglected children. Look into the eyes of the elderly seeking to find ""home."" Smell the skin of the homeless wearing their pride with two extended hands.  Feel the twirl of the earth when you discovered a betrayal by your beloved, when your hard work was coldly unrecognized or even simply when you lost your keys. With JACK KUDOS, we thrive to make a little difference in your life - by making you smile, giving you hope, letting you know that you are destined for glory.
Games and challenges make people smile.

JACK KUDOS lets you grab KUDOS jumping from platform to platform.  Think of the KUDOS as little victories in your life - the little star sticker that your 5th grade teacher gave you for knowing all the countries in the world, your first car and all the loving memories it carried, the man (or the woman) who caused rapid heartbeats, the inability to concentrate and extreme sophistication over choice of apparel. :) We are meant for glory.
Our interns Owen and Maher had fun creating this campaign video.

Games are meant to give you FUN. Combined with the message that you are indeed awesome and the mission to grab KUDOS to earn the highest points, we hope that you are not lost in escapism (in a virtual reality that is far from home) but instead we hope that you are subconsciously - with all of your being (belief, thought, emotion and action) - making ""home"" within. We want you to believe that you are meant for glory. We want you to think that there is hope. We want you to have fun. We want you to grab that KUDOS.
And with JACK KUDOS, we want to make that difference.

It was an ordinary day in 2013. Michelle had made a choice to build a company, something that people would love, from scratch and with a few values. Leaving the past behind her, she started with a brick of faith.

Michelle wanted a logo and mascot that would represent the values of this new company including the values of playfulness and fun. Jack is thus born. As you know, hippopotamus means ""Water Horse"" and it is symbolic of emotional depth, protection of family, creation, imagination and birth of new ideas - a perfect logo and mascot for BondsWell since bondswell.com is a platform that allows you to create, contextualize and publish your expression (or ""bond""). You earn kudos when someone gives your bond a strawberry.
When you like a bond, you give your friend a Kudo! Click the image to see it on bondswell.com!

Since strawberries represent KUDOS, JACK KUDOS is thus an extension of the company in a way that combines fun, resilience and glory in a game. JACK KUDOS takes place in the heart of South Africa when Jack is enjoying his basket of fruits when a devilish blue rhino beetle flies in and deprives him of his pleasure. Instead of accepting his fate, Jack jumps from platform to platform grabbing bananas, apples and KUDOS.
The animated magical story behind the game.

In a deeper sense, JACK KUDOS could be Michelle or any one of us. You are JACK KUDOS because you faced adversity in some way, learned valuable lessons from them, accepted yourself for who you are and then proceeded to grab KUDOS, consciously creating a harmonious life.
Instead of creating a random game just for the sake of creating a game, JACK KUDOS is different because it focuses on the game play of grabbing KUDOS.
Each player may face challenges, learn lessons and achieve glories.

JACK KUDOS focuses on the authenticity of the player, circumstances and the world rather than on victimization or escapism of gaming. By playing the game, you learn to be empowered to adjust your thoughts and circumstances in your physical reality while having fun at the same time.

JACK KUDOS subconsciously shows you that you want to earn KUDOS by taking action, by jumping from platform to platform to grab KUDOS. You are no longer a victim just because a rhino beetle takes a basket of fruit from you. You learn that you have all the power within yourself to change your reality, that you are indeed destined for glory.
You have the power to change your life!
By backing JACK KUDOS and supporting us, you will receive Perks that are only available through this campaign. Wall of Fame - Ranked by First to Pledge

By backing JACK KUDOS with any dollar amount, even with as little as $1, your name will be entered in our JACK KUDOS Wall of Fame hosted on our blog (blog.bondswell.com) because we know that you got our back and every dollar counts. The earlier that you pledge, the higher your name will be respectively honored there. Thank You Credits in the iOS Game - Ranked by First to Pledge

By backing JACK KUDOS with $10 and above, your name will be included in the JACK KUDOS Thank You Credits in the iOS Game. Act fast, as the earlier you pledge, the higher your name will be included in the Thank You Credits. $1 Perk | Wall of Fame & Updates
Get exclusive access to behind-the-scenes project updates about JACK KUDOS provided by Lou and/or Michelle
column2: and have your name on our Wall of Fame. Think we cannot be funny? Find out yourself. Check out your shoutout for our Wall of Fame (blog.bondswell.com) $10 Perk | Thank You Credits & Early Access

column1: Receive early access to JACK KUDOS before it is released to the public
column2: and have your name in our Thank You Credits. Plus all of the above. $25 Perk | Comic, Stickers & Twitter, oh my!

column1: Want to be featured on our main Twitter account for marketing, promotion and exposure to 10,000 followers? Looking to tell the world about your product or business? Or simply wanting a little bit more exposure? We will share about you or your business to our followers on Twitter.In addition, you will receive a comic of our JACK KUDOS story here on Indiegogo, autographed by the BondsWell team! Plus 10 JACK KUDOS stickers and all of the above perks!
Own these beautiful 3D printed wired earrings and be in the forefront of technology
column2: a unique piece that will amaze your friends. These come in a sturdy nylon plastic in the color of your choice
column3: see the options here: http://shpws.me/I6Dt. Also receive a JACK KUDOS limited edition white tank.

column1: And of course, all the Perks above are included!
Get a limited edition of the JACK KUDOS t-shirt made specifically for our backers—because you rock! Wear it with pride as you are destined for glory.
Plus, you will receive our Tag by bondswell3D—this is 3D printed in nylon plastic in the color of your choice.  Be part of the cool crowd and the forefront of technology.
And of course, all the Perks above are included! $100 Perk | VIP Party Time & Power Chat
Party with us at the JACK KUDOS VIP Launch Party, bring a guest and meet the whole BondsWell team!  Ask lots of questions about JACK KUDOS and have tons of fun!

Spend 30 minutes in a video power chat with Michelle. Ask anything: travel, food, film, billiards, dancing, leadership, payments, drones, fashion, crafts, games, etc. And don't forget to grill her:  Why did she quit her job with a hefty salary to build something people would love from scratch? What are some of the challenges she faced? Why is a strawberry chosen to represent KUDOS?
And of course, all the Perks above are included! $250 Perk | A Traveling Experience

JACK and his hippo friends are from South Africa—exclusively for this pledge, Michelle will share her curated South African experience with you. Having visited South Africa with her camera and an AR Parrot drone, you will receive a limited edition slideshow containing beautiful photographs of the natural wonders seen there.
You will also receive a personal written message from Michelle.  And of course, all the Perks above are included! $300 Perk | The Fruit of Your Choice & 3D Printed Victory Ring

Be part of JACK KUDOS by giving us a fruit to be placed into the game. We now have apples, bananas and strawberries. Your fruit of choice will be ranked between the bananas and strawberries in terms of points, and the earlier that you pledge for this Perk, the more points your chosen fruit will have. Be a part of our decision making process!

JACK KUDOS is about celebrating glory, and we have designed a ring about celebrating little victories in life. Get this 3D printed ""Victory"" Ring in your metal of choice. Every time we show this ring to folks at a trade show, they have fallen in love with it. We are confident you will too! More significantly, let it remind you to celebrate little victories in life that you have every day.
And of course, all the Perks above are included! $500 Perk | Social Media Marketing, Promotion & Exposure

You, your company and/or brand will be featured on our social media channels (Twitter - multiple accounts, Vine and Facebook) of about 45,000+ followers, which is a lot of marketing, promotion and exposure for you and your business for a fraction of the market advertisement cost.And of course, all the Perks above are included! $1000 Perk | Choose Your West Coast Dinner

Michelle will have dinner with you and your friend at one of her favorite culinary establishments in the Silicon Valley. Chat about anything over dinner. Wondering where to go? She will share her travel experiences with you. Passionate about food? She will share about her favorite restaurants as well as dives. Want to do things that scare you? Michelle will share about some of her fears and things that she did that scared the heck out of her—and at the same time made her feel alive. Love photography? She will share tips on how to be a better photographer. Building a company? She could share her knowledge to jump start your venture.

Are you from, or want to visit the Northwest? Meet Lou, our Design Consultant near Portland Oregon for a friendly dinner with her and her husband. They know the hot restaurants in Portland that you will love to go to! Pick her brain about anything design related, graphics, print, display, exhibition, user interface and experience—you name it! What to talk about something else? How about games, hiking, dogs, horses, biking, camping, traveling, crafting, crochet, painting, puzzles, weddings or gardening? Want to meet in Seattle instead? Lou can do that too!
Of course, all the Perks above are included! $1500 Perk | Gamify Me!

This Perk is good for 2 people. Join Michelle and gamification guri Yu-kai Chou over dinner at one of the best culinary establishments in Silicon Valley. Learn about the use of gamification concepts in the creation of your product, in attracting engagement and in ensuring that your team is happy and grabbing KUDOS! Yu-kai will provide for you a signed copy of his book Actionable Gamification, which has a near perfect rating on Amazon. Check out Yu-kai's site!
And of course, all the Perks included above! $0 Help | No Money? You Can Still Help
If you're not in a place to financially contribute to JACK KUDOS, please share this campaign below and by going to our support page: bondswell.com/JACKKUDOS. THANK YOU!

Knick Knax is a fun and colorful puzzle game experience for all ages. The game follows Bobo and Kiki, two adorable sock monkeys, as they search for creative ways to reunite with their friends.

Players progress through a world of common everyday settings but from the perspective of a small stuffed animal. The player is encouraged to explore the environment for solutions to physics-based platforming puzzles. By manipulating the world around you, the player can create bridges that span otherwise impossible chasms and obstacles.
The game will also include a level editor that allows players can create and share their own levels.
The team is working very hard at creating an experience that can be enjoyed by anyone. In fact, our playtests have already shown high levels of kid approval:

The Knick Knax team consists of 13 hardworking designers, programmers, and artists.  We are all either students or alumni of the University of Advancing Technology. We hope that this project not only shows off our respective talents and passion for game development, but also opens doors for even  greater opportunities within the industry.
Stay tuned for some in-depth stories behind some of our devlopers!

The game itself is already well into its development. All we need, and all we hope you can help us with, is the means to promote the game to the masses!  We are confident that Knick Knax has the potential to be a success if only its prospective players knew of its existence. Will you help us spread the word?
So what are we going to do with the money you have so kindly offered to our cause?

Can't contribute at all? No problem! Just spread the word and tell people about us. Share us on Facebook, Twitter, Google +, Friendster, Compuserve or anywhere else.

Idea behind the game 

Ever tried to find a challenging, captivating, strategic, fun, puzzle/maze game on the App Store? - Well we tried and could not find one.  

This is how the creation of Ninja Trail began.

What type of game is Ninja Trail? 

Ninja Trail is a 2D visual game for those old school enthusiastic gamers.  The simplicity of Pac Man, addictiveness of Candycrush and an in game challenging concept - comparable to Angry birds, makes this a sure fire winner to be one of the high hitting games of 2015.
column8:
>Highly addictive and fun - Run! Dash and slide past guards in order for your ninja to fill in the trail with your footsteps to complete the level!


Visually appealing to the eye, colourful, fun and bright, the game itself incorporates all the main key features of a game that you do not want to put down.

There are 100 levels to complete - the levels get harder and harder as you go!


Aim of the Game ............ Game Play Breakdown

column4: >Guide the Ninja through the maze, leaving footprints as you tread.  To complete the level you need to fully complete the maze in full with your footprints.  Pick up coins and gems along the way to gain in house purchases such as - By Pass Level, Extra Lives, Power Ups, etc.
column12:
>

You also need to avoid the guards in each level which all have different capabilities -

column1: These guards are scouters, once in the target area of a guard they will chase you.
column12:
>Red Guard  
These guards are slower paced but throw Ninja Stars in your way so it is harder to lead them away from the trail.
column23:
>Red Watch Tower Guard 
These guards spin around on the watch towers throwing Ninja Stars in your direction where the player is to try and stop you filling in the trail around that area.
column34:
>Purple Guard 
These guards are super fast - Be careful when close because it is hard to get away from them.
column45:
>Blue Guard
These guards have the ability of all other guards combined. The ultimate guards of the game.

Other In Game Features to look out for...
column51: >Features in game that can help the player -

column2: >Spinning Logs - The logs are an assist for the player to block the guards
>Bushes - Bushes are an assist for the player to hide from the guards
>Tele porter - Tele porter is an assist for the player to transport from one area of the maze to another

column1: Red Gems - Collect 50 red gems to trade in for 1 Gold gem to buy yourself Lives/Powers Ups
Gold Gems - Gold gems are harder to find.  These gems help you to buy yourself Lives/Powers Ups

Coins - Coins give you extra points and shows the players skill level on each level


Power Ups
Invisibility - When using invisibility guards cannot see you and the player can walk through them
Freeze - This ability allows you to freeze the game whilst the player is still active.  The player can walk through guards when the game is frozen.

Speed Up - This Powerup gives you the ability to run faster through the maze.

In game challenge features -
Spinning Spikes - Spinning spikes are placed on certain levels to challenge the players memory and to stop the player from completing the level.
Electric Fences - These are deadly fences that the player cannot run into.
Black Holes - These are black holes on certain levels - once fallen into the player looses a life.
Houses - Houses are on timers to generate guards when playing - listen out for the timer and stay away from them.
Character Selection - You can choose your character before playing - Pink or Black Ninja.
Slot Machine - Gives you a free spin for extra Lives/Powerups each day.
Facebook/Twitter - Share and send your friends lives if you are feeling kind and compete against your friends for the highest score.
Who Are We? - Meet the Ninja Trail Team!!!
the countryside of Plymouth.  We have an office where all our gaming is
created. We have fully experienced programmers who have created the new
coding behind the game so it is like no other.
siblings.  Sophie, Harley and Khara give the team a family feel and are
idea of Ninja Trail and the full support of his family and the close

knit team backing him 100 % has got us to where we are now.

Jack,
Ankit and Mahesh are the programmers behind the game.  Darryl is the
graphic designer and Martin is our accountant.  Our team are a close
unit and our dream is to make this a world wide success!

column1: We feel that the last push is necessary to complete our goals and achievements.  Our input financially up until this stage has been phenomenal and we do not want to stop until it is completed.  This is a dream, it has been so much fun and now we want people to join us in our quest.
Financial Goals - What the funding will achieve -

We currently have 4 main employees within the office.  Also on-board are 3 highly qualified  gaming programmers and an accountant - administrator who have all helped make the idea of Ninja Trail become a reality. 

We will be keeping our employee wages on the bare minimum to ensure all extra funds will make for a better game for our fans and supporters.  The kindly contributed  funds will give the Ninja Trail team more time to improve the game and also help with all the extra costs that pop up along the way. 

Everybody in our team are passionate about this project.  We would like to gain new followers and fans and grow with the idea and progression of the game.

 Programming is also a major chunk of our costs.  It is so important to fix the remaining bugs to provide a fully polished app game. By creating more levels, we can ensure a long lasting, fun experience for our gamers.
column10: >The in House coding and constant programming of the game is necessary to achieve the best gaming experience we can.
column19:
>As well as the function of multi-player, social media and completion of the 100 levels +400 more, this is the main reason for the funding.

Despite the short amount of time testers have played this game, the positive feedback and responses given back has proven that Ninja Trail is a highly addictive, challenging, strategic game which ensures why we are all so devoted to this project.

 We aim to have the game fully completed including marketing by the beginning of May 2015.  To the team this month is a realistic achievement and look forward to the positive respond we will get from the campaign.

What we need to complete the game - Cost Breakdown

Company employee wages - Competing with friends online function - Audio and sound FX - In game currency - Game testing - The completion of the 100 levels and to add another 400 levels to give players a long lasting experience - Extra Powerup abilities for players -  Better AI Guard features - Extra guard abilities and colours, different Ninja characters and different coloured footsteps.

Marketing 


We also need funding for marketing such as - Paid adds Facebook campaign - Paid adds Twitter campaign - Radio advertising - TV advertising - Newspaper advertising - Gaming blog advertising - Celebrity tweets - 6 more landing pages on top listings online - Paid review boards - Completion of website.

This is the final stage of the project.  We are currently trying to achieve the completion of the game, anything else is a bonus!!!!!!

Where the money will go once we achieve our goals -

column1:
Compared to other large games who have the financial backing to achieve world wide success, our dream once achieving this is to make a change.

We want to protect the world and help support charities that  keep the world green and create awareness about how humanity is destroying our beautiful planet.  We will give 10 percent of all our earnings to these charities and create world wide awareness for these causes because it is something that we feel extremely passionate about.

Please see links to these charities below -

Green Peace

Global Action Plan

Coral Reef Alliance


Press Releases - 

One Angry Gamer Blog Post -

http://blogjob.com/oneangrygamer/2015/02/ninja-trail-takes-the-pac-man-concept-and-evolves-it/

Other Ways you can help us!

Along with the contributions made, we also emphasis the importance of sharing and  publicising our campaign.  Please see the links at the top of the page for Facebook and Twitter.  

Any help we get in any way is greatly appreciated!  Sharing our information is just as important as contributions.

We are thankful for Indiegogo for giving us the platform to fund Ninja Trail and will keep you updated on the progression and new features for this game.


","Idea behind the game Ever tried to find a challenging, captivating, strategic, fun, puzzle/maze game on the App Store? - Well we tried and could not find one.  This is how the creation of Ninja Trail began.What type of game is Ninja Trail? Ninja Trail is a 2D visual game for those old school enthusiastic gamers.  The simplicity of Pac Man, addictiveness of Candycrush and an in game challenging concept - comparable to Angry birds, makes this a sure fire winner to be one of the high hitting games of 2015.Highly addictive and fun - Run! Dash and slide past guards in order for your ninja to fill in the trail with your footsteps to complete the level!Visually appealing to the eye, colourful, fun and bright, the game itself incorporates all the main key features of a game that you do not want to put down.There are 100 levels to complete - the levels get harder and harder as you go!Aim of the Game ............ Game Play Breakdown

Guide the Ninja through the maze, leaving footprints as you tread.  To complete the level you need to fully complete the maze in full with your footprints.  Pick up coins and gems along the way to gain in house purchases such as - By Pass Level, Extra Lives, Power Ups, etc.You also need to avoid the guards in each level which all have different capabilities -

These guards are scouters, once in the target area of a guard they will chase you.Red Guard  These guards are slower paced but throw Ninja Stars in your way so it is harder to lead them away from the trail.  Red Watch Tower Guard These guards spin around on the watch towers throwing Ninja Stars in your direction where the player is to try and stop you filling in the trail around that area.Purple Guard These guards are super fast - Be careful when close because it is hard to get away from them.Blue GuardThese guards have the ability of all other guards combined. The ultimate guards of the game.Other In Game Features to look out for...Features in game that can help the player -
Spinning Logs - The logs are an assist for the player to block the guards
Bushes - Bushes are an assist for the player to hide from the guards
Tele porter - Tele porter is an assist for the player to transport from one area of the maze to another
Red Gems - Collect 50 red gems to trade in for 1 Gold gem to buy yourself Lives/Powers Ups
Gold Gems - Gold gems are harder to find.  These gems help you to buy yourself Lives/Powers Ups
Coins - Coins give you extra points and shows the players skill level on each levelPower Ups
Invisibility - When using invisibility guards cannot see you and the player can walk through them
Freeze - This ability allows you to freeze the game whilst the player is still active.  The player can walk through guards when the game is frozen.
Speed Up - This Powerup gives you the ability to run faster through the maze.In game challenge features -
Spinning Spikes - Spinning spikes are placed on certain levels to challenge the players memory and to stop the player from completing the level.
Electric Fences - These are deadly fences that the player cannot run into.
Black Holes - These are black holes on certain levels - once fallen into the player looses a life.
Houses - Houses are on timers to generate guards when playing - listen out for the timer and stay away from them.
Character Selection - You can choose your character before playing - Pink or Black Ninja.
Slot Machine - Gives you a free spin for extra Lives/Powerups each day.
Facebook/Twitter - Share and send your friends lives if you are feeling kind and compete against your friends for the highest score.

We want the  game completed just as much as you do!!!
We want a fully functioning completed game for our fans to play -We have a fan base already and would like to fulfill what we have set out to do.
With crowd funding we can also create a strategic marketing campaign as well as finish the programming of the game itself.
We also can make changes if needed with your input  -  If our community feels that there needs to be changes within the game, big or small - we can do it together.

We feel that the last push is necessary to complete our goals and achievements.  Our input financially up until this stage has been phenomenal and we do not want to stop until it is completed.  This is a dream, it has been so much fun and now we want people to join us in our quest.

Ares Wings of Discord is a 3D game in the space shooter genre, which collected all the best that has ever been realized in the framework of this genre. The game will present you with many unique surprises designed to surprise and undoubtedly get fans of space shooters fall in love with it.

Representatives of the five mega-corporations led all mankind and made people look into deep space. People entered the phase of active colonization of our ""Milky Way"" galaxy and mining of its resources.
Labor is scarce and corporations decide to lift the ban on human cloning. Clones are created with improved genome and modular transplantation of organs, they are called Duplicates.
Mass distribution of duplicates brought mankind to a new level of evolution and prosperity.
Duplicates made the dirtiest and hardest work, and their work was equal to slave.
Duplicates were not happy about his.Uprisings begin at different ends of the universe.
Corporations send army units to suppress them.
In one of the sectors of ""Betta"" dimension, the duplicates manage to undermine the portal that leads to the ""Eye of the crow"" galaxy.
As a result, the forces of mankind have become cut off from the central command, and it did not make sense to wait for reinforcements.

300 years passed. Communication with the outside world is still absent, and no one knows about its fate. Mankind is firmly seated in the sector, having organized a powerful army and uninterrupted production of resources. Followers of the five corporations collaborate to create an empire called Oligarchy.

Revolution (Duplicates called that himself) decided to blow up one of the stars in the controlled sector. This star was extremely rich in minerals, and its explosion would undoubtedly attract the forces of Oligarchy. It was an ambush.
But things did not go according to plan. Unexplained things began to occur in the galaxy. Microportals (galactic holes) suddenly open, leading into the unknown sectors.

The ships of Oligarchy and Revolution were immediately losing their neural network as a result of strong gamma radiation. Nobody understood what caused this effect. Biodroids rebooted and lost memories. They acquired something inherent only to the people, namely the soul. None of the parties could find an explanation for this phenomenon.

3600. ""Emancipated"" (the name of biodroids who gained the soul) joined the ranks of Revolution and Oligarchy. Some of them still considered themselves a duplicate, guided by the fact that they have a synthesized modular body. Others likened themselves to people, because they had a soul now.  (See full Storiline in our site).

You start the game for the intelligence biodroid who was sent to take a soil sample from one of the asteroids. As a result of the production, you find some artifact, which reboots the system of the biodroid, and he regains consciousness. Commanders of Oligarchy and Revolution forces contact you immediately. You have to choose which of these factions to fight for.

Each faction has its own branch of the ships development and its own system of ranks. Each spacecraft can be improved and modified, improving armor and weapons. You will also find many additional boosts and weapons in the game, so that the battle would bring you maximum emotions and impressions.
The game world is divided into locations. Each location has its own gaming environment, scenery and objects. You can travel between the worlds through portals, mining resources and battling enemies.
You can open a special menu in the game to play the story quest, group mission, or participate in team battle.
As you can see, the game will be developed in three areas:
<ul><li>non-linear story quests written by science fiction author

Like in any game, the player has a lobby where they could catch a breath between battles. The player base consists of 3 rooms: the cabin, the terminal of events and the hangar. The cabin stores artifacts and collectibles of the player.
In the terminal, you can watch the latest events in the game, as well as get acquainted with the advertisements.
In the hangar, the player makes improvements to their ship and chooses weapons for their battles.

To date, the game is in a closed alpha testing. You can participate in it and share your impressions on our forum. We will inform you about new releases and our plans in the Newssection.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

After watching our game trailer you probably think whether these guys undertake too much. You know, this is an ambitious game requiring great efforts and cash investment. The more so, because we’ve already made a good start and that’s mean we’ve already expended a lot of money! What else could we ask for?

Figuratis technologies is rather a small studio. There are just 30 of us. And we used to develop 2D games for browsers and mobile devices. We started working on Ares project almost two years ago. We faced different challenges, but we overcame all the difficulties. As the result we assembled a very strong team of developers and obtained a lot of experience. Now it is the moment when we need to push our game.  The game is subsidized by a private investor. For now his input into the game averages a million dollars.  We hope our development reflects the expired costs. Our investor is a shrewd businessman and to continue the sponsorship he asked us to confirm the demand for our game. He wants to be sure that it will be really popular among space-shooty game fans. That’s why we decided to refer to the Indiegogo.

The sum we ask for is approximately 30% of our budget. However for our investor this will be a clear proof that the game is in demand. This  money is enough to release an alpha-version of the game, which can be played by space-shooty game fans so they would be able to tell their friends about the new game “Ares: Wings of discord”. Of course, this will give us as the developers the confidence to drive the nail home.

If we miss our chance to make up the sum, we will stop dreaming of making a full 3D game version in the space-shooter genre forever. We’ll return to our far-back 2D games development orders. But we truly believe in players’ strength and desire to have as much beautiful and interesting games as it is possible, especially in space genre!

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Figuratis technologies is a new independent game development studio. Previously, we have specialized in creating 2D and 3D browser-based games. We have extensive experience in creating simulations of ground and air equipment, sports managers and educational games. Thanks to the Unity 3D, we make games for PC, consoles, tablets, and mobile devices. But we have always wanted more – to create an exciting space action shooter and gain new fans. We are currently working on the game «Ares: Wings of discord».
We are pleased to introduce our top managers:

Our marketing guru. He found first investors for our project and continues to search new investors today. We are very grateful for his contribution to our business. You will always find a topic of conversation with this person, be it games, music, movies, and even politics.

The person who rallied our team. Games like Soccer Wars, Sporbet M, Formula V, Avia Wars and others were born under his command. At the moment, he puts himself and other employees of the company through the wringer to release this game.
Anton Shchukin, Producer and Author of the Idea.

The person who stands at the origins of this game. His ideas became the base for our gaming universe, development branch and the balance of the game. This is a rocket man who will pick you up and carry with him to meet the open space.
Oganes Arutyunyan, Head of Games and Applications Development Department.

More than 10 years of experience and about 20 released games and applications. All the beauty of the graphics and mastership of optimization is the merit of this person. He will create such a virtual world for you that you wouldn’t want to come back to the reality.
Pavel Inozemtzev, Director of Object Modeling and Animation Department.

Our creator and magician. For him, nothing is impossible in the simulation. You want a spaceship? You’ll get one! You want a star system with planets and asteroids? Here you are! You want a reactive carrot emitted in a rainbow? Here it is!

Author of numerous tracks for movies, games and commercials. This is our conductor of human emotions. The beauty of his music sinks into the soul. His music in the game will not leave you indifferent.

At the very beginning we invited a science-fiction writer to construct an interesting and catching plot for us. But creation of some scenes took loads of energy and time. That’s why we decided to make a full educational mission and then to release further missions in the new game patches. 
We’ve made a multiplayer with a huge game world consisting of several sectors, and for each of them the forces of Oligarchy and Revolution will fight. There will be team missions’ performance and collective battles, which are great favorites of players. Working out of game balance and gaining of equal experience, game currency and resources demand a considerable amount of time. 
We do our best to make this game suitable for everyone. But now it’s necessary that as many players as possible discover our game. We have prepared a browser game version, so that everyone could visit our website and play alpha version. You just start the game from any computer in any place of the world. This is the supercharge for our developers. We had to considerably scale down graphics’ quality so that you could play using the browser. But this is temporarily. If we are supported by players, we will release client-side game version for the PC and consoles with original graphics and plot. This will undoubtedly be one of the most beautiful and exciting games in this genre!

This will undoubtedly be one of the most beautiful and exciting games in this genre!",25.0,0,"1 Campaign

Coward is a game about the cows, peacefully living in the small green village. Eating grass and making milk is interrupted by flying UFO pod above our black and white spotted friends. This UFO pod is a game protagonist, which is you! You are the one who need to take as much cows as it possible. But it isn't as simple as it sounds, since the cow rebellion has been born. They want to prevent total cow extinction in their home village. So they fight against you. It isn't as hard to predict that you have to defend.
These are the maps and skins that will appear in Coward. You will have to unlock them by achieving ingame points!

Digital Graal team is 2 people in total. Krzysztof - graphic designer, and Tomek - programmer. We develop Coward from about a year. As soon as we drew on a napkin the first brown cow with TNT on it's back beign sucken by UFO chologram, we knew that we want to make game about it. We are not sure why exactly about it, but we believed in the idea. And now, the idea is getting shape that we have first imagined. But creating games is pretty expensive, especially when you are still a high school student, and you are just starting out with a first project, like us.

Our main goal is 1500$. It's enough to cover all the licenses and software, and hardware that we need. We really appreciate every help in our case, so if you want to take action in bringing this game to life, but you can't donate us, it's not a problem! You can help us out with sharing this campaign to a friend or on facebook!

We make this game for at least a year by now. We realised that making an indie game isn't a piece of cake as it seems to be. Especially when you have zero experience with developing games, total basic skill in programming and artistic soul, but also,  with basic drawing skills. But we managed to learn, learn, learn and learn. Designing was the funniest process, and most rewarding. We had tons of ideas, many times I have woke up in the middle of the night with blink of idea about new feature to a cows, and ran as fast as I could to draw it in our concept arts schedule. Right after designing, a programming and testing chapter came by, and it was painful. Many hours of sitting at one problem, which lead to another, and another, and another... Game is still in progress, but even if we doesn't hit our 1500 dollar goal, we will do this game anyway. Right now, it's somehow a part of our lives (even if it isn't the best game in the world).
Main risk is that we won't get funded, but we will create this game anyway. If it necessary, even in the next century.

• The Books of Egu is a series of fictional video games and interactive content inspired by the New Testament. Our mission is to make the Bible cool again by introducing play to the scriptures. It takes players on an interactive visual novel adventure filled with adrenaline, puzzling mysteries, and animated stories. We are offering the principals in order to promote Christianity in video games. Today, most kids and young adults would rather interact and learn from stories in video games or animations than to read the stories in the Bible. This is because the way we interact with the Bible are outdated. Where's the fun? The Books of Egu is an alternative way to experience the Bible by bringing play into the equation.
• Award Winning Director: 2018 Los Angeles Animation Festival Humanitarian Award
• Bachelor’s Degree:  Digital Media Arts from Duquesne University
•  Website | Instagram
The first Book in the Books of Egu is ""When I Get Free"".

column4: >Download and play ""When I Get Free"" today from the App Store

column1: Download and play ""When I Get Free"" today from the Google Play Store

column2: >Download and play ""When I Get Free"" today for your PC and MAC computer

column1: • Our main characters are Judas, Peter and John the Baptizer (left to right). They are wrongfully imprisoned inmates inside the Penitentiary within the city of Nemean. Together, they come up with an elaborate plan to escape toward a Messiah who's supposed to save them.

• Breaking out of a city wide prison is no easy task. No inmate has ever escaped the high level security from the Enforcers around Nemean. However, with the Games coming to town, everybody will be focused on that. John, Peter and Judas see this as an opportunity to evade the Enforcers but they need to create more distractions.

• Peter's mission is to become the ""rabbit"". He gets into a car and begins a high speed chase with Enforcers around the city. As he drives, he also destroys the Power Stations fueling the security around the city. While all eyes are on Peter in the car and John at the stadium, Judas is working behind the scenes.

• Episode 2 focuses on the present stage with the shocking arrest of John the Baptizer. Herod and the Union move into crowd control and Saul is presented as the lead investigator of the Nemean Escape. Saul discovers that during the car chase, someone broke into the Security Tower and scrambled the system allowing many inmates to escape including John, Peter and Judas. His mission is to figure out how and why.
• Saul finds footage of Judas breaking into the Security Tower. The investigation unravels as you piece together what happened that night in Nemean.

• Herod and Saul plot against the Messiah. His lawsuit against the Union for the false imprisonment of John the Baptizer is a problem for Herod. Saul sees closing this case as a new opportunity to reach the height of his career, as a Minister.

• We released the beta version of Episode 1 and 2 on the app store. Episode 3 and 4 are the last half of this book. In these episodes, John reveals how he ends up in Nemean, Peter escapes from Nemean, Judas seeks revenge and goes against John's plan, Saul concludes his investigation to a shocking discovery and the Messiah is baptized as the new leader of Babylon.  Expected for release in 2020.
• We want you to be a part of this production process. Your pledge will contribute to:

column2: >- Tools and Equipment(ie. laptops, adobe creative cloud fees, Unity fees, etc)

column1: • We invite people to download, test and review our game. We need beta testers and their feedback to make sure we elevate this game to its highest level. Download and play the app(link above), then please answer the questions(below) in 3-6 minute video and email it to whenigetfree92@gmail.com

column2: >- Make sure the video is clean(no visual interference or distractions)
>- Make sure the audio is clean and there’s no background noise
>- Be yourself and please be honest. Answer each question with more than one sentence.
>- Which religion do you identify with? or Atheist? Agnostic?
>- What did you like about the game?
>- What do you wish it had more of?
>- What do you think about the representation of the main characters?
>What do you think is the overall message of the game so far?
>- Does the game make you want to know more about the Bible?

Our main characters are Judas, Peter and John the Baptizer (left to right). They are wrongfully imprisoned inmates inside the Penitentiary within the city of Nemean. Together, they come up with an elaborate plan to escape toward a Messiah who's supposed to save them.

Breaking out of a city wide prison is no easy task. No inmate has ever escaped the high level security from the Enforcers around Nemean. However, with the Games coming to town, everybody will be focused on that. John, Peter and Judas see this as an opportunity to evade the Enforcers but they need to create more distractions.

Peter's mission is to become the ""rabbit"". He gets into a car and begins a high speed chase with Enforcers around the city. As he drives, he also destroys the Power Stations fueling the security around the city. While all eyes are on Peter in the car and John at the stadium, Judas is working behind the scenes.

Episode 2 focuses on the present stage with the shocking arrest of John the Baptizer. Herod and the Union move into crowd control and Saul is presented as the lead investigator of the Nemean Escape. Saul discovers that during the car chase, someone broke into the Security Tower and scrambled the system allowing many inmates to escape including John, Peter and Judas. His mission is to figure out how and why.
Saul finds footage of Judas breaking into the Security Tower. The investigation unravels as you piece together what happened that night in Nemean.

column2:
>Sunny day in the Forest.

Smalland is a survival game where you're shrunk down to the size of tiny creatures. Try to survive among the giant animals. Protect yourself from huge raindrops,  build your buildings that can survive against strong winds. Defend your food and your home from the hungry ant colonies.

With up to 8 player co-op support, connect with your friends through an endless adventure and challenge that will test more than your skill! 

The idea of Smalland was a passion for us, we could combine the features we haven't seen in many survival games. We made a decision in January of 2017 and we started developing Smalland project.

Just as many of you've done, we played some of the survival games and noticed we can add more features that we really want to see. A survival game that has great ecosystem and weather conditions that affect everything in the world.

It sounds great? Definitely.

So we decided to make this idea real.
column3:
>
Ants are bringing the foods to their colony.

An ordinary day in the Forest.
column4:
>Too much rain and a bit wind

The problem we see in some survival games is not having enough interaction with the world. Weather conditions or that kind of things are not affecting you most of the time.

At this point, we've shrunk down you to the size of tiny animals and we forced ourselves into improving interaction issues. Weather conditions' results couldn't be ignored anymore. That was a great challenge, but we love that. 

This project started developing with two friends at January 19th. We were talking about survival games while waiting our delayed flight in İstanbul. While discussing how survival games could be better, we found ourselves talking about survival game that combined with shrunken people. We found that idea very excited and we start to work.

We have already done some small projects with the Unreal Engine. These were more for learning purposes and none were shared. We've created the basics of the game and we're starting to develop them.

Within a short time, we had a nice, stable working demo. Our ecosystem was very primed yet, but seeing our stuff was great. We were excited.

We continued to develop the basics of the project, and we reached the stage we could show you. Then we realized that we need a budget to develop a much more detailed game.

Also, everything we showed so far has been done about 10 months, so we have no doubt we can finish the work.

We are ambitious, and we know, with your help everything is possible.

The most important thing that defines the world of Smalland is that things get crazy when you shrunk.

This concept provides us an incredible space. We can make a pretty spirited nature, use other animals that we don't often see and change the rules of survival. It is possible to make a lot of creative stuff in The World of Smalland.

 

So we started to design the world. You were small. That means tall grasses, giant animals, and too much space. This factor changed every rule. For example, you wouldn't be concerned about foods, because if you could find an apple and keep it, you wouldn't be hungry for a long time.

But that was not all. 

Everything that we put on the map should have an effect on gameplay. For example, when it rains in game, nature becomes foggy and you hear the rain sound. It's not usually more than visual and atmosphere. But when you become small, rain can hurt you. You can see so many things that are affected by rain. And we can use all of these details on Smalland's world

Apart from these, if you just want to look around, we have breathtaking graphics that we really work on it. You can watch the life of nature or the sunset of the sun with the Peaceful mode.

And downsizing gives you an opportunity to enter and explore many places where people of normal size cannot do. Just in case, make sure you do not enter into the sewer when it's rainy.

Strong Ecosystem:  Imagine every animal in the world trying to survive. Even you don't do anything, they will continue their life. Ants take food to their nests for preparation. Mice are hunted by cats and life goes on.

In this harsh world, you have to get to the top of the food chain as a tiny human. Life goes on while you're in a tree's branch or sleeping among the grasses. The world is full of life and struggle. And you are part of this.

By the way, be ready when you're done with your building. You can be visited by ants or other hungry animals.

High-Detailed Weather System: In Smalland, The Weather is more than just a feature. As the weather conditions directly determine the behaviors of the animals, it makes nature incredible change. The Rain can turn the terrain into a pond. Weather conditions are important elements that you have to be really careful.
column5:
>
After the rain, places were flooded

Flood System:  When it rains for a time, low or pitch surfaces can be flooded.  If you've built your house on some of the low surfaces or you've forgotten to put the roof and it's raining, you can lose your house, your items etc. How much it will damage depends on rain type and how long it happens. So rains could be really dangerous.

For now, this system is not physical because of optimization issues and we don't have enough knowledge. With the campaign, we can have a shot to make it physical.
column6:
>Treehouse that is blown by The Wind

Wind System One of our earliest planned features. If the wind is strong enough, it can blow so many things away. Your items, your body, even your building.  So when you build something, you must choose the right place or make your building strong enough. If you are outdoors, trees or giant things can be a lifesaver.

And don't forget, you can make the wind your friend and you can have fun with it.

Building System: While we're developing the Building System, we wanted to keep it simple for players, so we separated the interface of building system from Inventory and when we opened the building menu, we let you go to building mode and that made things easy for players. Now you don't have to break the walls which you didn't like, you can just open the building menu and you can add new structures, change their locations, repair or destroy them with the simple interface.

Along with all this, the Building System shows you the weak places in your building, calculate your buildings' total power or defense points, even it shows the parts of the house where cannot stop the wind. That's more than just a building system.
column7:
>
Stealing Eggs

Hunting: Little people also have to hunt. As you can hunt insects on the ground, you can climb huge trees to steal delicious bird eggs. But that would certainly be challenging for you. Hunting is most fun and dangerous face of the game.
column8:
>
Train on the tree

Rail System: To admit, we've added this feature to have fun. If you can find a toy train, you must figure out the energy problem and build train tracks, you can use your train. Or you can just build train tracks and use mine carts. In the huge map of the game, you can quickly reach from one point to another and you can carry your things into wagons. It makes things safer, but you should still be careful. If it's a windy day and your train is moving on the tree, you can find yourself in the river.
column9:
>
Race of River

River Race: Are you bored and do you want to do something exciting? Angry River is waiting for you. You must find something that keeps you on the water's surface and you should call your friends. But we must warn you, this is a survival game and these races may cause death. you know how the danger can make things fun.

Co-op: Connect with your friends through an endless adventure and challenge that will test more than your skill! Check the leaderboard to see where you rank around the world. If you don't care the leaderboard, it's not a problem. Enjoy!

Creativity has been one of the most important things for us. Because there are lots of survival games and we wanted to make this one different. We had an idea about improving the gameplay of course, but it wouldn't be enough without an idea. So we shrunk you and everything has been changed. - It wouldn't easy like I said - For releasing the game, we designed a map which called ""Lake Side Cabin"" that you're mostly in wild forest. But that doesn't mean it will be the only map.

Let's dream together.

The first thing that came to our minds was throwing down shrunken people into an apartment or a city's center. When we imagined how much the rules of the game could change in this case, we realized that Smalland's concept offered us great opportunities. 

Smalland is being developed with the contribution of a lot more people than the two-man developer team. From the name of our game to the flood system, many of our features came from our brilliant community that is following our project. This proved us how important the community is and how successful we will be together.

Join us and we'll make a great game with you. Share your ideas, ask your questions, discuss features that we made and we will do. Let's take a decisions together, and create a game we all love. 

Everything we've done so far has been with no budget. That means we had so many things to do. We will have much more time and resources to finish the features that we planned and make a product that we'd actually enjoy. We'll be able to hire people, use new technologies. We want to make this happen and we need your help.

 

Pledges

We are two people and we want to spend our time improving the game for you. Physical pledges such as cups, t-shirts or printings could take a lot of time and cause tons of trouble, so we didn't want to offer physical pledges.

What kind of pledge are we offering?

What we are offering to you is the game which is spent more time on it. When we release the game during the early access period, we want to give you the best Smalland experience with the least problem. We are offering a mention in the game credits as a backer in Smalland game platform, Your help is very important for us, and we'll do our best.

10 top backers will hold the top place in the backer’s section in the game credits and on the website.

We prepared an FAQ section for Indiegogo campaign and Pledges.

BUDGET

With the budget, we'll have an opportunity for developing the features that we promised. We'll hire people, and that will allow us to focus more on gameplay and we can finish things earlier then we planned. From new graphics technologies to better software, we'll be able to access everything we needed.

It's a simple breakdown of how we will use the budget.

There are also many other features we want to add to the game. We listed them for you. If you support us beyond the project's goal, we will use these additional resources to grow our studio to make our work faster and adding new features that can make the game better.

 

We are an enthusiastic and passionate team of two people who have made small game projects for learning purposes. We are now developing Smalland and we want to introduce ourselves to you!
column10: />
column13: ' target=""_blank"">
column15: ' target=""_blank"">
column17:
' target=""_blank"">


 

Our system requirements based on of the Unreal Engine 4 recommended specifications. They are subject to change based on further development.

column1: • Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
• NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.

This is our first PC game but...   
We've made a few learning projects so far. But what really matters is that since 19th January 2017, we reached the features we showed on this page and the video. So we have no doubt we can finish this project.

We are a team of two, but...
Everything starts with two people and we made so many things together. We must grow the team now and with this campaign, we'll do this.  We didn't have a chance beforehand.

We don't have any budget, but...
This is the main reason to be here.

 

There will be multiplayer?
Yes, we're supporting 8-player co-op. 

Will there be modding support for the game?
It's one of our goals. If we can reach to Mod Support Goal, we'll release the game as moddable.

Which languages will be supported officially?
English at first release.  
Turkish, French, German, Japanese, Russian, Chinese, Spanish to be added after final release.

We plan to share language files for translators, if you want to translate into your language, you can contact us. We'll put you on the list and send you the files before it will be ready.

When will this game be released?
Release date is planned for late 2018

Will there be Linux or Mac version?
Only Windows version is planned at this moment.
Other platforms are to be determined in the future.

Will SMALLAND be available on the consoles?
We really want to get the game onto consoles. However, this is really hard for our small team and we must focus on the game itself. For now, it's not possible. We'll determine in the future.

There will be Early Access or open Alpha?
Early Access is planned and alpha will be closed.
There will be a closed Beta for people who backed with the beta access reward.

I need more details about you.
For now, we didn't create Embu studios' website. But you can visit our Presskit which is in Smalland website.

What engine are you using?
Unreal Engine.

What about Paypal?
Unfortunately, Paypal is not available in Turkey. But you can use Google Wallet and it's super easy. Every pledge we prepared for Indiegogo is same for Google Wallet.

playsmalland@gmail.com is our e-mail address. For more information.

How can I get in contact with you for business or press purposes?
You can email us.

playsmalland@gmail.com

Indiegogo

When will perks be sent to us?
In summer of 2018. But if the game will be ready to release in summer, we'll send your perks a month ago.

What does ""Every perks before this!"" mean?
We wanted to keep list simple, so we put it on the list. That means you'll receive every perks before this. But this doesn't mean you'll get items double times or more.

For example, if you choose the Ant Valley's Lord perk which has ""15x Redeemable Game Key"", you will not have ""8x Redeemable Game Key"" of Egg Hunter. You will get everything except of it.

Why items are mostly digital?
We want to focus on the game itself, and people in here wants to play a good game. So managing physical gifts is very time consuming.

Can I sell my keys?
You can do everything you want with your keys.

Do I have a chance to choose my sketch gift?
Yes, but we didn't put all of them into our pages. But when you see our one of the sketchs, you can just ask for it! 

Can I get physical items in anywhere?
Yes, ships are worldwide.

I have a question but I didn't find it.
We'd glad to answer your questions. You can send us e-mail or reach us on social media or Indiegogo.
