Real Health Coaches For You!
There are so many challenges to achieving a healthier life. Health Coach For You is the first unique approach to reaching your goals.
Continuing the momentum of the award-winning Portion Size Me: A Kid Driven Plan for a Healthier Family, co-author Alexandra Reid has created the Health Coach For You App.

Health Coach for You is revolutionary because it allows you to assemble a team of certified, licensed, and insured health care professionals based on your personal health goals. This integrative Health Coach TEAM will fully support you and your health goals.

And best of all, your Health Coach Team is always
as close as your smart phone.

Health Coach For You is a unique platform that puts you directly in touch with your Health Coaches daily.  Giving you the tools you need to manage your life and goals successfully. A fully integrated, real life support system like never before.

column8: >rom weight-loss to mindfulness, stress reduction to sleep improvement, and more,
column15: > provides positive support and helps you create the short and long-term goals you want for a happier HealthStyle.

column1:
Yes! That's roughly cheaper than two gourmet coffees or two drive-through combo meals a week!

Additionally, our business and coaching model brings new part-time employment opportunities to Allied Health Professionals around the world.

To be honest, we need you! We need your financial contribution AND your support by sharing this with your friends and family. We are already developing our App and are close to completing our front end and back end wire-frames. We are on target (with funding) to have this beta tested (Summer 2015) and ready for launch the beginning of next year.
We need your donation, please, to continue our development as scheduled.

We need you to spread the word to friends and family. We all know someone who has goals. See their reaction when they discover solutions in our support never provided before.  They will thank you too for helping make this happen.
Imagine changing the face of an increasing global health concern with long-term behavior modification never seen before AND  providing jobs to a segment of the professional working population.

column3: > provides users with a chance to u-turn their personal challenges in achieving healthier lives reducing health care costs,  increasing work performance and decreasing absenteeism.

column1: Our biggest challenge is raising the capital we need to complete the App and that's why we need you! We also want to have the necessary funds to pay the taxes and awards for this campaign.  At this point nobody in this corporation is taking any salary, we believe in it that much and want to use every resource possible to complete this  and fulfill our business model.

Some  just can't contribute yet we think you understand the importance of an App like this, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about our campaign, many times over during the campaign and after
• Use the Indiegogo share tools! They're really great.
• Share our beautiful motivational photography with your social media and add our crowdfunding link to it, or add it to you blog.  FYI all the photography is done by one of team members.

We need help funding our first Mobile game. It is a open world 3D Zombies FPS. 

If we raise enough to hire the two new programmers we need the game will launch on September 1st of 2015 with updates every month. 

Shipping for Rewards is $20 to everywhere in the world. Items will ship out August 1st 2015

We would also love your input on how you think the game should be along with what you would love to see in the game. 

Please Email US @ Nightimegaming@gmail.com

Head on over to our Facebook page for the latest news and updates.

https://www.facebook.com/zombiesneverdieofficial

Head on over to our website for more of the latest news and updates as well as forums for help, contests and our shop (shop will be open September 1st 2015)

What is Zombies Never Die?  

Zombies Never Die is a massive Mobile FPS Open World Game. Users of all skill levels can fight hordes of Zombies and Zombie Bosses, while trying to stay alive. You roam around the city collecting parts upgrading your weapons, cars and air planes. You start out in a safe house and you must first turn the power to the city which unlocks all the computers in town which will give you access to the internet which allows players to buy new guns, cars and airplanes. As well as upgrades and perks.

Vision

Zombies Never Die is the Next big Mobile Zombies game. The main game on mobile will be free with paid in app purchases. 

Game Features

Zombies Never Die has features that make playing fun for everyone of all ages.

This is the first game in an ongoing game series that is created for a target audience of ages 14-24. However, older generations may also find the series enticing. We have almost all watched survival shows on TV and at one point or another thought either “I bet I could do that” or “What would it be like to be stranded?” The premise behind the game series is to test and train the player in different survival skills and tactics ranging from beginner to advanced, while at the same time allowing the player to feel that they are really playing an epic game. The ultimate result will be that though the player is having a great time, they will be walking away knowing potentially more than they did when they started playing the game.



In addition to the Perks for the different sponsorship levels, you will receive the following e-coupon to our online store at the time of your donation.  This coupon will be good for use until August 30, 2015.




______________________________________

Thatchfire Innovation, LLC is a pioneering game company whose mission is to dramatically re-engineer the idea of the world has about games in today's society. We strive to will bring both the passion displayed by gamers for epic games and the intellectual learning ability gaming offers and deliver it to players of all ages and skill levels. 

Many of the conceptual ideas that are being developed by Thatchfire Innovation, LLC offer unique perspectives on past industry ideas and propose a shift from the current state of gaming to something that is on a much higher level than ever expected. We want to make games that people want to play because they enjoy them, not because they feel they have to because it's the latest version or a new release with new features and rehashed material is available. Thatchfire Innovation, LLC sees the gaming community and realizes they want more
column2:
it is our goal to deliver that. 

Thatchfire Innovations, LLC focuses on the development and release of learning games to the market. Each game will be designed to focus on teaching and testing a person's abilities in different areas. From survival, culture and language to a wide range of effective learning tools in our in-school educational games which range from preschool to college level play.

For games that matter, delivered by developers who are passionate about their audience, there is only one
column3: Thatchfire Innovation, LLC. Experience gaming on a new level today.

column1: The Future of Gaming is Here Today

As a leading gaming technology development center, Thatchfire Innovations, LLC has placed itself alongside some of the world's most prevalent visionaries and idea makers to bring about a change in the way the world sees gaming and the gaming community.

As a young company, Thatchfire Innovations, LLC has the talent and the resources to showcase our abilities for the world stage. Founder and CEO, Makanalani Thatcher relies heavily on her industry experience and innovative ways of thinking to ensure the long term success and sustainability of her company. Many of her design and creation ideas are currently in development and scheduled for release over the coming year of 2015.
A Fresh Take on the Industry

Many of these ideas that are being currently developed for release have unique perspectives on old industry ideas and aim to move the world of gaming into a new era by combining epic gaming with intellectual learning and bridging the gap between the two. This is a necessary and relevant mission that the industry needs not only to survive, but to thrive in the ever-changing gaming climate that we are facing today.

Thatchfire Innovations, LLC provides the industry with a wide range of offerings that can only be described as ground-breaking and inimitable. To see the future of gaming, one only needs to visit Thatchfire Innovations, LLC and experience it for themselves.

A sidescrolling fantasy-horror RPG

 

An endless nightmare awaits Johanna Prokuri
Once she was a brilliant construct artificer, but her creativity has been gone for a long time already.

Way too long, as she willingly accepts a pact with a charismatic mole known as Montgomery. He promises that she will find new inspiration and will soon be capable of creating the most dangerous machines. All she has to do in exchange is to help him hunt Dream Demons when she dreams.
Yet further problems spawn ahead as a heinous experiment takes place in Donnerwald and a gigantic magical barrier threatens to implode and take the live of all people inside Donnerwald.

Johanna Prokuri
A young mechanic who loves creating strange and powerful constructs.
She's often daydreaming and values results more than ethics.

         Montgomery
A charismatic mole who guides Johanna on her journey. He claims to be a Dream Demon hunter and seems to be able to pull out items out of nowhere.
column3:
/>Ralf the Rabbit
A happy little bunny with healing abilities who enjoys everything life has to offer.

         Mr.Spook
An apparition from another world and one of the many Dream Demons Johanna will have to face.

Marx
A so called ""Gri"" who's allergic to sunlight and very shy.
He can transform his parasol into a weapon.

Crow
Can fly away.

 

-Features-

column1: • A turn-based combat system with action commands.
• Different endings and story paths depending on the choices made.
• Build and modify constructs that serve as partners in battle.
• Orchestral soundtracks, many of them composed by Bartosch McCarthy and Sonorode.
• Many quirky characters, all with their own goals, fears and dreams.

At initial release the game will support 2 languages, English and German. Additional languages may follow depending on demand.
Planned platforms are Windows PC and Mac OS.
 

-Battle system-
Similar to the Paper Mario series, most attacks and items have action commands.

Swinging the hammer requires to press the shown direction keys in time. Failing to do so reduces the damage dealt.

 

If you want to hit someone with a stone move the cursor into the circle.
Especially against flying enemies this is easier said than done.
When enemies are attacking you may either choose to block, or evade. Blocking is easier but less helpful than straight up evading the incoming attack.
So far I've invested over 2400€ into this project financing it with my part time job and the revenue from my first game.

But for the project to continue and finish in a reasonable time, I'm in need of additional funds. Borrowing it from the bank always comes with high risks and seeing how other great RPGs were made possible due to all the generous people supporting their kickstarting campaigns, I'll put all of my faith into this one.

The game uses a mixture of sprites and handdrawn tiles. Sprites highlight interactable objects and NPCs while tiles on the other hand are mostly for atmospheric purposes. But making quality tiles (and especially sprites) takes a lot of time and money, so I want to invest the lion share from your contributions into art.

 

Converting this construct into a sprite might be the hardest and most expensive thing to do, yet it should be worth it.
Speaking of constructs, please check out the gallery for this campaign, as there are additional concept artworks for constructs and characters.

For the soundtracks, most important characters have a unique battle theme.

The ratio for ""battle-theme"" and all other soundtracks (including sounds) is planned to be around 40/60.

column1:
-About myself-

I'm a young freelance game developer from Germany who's ready to make a  memorizable game for the world.

My first game ""Sanatory Hallways"" for the Wii U was my first small step into the world as game dev and now with The Donnerwald Experiment I plan to make a notable impact in the Indie scene.

I was already a gamer at a young age starting with the SNES.
Over the years my love for RPGs skyrocketed with Chrono Trigger, Secret of Mana and Pokémon and lately LISA the painful RPG as well as Undertale.
Especially the Paper Mario series holds a special place in my heart and is the main inspiration for this project.

Once we have a like minded Gaming company on board that's where the real fun begins.

>

THE GAME

The story of Jinko breaks into 7 acts, each with its own genre of gameplay and unique design. As the story unfolds new characters rise and join your team, each offering a set of skills that Jinko can use and further develop. The opportunity for exploration is huge. From the densely populated Rat City through to the tribes of the impure there is no shortage of hidden secrets. 

THE STYLE

The animation style combines CGI, 2-D, stop-motion and puppetry. The story is not time specific. Design style blends familiar but distorted reality with total fantasy.  Jinko’s journey unfolds in two contrasting worlds, each with multiple locations ranging from grand scale to the intimate. 

THE FEATURE

Story synopses and draft beats already exist making Jinko ideal for an animated feature at 110 minutes. This has primarily been created to explore the greater depths of the gameplay and feed into the cut scene potential. The story breaks into five acts with a prologue and epilogue. Each act is constructed chapter style, with transitions that create the ability for believable leaps in time and location as needed.
column4:
/>

Jinko is a mixed media fantasy adventure game for young adults.

The protagonist is Jinko—an orphaned sea gypsy in search of her origin and an escape from the demons that plague her from within. The player shares Jinko’s experiences at the ages of 5, 8 and 15 years old. Intelligent and canny from the outset, she further develops her special abilities in order to face her darkest challenge.

The antagonist is a vicious carnivorous Witch, at war with a crazed puppet Queen. In a futile battle of vanity and greed they threaten to destroy the subterranean paradise—a beautiful, but dangerous place at the centre of a world where lakes of molten opal lap at the edges of crystalline volcanoes, coral forests and upside-down, contorted glacial valleys.   

Jinko can’t allow this unique world to suffer the fate of the one she has come from. She will challenge the Witch and the Queen under pirate law. Snakes and ladders, winner takes all! In resolving the conflict Jinko discovers this underground Eden is where she rightfully belongs. 

(1) STORY and SCRIPT (teaser)

Confirm relevant story revisions and conform to final pass on teaser script. Prep for voice record.

(2) PRODUCTION DESIGN (teaser)

Finalise character design from early development conformed to recent research. Lead, secondary and incidental characters. Prep for storyboard needs first.

Complete ‘above’ and ‘below’ world locations. Hero beats first, transitional second. Transitional pieces are for time distance and scale. Establish schematics and light direction, identify special conditions.

(3) ART DIRECTION (teaser)

Produce character color-all (take 01). Detail the hero locations and confirm additional light direction/atmospherics/FX (take 01).

(4) STORYBOARD/COLOR SCRIPT (teaser)

Plot the character beats, construct the stage, create the cinematic language and broad-stroke color for palette and light direction.

(5) VOICE RECORD/EDIT/MUSIC/FX (teaser)

Edit to beats and identify points of additional performance required and/or desired.

(6) ADDITIONAL POSING/REVISE BOARD (teaser take 02/03)

Key poses to enhance performance and establish additional character ticks.

(7) FINAL MUSIC-FX-EDIT

Production ready.

column1: $400.00   BRING ME THE HEAD OF JINKO

You can only go so far with a pen. In the hands of a talented sculptor you can speak louder with clay than words. For that reason Hayley Egan started on these without final design to see which direction it might fall into. All part of the organic process.

column2: >There's so much great information out there for just about anything you need to know that I thought it worthwhile to focus on what I know best, the scribble factor.   I truly believe that the more fast and furious technique becomes available, the greater the need for basics. I’m happy to chat at length about the things that have helped me.

column1: I have quite a number of sketch books surrounding the JINKO project but this one that contains the very first, complete story outline in pictures and notes, all hand-done in ink and pencil. The notes have an inbuilt security system in that they are largely unreadable. (after all it was only me that had to read them! )Though the story has developed into a very different space, the early designs for characters, locations and set ups remain largely intact.  The outline wraps up just past halfway with the rest of the book containing random notes and designs. Some are more significant than others, but they all have the energy of the story.

This book has travelled first class, been lost on a Hong Kong ferry and worked in more cafes than a hyperactive barista.  It is very special to me for many reasons and as much as I don’t want to let it go, I think it has a special value in contributing to the further development of JINKO.

Creator – Deane Taylor

Deane Taylor is an award winning animation veteran who has worked on over 400 hours of television, ranging from The Flintstones through to Ren and Stimpy, Cow and Chicken and Figaro Pho. His most notable achievement was that of Art Director on Tim Burton’s Oscar nominated classic animated feature The Nightmare Before Christmas, which he regards as the most personally satisfying project of his career.
Jinko has been in development for around ten years using a ‘slow cooker’ approach, according to Taylor.

‘For many years, I’ve wanted to tell Jinko’s story. Its appeal to me is in its ability to entertain while having a strong conscience. The story is about the futility of greed, and in deciding how best to illustrate this I’ve chosen animation. The language will be a carefully orchestrated blend of cinema and theatre, with a richly caricatured style which highlights the folly of the theme.’

The strategy in building Jinko’s story was to treat it as a film first and a game second.  Regardless of the final product being one or the other, story is the critical factor and the film process is the most appropriate way to tell that.

The basic framework is a trilogy. Jinko’s journey takes us through her early life in a decayed and dying world followed by her years in captivity and, finally, to her discovery of a magical hidden paradise.
A five-act structure allows elements to unfold in an episodic chapter style, which easily adapts to the needs of gameplay.
Eddy Taylor trained at NIDA in Sydney and holds a Bachelor of Dramatic Arts.

He has worked on a number of features including Pirates of the Caribbean, Australia, Gods of Egypt, Unbroken, and the Wolverine films. Eddy is involved with Jinko’s story development and gameplay design. Unencumbered by the shackles of tradition, he brings fresh angles to the process.

‘I’ve watched this project develop over the last ten years and have found myself lost within Deane’s mind. There's an endless labyrinth of stories to be told—far too many stories for a feature film. When I joined this project two years ago I opened Deane’s eyes to the possibilities of the game industry. I believe this direction offers the opportunity for the player to truly immerse themselves in the world of Jinko.’

The multifaceted nature of this project means it is an epic production requiring vigilant management and a well-calculated rollout. It’s a matter of control and containment while allowing organic growth. Too often good ideas don’t make it into the final product, usually because of oversight. For that reason the focus will be targeted on the pre-production elements and storyboard. This is the foundation for everything and time will be spent to honour the work already created.

Once we have a like minded Gaming company on board that's where the real fun begins.

There are four different designs which is our way of somewhat individualising the email you receive. A small gesture to express our genuine thanks.

The support cast are a rich and varied mob, largely crafted on the fly while illustrating story-point. At other times they're created ahead of time to build a look and feel for a sequence. Whatever the point of origin, these guys are an all-important part of the production.

The lead characters are created in exactly the same way as the other cast with the exception that their deeper secrets are explored and their personalities exposed.    A lot more posing, a lot more expression, a lot more attention to costume. All the things that feed into creating a believable, engaging character.

These are from the 'all sorts' basket. Character art, notes, locations, ideas. All of it is relevant as part of the organic nature of design and will feed into the final product.
From the same basket, a little more developed. Some say a little prettier because of the colour and tone. I’d agree with that. Colour and tone is what knits the loose lines together.
Why are these my favourites? I take them everywhere I go. These drawings have flown first class, travelled on trains, been lost on Chinese ferries and sat in more cafes than George Clooney.

Orange Moon, 2d action platformer game with RPG elements and puzzles, full of dangerous native life forms, raiders, remnants of alien civilization and harsh environments. Search for a new life and natural resources, deploy beacons for mining drones, and find ancient alien artifacts that will help you in your exploration of Orange Moon. Augment your explorer to make him suitable for upcoming challenges, upgrade weapons and ammunition with ancient alien technologies and materials that you'll find in your journey.

Ive been working on Orange Moon for almost 1.5 years. In that time the game was Greenlit on Steam, 2 level demo completed and available on Itch.io, third level is on the way with new monsters, weapons, puzzles and mini boss. Orange Moon was also mentioned by Rock,Paper, Shotgun.

I need your support to continue work on development and finish the game much faster, hire composer and animators and cover the promotional expenses. Any amount that you could pledge would help me a lot.


Game Features
<li>7 weapon types, each with its own ammunition and upgrades
<li>Upgradable weapons and ammo - more than 50 upgrades combined
<li>Carrying capacity for ammunition upgrades - 12 upgrades for each type
<li>Different ammunition types - incendiary, explosive, armor piercing
<li>World inhabited by different types of enemies, from carnivorous plants to smart robotic mining equipment

<li>Each enemy has its own weaknesses and powers. Most enemies can be killed with different types of weapons, but only one is most efficient against each given monster. Some types of monsters are even immune to particular damage and using weapon with that damage would be a waste of precious ammunition
<li>Buy ammunition and upgrades for score earned by killing monsters and collecting resources and finding secrets

<li>Different types of hazardous environments. Acid swamps, moving toxic clouds, deep craters with deadly inhabitants which nobody had survived to tell about, plants that burn under your feet, all these will introduce additional challenge to a player
<li>Unlock new weapons with Moon Resources Corp. points
Ambient music track from the game:
column6:
schema=youtube"" width=""580"">

Enemies

Orange moon is full of life, from carnivorous plants to intelligent robotic mining equipment. Each enemy type requires different approach to be dealt with. Most enemies can be killed with different types of weapons, but only one is most efficient against each given monster. Some types of monsters are even immune to particular damage and using weapon with that damage would be a waste of precious ammunition.

Some of the monsters of Orange Moon shown on the images below.

Loader - abandoned biomechanoids, which were used as an auxiliary in mining operations. Wide range melee, uses flamethrower at range. Heavy armored and slow moving. Head of Loader is unprotected, making it vulnerable to damage. Explodes when destroyed with grenade.  Drops fuel if killed with headshot.

Moon Piranha - small, size of a football, carnivorous creature, which travels in groups in search for food. Has low damage and health. Vulnerable to all damage types. Player receives 1 point for each killed piranha.

Recycler (Boss) - moderately intelligent machine used to clean up mining areas from debris. Armed with stone cutter, laser cutter/drill, two arms, cannon and flamethrower.




Environment

Acid

column1: swamps, moving toxic clouds, deep craters with deadly inhabitants which
nobody had survived to tell about, ground that burns under your feet, carnivorous plants, all

these will introduce additional challenge to a player.



Fattie - carnivorous Moon abomination. Unfortunate prey that stepped on spreading Fattie’s tentacles, penetrated by sprung sharp tubes. After prey is killed, it injected with digestive enzymes before to be consumed by Fattie.

Weapons

Three weapons out of 7 are available from the beginning of the game and can be used simultaneously. These are machine gun, flamethrower and grenade launcher.


Machine gun is a universal weapon that uses .308 ammo, but does little damage to certain enemies unless upgraded.

Flamethrower is effective dealing with organic lifeforms, especially groups of enemies.

Grenade launcher does a lot of damage, very efficient against armored enemies, but requires experience to use, the ammunition is scarce and heavy to carry.Four more weapons will be available to unlock with Moon Resources Corp. points (MRC points) in game - shotgun, hand cannon, minigun and rocket launcher.

Shotgun - powerful at close to medium range against groups of enemies. It also can be used to break through the weakened structures.

Hand Cannon - uses 50mm rounds and similar to those installed on Moon turrets. Slow rate of fire, high damage. Very effective against armor.

Rocket launcher - fires homing missiles.


Minigun - same characteristics of machine gun, except its a high speed bullet spammer. Uses same 0.308 ammo as machine gun.


Game Resources

There are two resources in the game that used to buy upgrades and ammo and unlock weapons.

The first one is score, which is collected by killing enemies, finding secrets and game bonuses, and deploying beacons near Moon resources. Ammunition and upgrade canisters can be bought during missions with score.

The second one is the standing with Moon Resources Corp. Each time beacon is deployed, the point added to your standing with Moon Resources Corp. These points can be used to unlock weapons. The number of the beacons that can be deployed is unlimited and supplied by Moon Resources Corp.


Upgrades

Every weapon, its ammunition and astronaut equipment have up to 6 upgrades, 3 upgrades minimum. This brings total amount of upgrades for weapons and ammo alone to more than 50.

Carrying capacity of ammunition can also be upgraded and is 12 levels each.

Astronaut has 18 equipment upgrades - fuel tank, jets, and augmentations. This type of upgrades will reduce fuel consumption, movement efficiency and resistance against certain enemies and environments, and unlock ability to carry heavy weaponry, such as minigun, hand cannon and upgraded machine gun.

Upgrade Canisters are required to upgrade equipment. Upgrade Canisters are remains of alien civilizations from earlier times, scattered around Moon, and also can be bought for score points from MR Corp.

As you progress and upgrade the equipment, the weapon and ammunition for that weapon will become more and more powerful against enemies with resistances, and therefore more weapon choices to deal with them will be available.

Below image of upgrades, available for machine gun.

Please note that the values of upgrades are not final and will be balanced in the course of development.


Puzzles

All levels will have different puzzles to solve (1-3 per level) in order to progress through the game or find goodies.

Player will have drones equipped which help explore the surrounding, to collect item required to solve puzzle from inaccessible to player areas, access switches behind obstacles, lure key monster etc.


What is already in game
• Introductory level, early game level, and third level in development.
• Damage mechanics for player and enemies, including upgraded weapons.
• Fuel consumption by moving, power gliding and flamethrower.

• 16 more levels in addition to introductory level, one of the first levels that are already completed, and third level in development.  Each level will have between 15 to 20 minutes of game time, and with puzzles on each level increase that time.
• 8 enemy types, such as smart mining equipment, augmented humanoids, aliens and raiders, and native Moon lifeforms.
• 3 more weapons and 2 more ammunition types, and upgrades for them

Zaccaria Pinball on Steam Greenlit.

Due to huge support of yours Zaccaria Pinball is Greenlit in 21 days only!
Zaccaria Pinball will be released in any events. The funding goals help to decrease the time factor of the current feature!
A digital copy means a Steam code.

Hello Pinball Lovers!

We are Magic Pixel company, formerly named as A.S.K. Homework.

Our company being located in Debrecen, the eastern end of Hungary, takes the pride to have operated for quite a long time now. In its present form, as under the name of ASK Homework, it has been working since 1998 to bring gamers the best quality of pinball games providing fun gameplay. The hardcore of developers before the establishment of ASK Homework had already been working together publishing small demos and other kinds of media work.

We have developed titles for such different platforms as Nintendo DS, Nintendo Wii, Sony PSP, Sony Playstation 3, Microsoft Xbox, Microsoft Xbox 360 and PC Windows. Of course we always look for new challenges and possibilities and try to break in new areas of platform gaming. As a result of this expectation we have started to develop for mobile platform as well.
<div>Zaccaria was founded by three brothers (Marino, Franco, &amp
column2: Natale) and was the 3rd largest manufacturer of pinball machines in the world (behind Bally &amp
column3: Williams). They had created and produced more than 38 different pinball machines between 1974 and 1987.
column4:
>
Zaccaria Pinball is a commemoration of this great pinball manufacturer.

column7: >What features does Zaccaria Pinball offer you?
column9:
>
In a nutshell: never-to-be-forgotten pinball experience!

column5: >Because #1: all 38 pinball tables are modeled with 100% accuracy from the original pinball machines of Zaccaria company
>Because #2: all sound effects, musics and vocals are recorded from the original pinball machines of Zaccaria company
>Because #3: all rules are scripted based on the rule sheets of the original pinball machines of Zaccaria company
>Because #4: a unique customization system gives you a free hand by many possibilities of change on graphical and physical parts of the game
>Because #5: various game modes ensure you to receive an amazing pinball experience independently of what pinball skills you have

column1:
The Campaign

The main goal of starting this campaign is that we would like to distribute Zaccaria Pinball by ourself. It's a fact that publisher companies have too much influence on an upcoming projects. That way it's not sure we would be able to fulfill all requests and suggestions of the community members.

If you visit the following forum you would see many requests and suggestions of that community have been fulfilled in iOS and Android versions of Zaccaria Pinball! We would like to offer the same support for owners of PC, MAC and Linux.
Zaccaria Pinball will be released in any events. The funding goals help to decrease the time factor of the current feature!
• $10.000 - Instant release of PC version with 38 pinball tables, graphics and physics tweaks, portrait and landscape modes, local multiplayer, controller support.
<li>$12.000 - Release of Linux version <span style=""background-color: initial
column2: >with 38 pinball tables, graphics and physics tweaks, portrait and landscape modes, local multiplayer, controller support.

column1: • $15.000 - Release of MAC version with 38 pinball tables, graphics and physics tweaks, portrait and landscape modes, local multiplayer, controller support.

• $20.000 - 20+ extra game modes for all 38 pinball tables. Every game mode includes a quick special task, like 'Hit 5 drop targets', and has to be done as soon as possible and placed better position on the leaderboard.
• $30.000 - Online Multiplayer support with cross-platform feature between PC, MAC and Linux.
• $40.000 - Cabinet support with multiple monitor setups, customization features, C++ SDK to be able to do extensions for the game to control the nudge function, outside LED lights and more...

• $70.000 - Editor support. Create your own Zaccaria pinball table. Every pinball table has a special place that you want to see another table. With this feature you will be able to collect these places to 1 ultimate pinball table!
","Zaccaria Pinball on Steam Greenlit.Due to huge support of yours Zaccaria Pinball is Greenlit in 21 days only!
Zaccaria Pinball will be released in any events. The funding goals help to decrease the time factor of the current feature!
A digital copy means a Steam code.

Hello Pinball Lovers!We are Magic Pixel company, formerly named as A.S.K. Homework.Our company being located in Debrecen, the eastern end of Hungary, takes the pride to have operated for quite a long time now. In its present form, as under the name of ASK Homework, it has been working since 1998 to bring gamers the best quality of pinball games providing fun gameplay. The hardcore of developers before the establishment of ASK Homework had already been working together publishing small demos and other kinds of media work.We have developed titles for such different platforms as Nintendo DS, Nintendo Wii, Sony PSP, Sony Playstation 3, Microsoft Xbox, Microsoft Xbox 360 and PC Windows. Of course we always look for new challenges and possibilities and try to break in new areas of platform gaming. As a result of this expectation we have started to develop for mobile platform as well.

Zaccaria was founded by three brothers (Marino, Franco, & Natale) and was the 3rd largest manufacturer of pinball machines in the world (behind Bally & Williams). They had created and produced more than 38 different pinball machines between 1974 and 1987.Zaccaria Pinball is a commemoration of this great pinball manufacturer.
What features does Zaccaria Pinball offer you?In a nutshell: never-to-be-forgotten pinball experience!Why do we say that?
Because #1: all 38 pinball tables are modeled with 100% accuracy from the original pinball machines of Zaccaria company
Because #2: all sound effects, musics and vocals are recorded from the original pinball machines of Zaccaria company
Because #3: all rules are scripted based on the rule sheets of the original pinball machines of Zaccaria company
Because #4: a unique customization system gives you a free hand by many possibilities of change on graphical and physical parts of the game
Because #5: various game modes ensure you to receive an amazing pinball experience independently of what pinball skills you have

The Campaign The main goal of starting this campaign is that we would like to distribute Zaccaria Pinball by ourself. It's a fact that publisher companies have too much influence on an upcoming projects. That way it's not sure we would be able to fulfill all requests and suggestions of the community members.

If you visit the following forum you would see many requests and suggestions of that community have been fulfilled in iOS and Android versions of Zaccaria Pinball! We would like to offer the same support for owners of PC, MAC and Linux.
Zaccaria Pinball will be released in any events. The funding goals help to decrease the time factor of the current feature!
$10.000 - Instant release of PC version with 38 pinball tables, graphics and physics tweaks, portrait and landscape modes, local multiplayer, controller support.
$12.000 - Release of Linux version with 38 pinball tables, graphics and physics tweaks, portrait and landscape modes, local multiplayer, controller support.
$15.000 - Release of MAC version with 38 pinball tables, graphics and physics tweaks, portrait and landscape modes, local multiplayer, controller support.

$20.000 - 20+ extra game modes for all 38 pinball tables. Every game mode includes a quick special task, like 'Hit 5 drop targets', and has to be done as soon as possible and placed better position on the leaderboard.
$30.000 - Online Multiplayer support with cross-platform feature between PC, MAC and Linux.
$40.000 - Cabinet support with multiple monitor setups, customization features, C++ SDK to be able to do extensions for the game to control the nudge function, outside LED lights and more...

$70.000 - Editor support. Create your own Zaccaria pinball table. Every pinball table has a special place that you want to see another table. With this feature you will be able to collect these places to 1 ultimate pinball table!",4.0,0,"1 Campaign

Virtual Reality Experiences for Oculus Rift:

column4: />

column1:
[updated 2015 May 25th]

VR Experiences project for Oculus Rift includes:
- VR Experience 4 Oculus Rift, an exploration game which uses the same 3D environments of the mobile version
- Quantic Rift: an adventure/First Person Shooter game which uses original 3D environments designed by SebL

Initially it was supposed to be the same game, but we have decided to split it into two different games which will be both available for ""VR Experiences"" project backers.
Both games can be played with and Oculus Rift headset to immerse the player into virtual reality.
The player moves into the game either with a classic gamepad or with a keyboard.
The player is immersed into the 3D scenes thanls to the stereovision and tracking capacities of the Oculus Rift headset.

VR Experiences 4 Oculus Rift
30 levels can be explored.
Development status: beta release almost ready

Quantic Rift

Quantic Rift is an adventure/First Person Shooter game.

The player
moves into the game with a classic gamepad (or with the keyboard) and can be immersed into the 3D
scenes thanks to the stereovision and tracking capacities of the Oculus Rift

headset.

Optionaly the player can also use a Leap Motion tracker to interact with the game directly with its own hands.
During the game, the player can dialog with a few characters (dialogs
life packs, keys and special objects can be collected. Special objects can be
combined to resolve puzzles and unlock new scenes.

Pitch: the game story is based on time exploration.

Development status:UFPS is integrated so you can shot on various elements (glass, aliens) in the scenes. Several interactions development are in progress (lift, keys, doors).


Crowdfunding purpose

By supporting this indie project, you have the opportunity to be an actor in the virtual reality gaming revolution and be one of the first to get the game before it's release at a lower cost with a minimum risk (take a look at possible rewards).

We have already done several investments with our own pockets (~€1200) but we now need to make new investments (>
column2:
=3200 ): We need to buy professional licences to unleash our creativity and develop the full software - script, graphic design, unit testing, integration, validation. and online store release fee. But we also need other Oculus Rift helmets to increase development speed and several music licences (more money, more songs).

Past investments:
Oculus Rift DK2: $365

Leap Motion: $150

Unity 5 Personal: $0

Unity Assets (3D environments, tools): €1100



Rewards

column1:
Team presentation


Geoffrey. I live in France near
Rennes in Britanny. I’m a software engineer, and I’m passionate about new
technologies and video games. After several years working in flight simulation,
I’ve decided to create Virtual Reality video games on my own. I started with a mobile game called ""VR Experience"" (more information can be found below). Now I want to go further and create a

full original VR game for PC/Mac computers.


Sebastien ""Seb L"", is graphic
designer and works in a 3D Architecture design company in Rennes. He has joined the adventure and helps me to create exclusive scenes and graphic contents, and also character animations

for the game.

Ronald lives in London UK. He's a software engineer, expert in mobile devices UI and ergonomics. He helps us for Game design, Scenario and User interface design.


Denis ""Den makes music""is a music composer hobbyist.  He kindly provides several musics of his composition for the game. You can find some of them on Jamendo (https://www.jamendo.com/en/artist/336656/den-makes-music)


Catherine is also supporting us for mathematics.


But we also need your help to back our project !

If you are a VR enthousiast, you can early purchase the game.

But we thank you for any contribution !

Risks and challenges


Once funded, you can be assured that you will receive a quality product that lives up to your expectations. With my development skills and Sebastien’s graphics expertise.
We are seeking funding since creating such a game is quite time consuming and currently we are funding this through our own pockets.
We are passionate about gaming and VR and can predict a high success for Oculus Rift helmets in video gaming.
Your money will allow us to fully develop this game, making it possible to achieve our goal more quickly as we will not have to  work elsewhere to make money, and this, of course will accelerate its final release.

About VR Experience for iOS /

Android smartphones

As mentioned above, VR Experience 4 Oculus Rift is based on from ""VR Experience"" game  which you can find on Apple Store and Google Play (in a Free or Paid version).

In VR Experience (iOS/Android) you can explore 21 worlds in stereovision: thanks to the Google cardboard magnet and to your smartphone compass feature you can start/stop walking into the scene.

The game is designed with the Unity 3D engine with 3rd party content under license for gfx and musics.

It is limited by smartphone performances to scene exploring. Even then, the game is a huge success and virtual reality seems to be the next gaming revolution.

A few info and snapshots of VR Experience mobile game:
Download links and video demo here: http://www.ideoservo.com

Before you come aboard

Space Tavern Games began as a dream shared by Tyler and Patrick Ryan.  After building the company from scratch they are turning to the community to be able to fully focus on all the projects they have planned.  Some of them are
• An Online Platform for the Tabletop Community

All current and future projects are available on the Space Tavern Games website. So we have turned to everyone to help make this happen!

(unfortunately our funds are limited, so at the beginning of this campaign this is the only image we could afford to put in here. We hope you enjoy it.)


With Your Support
We’ve set our goal at 5,000 because that will allow us to do the following
• Get the online store up and running.
• Get started with our own original shows

However, if our initial goal is reached, we do have STRETCH GOALS! All of our stretch goals are listed below and our hope is to achieve enough funding to make Space Tavern Games our Full Time Job. 

This would also quite possibly create the greatest Game store ever. Complete with our own mead bar! Anyone and everyone who donates to help us achieve this goal if hit, bring in your donation receipt and if you are of age, have a space mead with the guys!

Plus we have some pretty sweet perks listed to your right on the screen if we do say so ourselves!

The Stretch Goals

The impact Space Tavern Games is aiming for is one that could be groundbreaking. We want to shake the typical Hobby/Game shop structure and reputation, create great products, and have superior customer service and satisfaction.
• The tabletop gaming community has never truly had a strong establishment for where developers and testers from all over can truly connect on the internet

• Valhalla would have multiple social platforms built around an e-commerce webstore for any developer or publisher to put up any tabletop game to be on the market, gain a following, reach out to other circles within the tabletop realm and build a following for any game listed in our system.
• We wish to bring tabletop gaming to the forefront of entertainment with our own original shows that highlight the positive impact of tabletop games.

column2:
Challenges

We understand that the current trend of games are those played on the consoles or PCs. We believe however that there is something special about sitting down to play a game on a tabletop with friends and family. We want to join other companies and other gamers in making sure tabletop gaming pushes to the forefront alongside of other forms of gaming.

column1: • We are developing our own tabletop games, and some designed for younger kids
• We want to help build a strong tabletop community for everyone out there.

Other Ways We need Your Help

Here at STG, We(Tyler and Patrick) both of us understand that not everyone is able to contribute funds, however that does not mean you cannot be of a huge help to us! All you have to do is share and follow us on any social media you would like, preferably all of them but just help get the word out to anyone and everyone about us! Use the Indiegogo share tools or just use our link!


Questions

If you have any questions or concerns we absolutely want to hear them! You can contact us on here our reach out to us on any of our social media platforms. We will respond within 12 hours of any question or comment sent to us. We put the 12 hours in there due to we could be sleeping and would not get to your question until we have woken up. Ideally we would like to respond within 1 hour or less and will work very hard to do so.


Your Time

We feel that your time is very valuable, and we do not want to waste it. If you would like to find out more about any and all of our projects and happenings you can check out our website at http://spacetaverngames.com

Thank You

Tyler and Patrick would just like to say Thank You for taking your time to check out our Indiegogo campaign and learning a little about us today!

It's very simple, just connect the GameST to your TV via HDMI,it needs to be on the same network besides with Wake on Lan (WOL) GameST could power-on your PC. Itscans all your installed games for stream on any television of your choice, thanks to Nvidia Gametream technology and Moonlight software, just pick your favorite gamepad (PS4, Xbox, PC, Keyboard or Mouse) and PLAY.

Besides gamers we are a small team formed by Computational Engineering. We work together in other projects for some companys many years ago.  

Tired to search a simple and cheap solution for all players who want to enjoy their PC's games, retro games, and movies on a big TV in any part of the house, without have move big things, buy consoles or purchase the same game twice. We came up with the idea to create by ourselves, we said, we have the technology, the knowledge and the experience, its time. And ""we did it"".

We've changed the game name from MOMENTUM to GRAVITY VECTOR due to the community's request since there are already two games on Steam called ""Momentum"" and ""inMomentum"".
We're a group of passionate game developers who wish to bring new experiences to players all around the world.
My name is Miljan Bojovic and I'm an IT Manager working in a clinic in Italy. As some of you may have noticed my name does not sound italian and in fact I'm not. I'm originally from Serbia.
I am also the CEO and Founder of POLIEXA Entertainemnt

As I went to italy my parents bought us our first Console. Sega Mega Drive (also known as Sega Genesis). As soon as I started playing games on that little black box I realized my true passion. I wanted to be able to create those things, create games with my own stories. So after years I'm here with experience and tools to start doing it.
This campaign may seem the usual Indie video game and in fact it is. With the difference that this is our first step into something big. Everything starts small.
This game represents experience in game development and tests out our knowledge.
Helping this campaign to reach its goal is telling us ""We believe in your ideas"" and also contributing to something bigger than the game is.
Our real goal is to keep people curious about our future projects by showing them what we achieved with Gravity Vector in just our spare time which believe me it's not much.

Everything has a price and until now we've been relaying only on our own everyday financial resources. So we've been very limited to achieve different things such as acquiring testing hardware, audio or graphic assets for our project. Since our goal is to make a game that everyone can enjoy we're putting all out effort to bring the best of it but this requires financial resources.
Why we need this much amount of money?

I won't be able to be precise about how much we really need. The amount shown here is approximate to what we really need in order to accomplish this project and what we've already spent to bring the game where it is right now which I can safely say we've more than 50% of its final state of development.
Here are some investments we need to bring forward the whole project and assure we've be able to continue the pursue of our dream.
If funding will exceed the initial amount, the investments will go into Virtual Reality Hardware in order to start working on VR content.

column4: '>Will founders get a free copy of the game?

column1: If you pledge 10€ or more you'll receive a copy of the game.
If you find this project interesting then we'd really appreciate if you vote for us on Steam Green Light on the following link: VOTE HERE

What are the risks in this whole project? Well, as for everything there is a goal and a deadline to respect and we're doing our best to succeed in this. Our main challenge is to dedicate every minute of our spare time into Gravity Vector development. Even if the game is more than 50% done.
If you really feel in mood to help in our main goal which consists in game development on a large scale. You can visit our Patreon and see what you can do to help us.
Every tiny bit of help is more than appreciated!

Testing Machines (Computer Hardware, software license etc...): 13500€
Audio, Video, Sound and Graphics Assets: 2500€
Sound Engineering, libraries and audio hardware: 3800€
If funding will exceed the initial amount, the investments will go into Virtual Reality Hardware in order to start working on VR content.
Will founders get a free copy of the game?
If you pledge 10€ or more you'll receive a copy of the game.
We are on Steam Green Light!
If you find this project interesting then we'd really appreciate if you vote for us on Steam Green Light on the following link: VOTE HERE

What are the risks in this whole project? Well, as for everything there is a goal and a deadline to respect and we're doing our best to succeed in this. Our main challenge is to dedicate every minute of our spare time into Gravity Vector development. Even if the game is more than 50% done.
If you really feel in mood to help in our main goal which consists in game development on a large scale. You can visit our Patreon and see what you can do to help us.
Every tiny bit of help is more than appreciated!

The non-profit Austin Toy Museum was established as a set of traveling exhibits that brought the childhood nostalgia of every 80's and 90's kid to life. After years of making the rounds, the Austin Toy Museum finally found a home in East Austin. Showcasing toys mostly from the 70's, 80's, and 90's! The primary focus of the museum is reliving the greatest decades of toys and gaming in an interactive way.

column2: Heroes Comics, currently the only 501(c)3 comic book store in America,  moved into Austin Toy Museum in December of 2016, upping the geeky goodness by providing current, classic, and variant comic books from all major publishers and top names in Indie comics as well. With a focus on promoting diversity, community involvement, education, and the neighborhood bar feel, Hops &amp
column3: Heroes is paving the way for a new type of comic book store.

column1: Our building is awesome to the max, a really gnarly place to hang out, but it's also in need of some wicked upgrades if it's going to be the powerhouse of  Nerdom we want to achieve.
Here's just a couple of things we're going to be doing to make the environment even more radical:

1) Welcome to the Warp Zone: We're bringing retro ""epicness"" to life by recreating the feel of your favorite arcades from the 80's. We'll be updating our arcade games, fixing some of the old ones, and bringing in the fun. So start saving those quarters because the days of trying to get the high score on Centipede and Ms. Pac-Man are about to return!

2) New AC units -- If you've been here in the summer months you know it gets a little warm. Turns out Texas is hot, and trying to cool off with just some wall units doesn't beat that Texas heat. Which is why we want to get a better cooling system to make your experience more enjoyable for those long hours playing Magic: The Gathering, or Galaga in Warp Zone.

3) Bigger, Better, Stronger displays -- Austin Toy Museum has a lot of rare and vintage toys to display, but not a lot of space to actually display them in. While the Toy Museum staff has been working to modify donated displays and build their own cases over the years, we're looking to expand and unify the experience so that there will always be a variety of toys set up in a dynamic way.

4) General repairs -- Our building is old. The kind of old that makes parachute pants look like the next fashion statement. So we'll be doing some necessary upgrades and modifications to really make the building fresh.

And that's why we need you. You can turn these two independent businesses into one massive haven for the nerd community. A place where you can come enjoy a beer with friends while playing the games of your childhood and discussing the latest in comic book releases.

Being non-profit means that we pour our time, energy, and funding in to make our programs and our community the best it can be. But it also means we need help from time to time reaching those goals. Which is why we have loyal friends, family, and followers like you guys who can help us go above and beyond what we, ourselves, are capable of.
Our funding goal is high...like Scrooge McDuck coin vault high, but we actually have a detailed list on what it's going to take to bring our building to the next level.

If we don't make our goal we're still going to move forward with upgrading the business and bringing Warp Zone to life, but the process will take longer and be a lot more painful. Growing is hard, we've all been there, it wasn't comfortable. But with your  help we can skip the puberty stage and bloom into the magical butterfly we were always meant to be.

About now you're probably asking yourself, ""yeah but what's in it for me?"" Well, other than a epic new place to hang out which is guaranteed to meet your nerdy needs, there's a lot of awesome perks just for donating. And who doesn't love cool stuff just for helping out a good cause!
If you've been a fan of Austin Toy Museum or Hops &
column2: Heroes Comics for long, you know that we can make a little bit go along way, and we intend to do that once again. It's thanks to generous donors like you that the museum has managed to develop from a traveling exhibit into a constantly evolving building. And Hops &amp
column3: Heroes recently undertook a construction that you not only funded, but many of you came and helped out with. Our extended family members all throughout have been the biggest impact in our lives, and we know that with your help we will see this next project through!

column1: My HP is Way Down...How Can I Help?

Share! Share! Share! Do you have a Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, a pen pal on the other side of the world? Then there's someone you could tell about the campaign. If you love us they probably will too, so why not pick up a phone and text your third cousin once removed to let them know about this amazing opportunity!
If you have a blog, a newspaper, or a place where we can tell our story, we'd love to chat with you. Reach out to shannon@hopsandheroes.org and we can set something up!
Cheat Codes to the Secret Bonus Level
Want to win those extra points and level up even faster? DONATE TODAY!
First two people to donate $1000 will receive their very own tabletop gaming systems!
First person to donate $500 will get their very own reserved stool in Warp Zone!
And so much more!!! Keep following our updates to see how you can participate in the process, join in on the Warp Zone fun, and earn even more prizes!!!

The funding will go entirely to animation and the launching of the game.  Animation is key here we wanted the game to look as good as it runs.  This game gives the user a chance to put themselves in the shoes of the President.  Every mission is based off current events, and very realistic situations your decisions will effect the out come of the game.  You use a budget to fund every mission, and national decision. Each decision you make in the game rewires every mission and outcome.  You must keep the countries people safe while not running out of money because then your approval rating will drop and lower your chances of re-election.  The game has timed missions so you will need to revisit the app to keep an eye on your country, safety is a priority.  This game is very strategic in nature its fun but also challenging getting a second term is no easy task but once you do the rewards are more then worth it.  At that stage you will have to handle nuclear attacks and sometimes the only way to save your country is to act first.

The Perks we wanted to make very fun and meaningful.  We got bold and offered something knew, and exciting.  Be surprised when you transport your troops to enemies grounds in a battle ship named after you.  Plus an invite to our Meet &
column2: Greet on Launch day! How fun is that? Kick it with the very people who all made it possible.

column1:
Who we are
We all became friends due to our very creative nature.  We soon collaborated on some different projects, and then we found ourselves here with this app.  Matt is an national awarded app designer and also a robotics wiz.  Mark is a creative entrepreneur who has worked on projects ranging from smart crash safety features to manufacturing futuristic home technology.  Isaiah, still a football star, but sports aside takes business very seriously and who first came up with this game idea.  Isaiah has worked along side Mark for several of his projects, but was also a founder of a successful online store. 
The team came together to build an app that is different an innovative.  We truly think of all of you backers as partners we would not be able to build this without you.  We want to get you guys included, ideas and feedback are important to us lets all enjoy this process together, and in the end know you made this a reality and get to watch the impact!

This past election has been very different and no matter what side of the political scale you are on you are an American above all.  We want this app to help kids young and old realize the importance of decisions and actions.  When you play a game you enter a different world you start to think through the character and in this case the President.  Who knows one day we may inspire a young man or women to leave their fears behind and run for office.

Our path is pretty clear cut, and we know our mission even if we do not reach our goal the money will be used to further develope and look for private investment or regroup and hit the crowd funding platform for round two.
Please if you can not back share our link it will help us greatly, we still hope to see you using our app soon!

I have always dreamed to create a game. Years ago, I picked up my first game and I was obsessed. What I believe is that you can escape your problems and delve into a new world. With a new multiplayer type gameplay, you can be strategic and social at the same time.
I was thrust into a deep stage of depression and it felt like games were the only thing that kept me alive and happy. And I want other people to feel that way.
You may be thinking, ""there are so many MOBA games and almost all of them are exactly the same."" But this is different.
The concept is two teams of 3 battling off in a large battleground.

There is a base hidden somewhere on the map. The teams have to find it. Once you get to the base, you need to stay there for a total of a minute, with the timer restarting if you leave the base. Meanwhile, your team needs to defend and stay put at your base/take over the base.

Your character is a human, that you customize to your satisfaction. You start with just 1 or 2 weak abilities and 1 or 2 weak weapons. By playing and/or winning, you get cases which contains 1 ability and 1 weapon (if you win, you get a rare case and if you lose, you get a common case). Each case has a chance to get different rarity items. These rarities are common, rare, extraordinary and exotic. The higher the rarity, the better the item. Brag to others about your items and you can even trade.
You will be able to switch between flying camera, third person and first person. This allows you to be diverse in game preference.
All of this is ranked but you can also play on community servers or offline with bots. The bots can help you sharpen your skills with difficulty ranging from harmless to 1 hit kill.
And this is only the tip of the iceberg of all the features in the game.
If your wallet is empty or you blatantly don't want to donate, you still get to help. You can sign up for a PAID job as a programmer, artist, designer and more.
If you are interested, email me: Brandonbattye@gmail.com

column23: >

column1: I had the idea for this game a few years ago and have played it numerous times with family and friends. It is so fun and easy that I just have to share it.

• Emotional Breakdown is a play on words as the game really is about figuring out how to convey an emotion without the help of words that describe the emotion. In fact, often, the sentences one must read are counter-intuitive to the emotion that must be expressed.

• I know this game will be very popular and I am hoping that once the production costs are covered, I will be able to introduce the game to the Wait Wait Don't Tell Me host Peter Sagel and use some of the proceeds to benefit their show and others like it. .
• By supporting the production of this game you'll get a great game that you will love,
• I am producing 1000 games. The cost of each is $17.50.
• $20 Contributors will receive the game shipped to them (US only)
• If I don't reach my entire goal, I will email the pdf card files and instructions for the game to supporters and will continue to raise funds to produce the game.
• The 'Back It' button has been clicked on without exception. Be  sure instead to click on the 'Featured' square as that will activate the get this perk option.  :)
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
• Get the word out and make some noise about this campaign.

And that's all there is to it.

I know this game will be very popular and I am hoping that once the production costs are covered, I will be able to introduce the game to the Wait Wait Don't Tell Me host Peter Sagel and use some of the proceeds to benefit their show and others like it. .

0,"

The Space Program Continues

This campaign was only the beginning. Visit StarshipAdventure.com to join the space program.

Get ready to be unprepared: starships are coming to Earth!

Stay with the community on Facebook

The Story

Space technology company Starship Adventure is providing starships for Earthlings to explore the cosmos. Your avatar will board and operate your starship to face the wonders and dangers of your journey.

The Game

We're combining a first-person game with a space flight simulator to create a fantastic science fiction sandbox. For the first time ever in this immersive way can move around on your starship as you fly your starship through space.

Every member of your crew can operate the systems, or leave each station to an AI backup so that you can take that crucial action to save your ship. Where you are in the ship becomes meaningful when blasts from the outside tear through the hull and wreak havoc on systems and crew, whether it's coming from an asteroid, or a laser cannon, or boarders.
column2:
>


The main thrust of the basic game is a first-person starship experience. Missions will make it much more than just a first-person shoot-em-up. With your support we can reach that goal.

The Universe of Starship Adventure

This is happening now, and the aliens of folklore are real to the seekers that find them. These starships are a portal to the unknown, but you know this mythology. It's the unbelievable history of this world and beyond. Point this starship where you'd like to go and let's see what we find.
column3:
>
""Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.""
column5:
>-Arthur C. Clarke

Getting Around the Universe

Activate your starship's long range sensors to see what's going on around you and fly deeper into unexplored space, or select from a standard list of available missions to challenge your best results and earn upgrades and achievements. What you do when you get there is up to how you want to play.

Your Starship Works

Each module in your starship functions. You have a helm, weapons, sensors, science bay, cargo bay, thrusters, and a core that powers everything and protects your remote connection to your avatar.
column6:
>

Your Avatar and You

Remote control your own biological android as you face the extreme dangers of deep space. Through the magic of quantum entanglement you can operate your starship from the safety and comfort of your home computer across lightyears of interstellar hazards. Your avatar can re-spawn again and again until your starship blows up. You and your destroyed crew can have a new starship made at your favorite Star Port and jump right back into the action.
column7:
>

PC/Mac Compatible

This version of Starship Adventure will run on both Mac and PC so that everyone with Internet access and a computer can explore the universe together, or play alone offline with a crew of bots. If our community wants VR &
column8:
Linux support we can stretch to make that happen.

Minimum System Requirements

column1: • Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later.
• Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
• NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.

How to Reach Escape Velocity

It will take an estimated $40k to produce the baseline PC/Mac version that will let you operate your own starship and play online with friends.

The more money we raise, the more triple-A resources we'll have to polish every department and unlock the stretch goals that will push the boundaries of the cosmos.

Stretch Goals

Throughout the course of the campaign we'll be running polls and brackets to find out where you want to fly this starship. I want to go everywhere but anyone who's been a passenger with me on the Sensatron knows that I want to visit wherever you want to go.

Some of the exciting possibilities are:
...and Other Great Ideas that are beyond my imagination because our community is filled with amazing aliens.
column5:
Challenges

Creating this ambitious game without the resources of a major game company is a difficult challenge. With the development tools available in Unreal Engine and the participation of the community, I’m confident we’ll make a fun and creative experience with whatever budget we end up with. I would like to dedicate myself and have the resources to engage artists and coders to bring this to life. I’m reaching out to my community of friends and fans to reach escape velocity. 

Expectations

Our prime directive is to create a first-person starship simulator that lets players operate those consoles in real time. I've been preparing for this my whole life, ever since I learned as a child that Astronauts don't get to steer their rockets. Too many starships have flown past our solar system, it’s time we jump on Starship Adventure and make this game happen.

How to Help

This starship cannot leave the launch pad without your support. Whether you can donate to the space program or play along and join the community, this will be fun trip.

  • Participate

There will be opportunities and games for our community to determine the stretch goals. By participating you’re helping us make this Starship Adventure your own.

  • Spread the word

The more players that know about our game, the stronger our community will be and the more features we'll unlock. Talk about Starship Adventure with your friends and let them know that working starships are coming. Every backer counts.

  • Share this link

http://igg.me/at/starshipadventure
There’s room on this starship for every kind of science fiction alien there is. Who do you know that would make a great hot-shot pilot, a salty space marine, or a clever scientist? Invite them to join your crew!

Press

I'm happy to connect with podcasters, bloggers, online shows, news agencies, reviewers, and anyone else that wants to fly starships. Contact me for access to the press kit.
column6: >“I remember the exact level Jason references in the video (from Unreal Tournament). And I, too remember how cool it was to run around a starship and even step outside. This is such a neat project and I hope you consider supporting it!”
column9: >""Jason has the magic touch for bringing to life projects that are simultaneously cosmically vast, but intimately social. Now's the time to bring Starship Adventure to life: the video game that allows us all to venture into deep space in the most interactive way yet.""
column10: >-Jason Bender, Creative Director, Marvel Strike Force, FoxNext Games
column11: >“Jason has created some of the most inspiring art I have ever seen, and I can only imagine how phenomenal the experience in this world could become!”
column12: >-Mischa Pollack, Aeronautic Engineer, Actor, Host
column13: >“One of my favourite space captains is working on a first person spaceship simulator that promises thrilling adventure to new fascinating galaxies. This is a really exciting concept that combines so many things I enjoy! Jason Siadek is well loved in my community for creating immersive and intimate community experiences, and I'm stoked to see him translate his flair for it to this platform.”
column15: >""I'm really excited about this game. It was the spiritual godfather of Battlestations. This is a game Jason has wanted to make for 20 years. Finally, the technology has caught up it is realistic for him to be able to make it.""
column17: >-Jeff Siadek, Co-Creator Battlestations, Game Designer, Gorilla Games
column18: >“I’ve collaborated with Jason on a few of his previous games, and they are incredibly fun and engaging. This latest endeavor promises to be the best one yet.”
