","The Space Program ContinuesThis campaign was only the beginning. Visit StarshipAdventure.com to join the space program.Get ready to be unprepared: starships are coming to Earth!Stay with the community on FacebookThe StorySpace technology company Starship Adventure is providing starships for Earthlings to explore the cosmos. Your avatar will board and operate your starship to face the wonders and dangers of your journey.The GameWe're combining a first-person game with a space flight simulator to create a fantastic science fiction sandbox. For the first time ever in this immersive way can move around on your starship as you fly your starship through space.Every member of your crew can operate the systems, or leave each station to an AI backup so that you can take that crucial action to save your ship. Where you are in the ship becomes meaningful when blasts from the outside tear through the hull and wreak havoc on systems and crew, whether it's coming from an asteroid, or a laser cannon, or boarders.The main thrust of the basic game is a first-person starship experience. Missions will make it much more than just a first-person shoot-em-up. With your support we can reach that goal.The Universe of Starship AdventureThis is happening now, and the aliens of folklore are real to the seekers that find them. These starships are a portal to the unknown, but you know this mythology. It's the unbelievable history of this world and beyond. Point this starship where you'd like to go and let's see what we find.""Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.""-Arthur C. ClarkeGetting Around the UniverseActivate your starship's long range sensors to see what's going on around you and fly deeper into unexplored space, or select from a standard list of available missions to challenge your best results and earn upgrades and achievements. What you do when you get there is up to how you want to play.Your Starship WorksEach module in your starship functions. You have a helm, weapons, sensors, science bay, cargo bay, thrusters, and a core that powers everything and protects your remote connection to your avatar.Your Avatar and YouRemote control your own biological android as you face the extreme dangers of deep space. Through the magic of quantum entanglement you can operate your starship from the safety and comfort of your home computer across lightyears of interstellar hazards. Your avatar can re-spawn again and again until your starship blows up. You and your destroyed crew can have a new starship made at your favorite Star Port and jump right back into the action.PC/Mac CompatibleThis version of Starship Adventure will run on both Mac and PC so that everyone with Internet access and a computer can explore the universe together, or play alone offline with a crew of bots. If our community wants VR & Linux support we can stretch to make that happen.Minimum System Requirements

column1: Windows 7 64-bit or Mac OS X 10.9.2 or later.
Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster.
NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.

How to Reach Escape VelocityIt will take an estimated $40k to produce the baseline PC/Mac version that will let you operate your own starship and play online with friends.The more money we raise, the more triple-A resources we'll have to polish every department and unlock the stretch goals that will push the boundaries of the cosmos.Stretch GoalsThroughout the course of the campaign we'll be running polls and brackets to find out where you want to fly this starship. I want to go everywhere but anyone who's been a passenger with me on the Sensatron knows that I want to visit wherever you want to go.Some of the exciting possibilities are:

...and Other Great Ideas that are beyond my imagination because our community is filled with amazing aliens.   Risks & ChallengesCreating this ambitious game without the resources of a major game company is a difficult challenge. With the development tools available in Unreal Engine and the participation of the community, I’m confident we’ll make a fun and creative experience with whatever budget we end up with. I would like to dedicate myself and have the resources to engage artists and coders to bring this to life. I’m reaching out to my community of friends and fans to reach escape velocity. ExpectationsOur prime directive is to create a first-person starship simulator that lets players operate those consoles in real time. I've been preparing for this my whole life, ever since I learned as a child that Astronauts don't get to steer their rockets. Too many starships have flown past our solar system, it’s time we jump on Starship Adventure and make this game happen.How to HelpThis starship cannot leave the launch pad without your support. Whether you can donate to the space program or play along and join the community, this will be fun trip.ParticipateThere will be opportunities and games for our community to determine the stretch goals. By participating you’re helping us make this Starship Adventure your own.Spread the wordThe more players that know about our game, the stronger our community will be and the more features we'll unlock. Talk about Starship Adventure with your friends and let them know that working starships are coming. Every backer counts.Share this linkhttp://igg.me/at/starshipadventureThere’s room on this starship for every kind of science fiction alien there is. Who do you know that would make a great hot-shot pilot, a salty space marine, or a clever scientist? Invite them to join your crew!PressI'm happy to connect with podcasters, bloggers, online shows, news agencies, reviewers, and anyone else that wants to fly starships. Contact me for access to the press kit.“I remember the exact level Jason references in the video (from Unreal Tournament). And I, too remember how cool it was to run around a starship and even step outside. This is such a neat project and I hope you consider supporting it!”-Grant Imahara, Roboticist, Actor, Host""Jason has the magic touch for bringing to life projects that are simultaneously cosmically vast, but intimately social. Now's the time to bring Starship Adventure to life: the video game that allows us all to venture into deep space in the most interactive way yet.""-Jason Bender, Creative Director, Marvel Strike Force, FoxNext Games“Jason has created some of the most inspiring art I have ever seen, and I can only imagine how phenomenal the experience in this world could become!”-Mischa Pollack, Aeronautic Engineer, Actor, Host“One of my favourite space captains is working on a first person spaceship simulator that promises thrilling adventure to new fascinating galaxies. This is a really exciting concept that combines so many things I enjoy! Jason Siadek is well loved in my community for creating immersive and intimate community experiences, and I'm stoked to see him translate his flair for it to this platform.”-Shing Yin Khor, Artist""I'm really excited about this game. It was the spiritual godfather of Battlestations. This is a game Jason has wanted to make for 20 years. Finally, the technology has caught up it is realistic for him to be able to make it.""-Jeff Siadek, Co-Creator Battlestations, Game Designer, Gorilla Games“I’ve collaborated with Jason on a few of his previous games, and they are incredibly fun and engaging. This latest endeavor promises to be the best one yet.”-A.D. Hamilton, Artist/Photohgrapher",11.0,2,"2 Campaigns
An Epic Fantasy Based RPG where your choices truly impact the world, where those same choices shape multiple endings, where you impact the entire realm on a unique scale:

• I'm Russell King, a long time avid gamer, I went to college for graphic and web design and got a taste of programming in my current job. I've been playing RPG's since I was 5, and I've been hammering out this story for over 18 years as a dungeon master. My team is Sean Potter, Levi Johnson, September Garland, and Charles Jones. Sean helps with story, Levi is our music director, September does our conceptual art, and Charles is our unity expert.

• As an avid gamer, I feel so many games get convoluted these days. I want to make RPG's that a player can jump into and enjoy. Some of my favorite games follow a strict formula but leave out exciting features. I want to hold the player responsible for their actions. If they are of a good alignment and commit a crime I want their character to feel the sting. I want them to make a fall from grace and perform a redeemer quest in order to return to their original alignment. You will be able to recruit people, and you will be driven towards an epic battle to decide the fate of the realm from the standpoint of your kingdom. I want your actions to determine how well prepared your side is for that epic battle, such as troop counts, strength of your enemies, even what special characters will take place in the fight. I'm also firm on using real people for every humanoid character in the game to develop an organic and unique feeling. We are designing an Epic RPG either way for both the PC and a prequel for mobile devices. We simply seek to expand our team and deliver this masterpiece to the you the consumer, faster and stronger than we could do with our current team.

• By contributing to the game you will be creating a legacy of games that we aim to develop. Starting with this title. Every person in my team is passionate about games. We want to continue to make amazing games for gamers by gamers.
We ask you to help us accomplish this dream, and to help us deliver exciting game mechanics wrapped into enthralling storylines, combined with beautifully crafted graphics.

• We need $500,000 to fully accomplish our dream involved in this project. We will be able to purchase additional assets from the unity store, upgrade our hardware, purchase the software we require to make top end graphics, and the more we receive the larger our team can become and the more time, resources, and skilled individuals we can dedicate to the project! At $500,000 the government will tax us at the highest tax bracket, my state will want a piece and then indiegogo wants a piece so instantly that's 54% of the funds raised spent. Afterwards we will hire a couple additional designers, and purchase assets from the Unity Asset store.

• At our higher tier perks we are giving you a producer credit to be a part of this game, also at $150 you get a .pdf compendium of all the characters in the game who were modeled from real people, one side will be their character bio, the other side is who they really are, as well as an explanation of how we brought these people in-game.

• Regardless of how much capital we raise we will accomplish this game build, the only factor is the duration of time it will take to make, and with less money it will not have all of the features it deserves, but we will push it out, at 500,000 we will launch our PC version, anything below that we will start with a mobile prequel and then push the PC version out afterwards.
What you are providing us with by choosing to donate to our project:

• The impact we plan to make on the gaming industry with our project is significant. We aim to make an Epic RPG that becomes a house hold name, spawning multiple genre defining sequels across multiple platforms. We also want it to be one that people enjoy playing again and again and eagerly anticipate a sequel or added content.

• We will have a working version of our product by January 2019 at the latest, with a minimal goal of specific features. Ideally, we will have all features implemented by this time but we aim to be realistic, without the funding from the people who are reading this Rulers in Perdition will take a significant amount of time to develop properly especially for a one to two person coding team. If we can raise our capital and expand our team to multiple coding experts then we will be able to not only hit the January 2019 deadline, but we will be able to implement all the features we desire. If we hit any of our stretch goals we will be able to implement these features quicker and have a working product by mid-late 2018. When you have 140+ characters to render, and the massive environment as well as complex game mechanics being introduced to work cohesively together you find why this is an Epic, and not just an RPG as well as why it will take so long to complete the project from start to finish.
- Combining multiple features from multiple genres
- Successfully creating the final battle between all five kingdoms
- Ensuring that the flying, riding, and sailing mechanics are fluid motions that are not choppy
-Making a successful building system for personal kingdom building *Stretch goal feature*
-Implementing the largest class system and character customization system ever made

• The easiest portion of developing this game is we are tying together components that exist already in other major titles spanning multiple genres. We are not reinventing the wheel, we are simply adding the pieces that exist already to turn wood into rubber so to speak. With that being said, our challenge is being able to successfully tie these features together.

• We will overcome the challenges above by reaching out to my own personal network of developers I’ve established over the years since college who have previously worked on games or in other programming fields. Another way is by finding solutions by utilizing unity assets. If solutions are not present we will rise to the challenge by creating solutions through writing our own assets.
Even if you can’t contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

• Ask others in your personal network to view this campaign, get excited about it, tell people in your community about Rulers in Perdition, because everyone involved in the project from developer to model to voice actor is excited about it, we just hope you are too since we are developing this for you!
• Don’t forget you can quickly share our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools!
Thank you kindly from the entire team we look forward to dazzling you with your masterpiece!!!

Who am I, what do I do and what do I want?

My name is Mark Starkey, and I am a video gamer of 26 years, experienced in working in the industry and a keen enthusiast of video game arcades. In 2011, I purchased a number of arcade machines from the closure of Londons biggest arcade, the legendary 'Funland' located within the Trocadero at Piccadilly Circus, and opened up The Heart of Gaming (affectionately known to its audience as 'HoG') in North Acton, London. It has been growing for years, and its now time to move the HoG to a better location with more facilities! 

The purpose of this campaign is to raise the funds to enable us to move into and renovate the new property to meet and exceed the gamers expectations. We have found an ideal location, but work is needed. Your donations and contributions and support will be used  to accomplish this, so that the equipment can be moved in.  


Why Back My Project?

The success of this project would be absolutely groundbreaking. Firstly, you will be helping to provide a heritage archive, a working museum and destination point for gamers of the past, present and future. We would be succeeding, as players, where the corporations ultimately failed us. In this, you would be showing the world what true underdogs are capable of. You will also ensure that the current players and generations to come will be able to experience the joy of an arcade in real life rather than through videos of the past.

The target amount is for £90,000. We already have 90% of the gaming equipment needed for the venue. Your money will be spent largely on the following expenses-

Venue rent deposit and initial upfront rent payment period.
Additional new generation consoles, software and peripherals
Installation of a lan set up and pc gaming area and casting booth. 
​Purchasing of additional media equipment such as display screens and projectors
The purchase of furnishings for player comfort such as chairs, sofas and beanbags and shelves.
A conference/ private hire room facility
Installation of all utilities- Toilets, electrical lines, ethernet wiring, water, fire safety and internet.
Full internal rennovation- flooring, cubicles, walls, shelves, platforms and a stage.
A safety budget for initial outgoings.
New equipment such as pool tables, air hockey, an intercom system and vending machines.
Installation of counters, fittings for shop and cafe/ bar area.
Implementation of a high quality website.
Additional arcade machines and renovation of existing ones.


What will we provide in exchange for donations?
​
We have created a number of perks for you to enjoy in exchange for backing our project, and hope that you will enjoy them and find a package that suits you. These perks include-

Nostalgia in the way of 'Funland' metal gaming tokens, the seeds of yesterdays arcade making way for the future growth of another!

Fashion in the way of t-shirts and hoodies. Feel comfortable, and show others you are part of the HoG community!

Recognition in the form of your name being engraved on a plaque to be displayed as long as the heart keeps beating!

Game time, in the way of purchasing various membership offers, with varying perks!  

Recognition, by having your name featured on a plaque to be permanently displayed in HoG for as long as the heart keeps beating.

And more benefits, such an invitations to our VIP and press launch party, and private hiring also! 

And if we don't reach our goal? 

The HoG will happen regardless. 

If we fail badly- This simply means that we will have to take on investors, and its fair to say some have approached me seeking involvement on a financial level. Very and quite simply, I don't want this. I prefer the democracy that HoG operates as with its customer base, and would rather it remained as such. Nonetheless, it is an option should the donations not be satisfactory. 

Remember, the crowning beauty of HoG is that it is community based, and powered by players.

If fall short- Should we do well enough but still fall short, then the HoG will do what it has always done, and that is to make use of what is available, and grow slowly but surely. Some ideas will be momentarily on hold, but will be achieved later down the progressive line. 

Either way, the funds that people invest are going to the project. We are in a position to strike a massive notch into the history of destination gaming. Thought to be dead due to emulation and the rise of home consoles, we haven proven beyond doubt that the decline in arcades is down to the inability of the Old School operators to move with the times. Survive and adapt. This is what the HoG does. This is what you will be part of. Together we will all make history, as we welcome a new version of the 'Arcade' in the 21st century.

Since the HoG was started, a number of smaller businesses across the UK have implemented gaming areas, as we have proven that people will travel for the right gaming set ups, but noone has bought the scene out in London like the Heart of Gaming, NOONE. We have caught the eyes of celebrities, from Bill Bailey to Dick and Dom. We have hosted 'first look' and location tests for new games. We have even played host to multiple educational visits from schools, colleges and universities. We even had a mural painted by two ladies following the death of Nintendo President Satori Iwata that not only went viral, by Nintendo of Japan personally sent a copy to his family. We have recovered from flooding, from robbery, and nothing has been able to hold us down. The HoG just continues to grow all the time, and with your help, it'll grow even bigger and better. With 4 years experience, the foundation is solid and growing. The eyes of the world are on US. Newspapers and media list us as 'the one to watch'. You're about to find out why.

There were some issues in the old building that we encountered on our journey, but we're older an wiser now, and steps have been taken to ensure previous obstacles will be a thing of the past. Experience is key to dealing with issues. Take a look at some of the improvements we've been able to recognise through experience.

High powered internet and wi-fi. This was a pain with no remedy before, making streaming events very frustrating. Our new unit does not have such issues.

Climate control. Before we were in a warehouse that trapped heat in the summer and cold in the winter. Now we're in a shopping center, these issues are gone.

Amazing travel links. The previous HoG had no night buses and was uncomfortable to reach due to no lighting in the alley way that involved players walking past a cemetery in pitch black. The new location is a minutes walk in a heavily populated and well lit area from the Central Line tube. This now runs 24 hours at the weekend. The Hammersmith and Circle Lines are also local. There are multiple night buses and two bus stations. There is an overground line stop too, and a car parking facility in a neighbouring shopping center. This issue is DEFINITELY sorted. 

Local amenities. The old HoG had nothing but Asda and Tesco, meaning that meal time meant a long walk. Shepherds Bush has plenty of local meal options and shops mere seconds away from the HoG entrance. Were 10 seconds walk from Vue cinema!
If you find yourself lacking in funds, no problem! We have received many donations of unwanted/ unused gaming equipment, we always find a use for it and it only serves to keep our library growing!

Use the Indiegogo share tools! Also, 'sharing is caring' maybe sound cliche, but it can make a huge difference and only takes a moment! Share our project and updates with friends!

Twitter- @theHOGuk

Youtube- theHOGuk

Facebook- facebook.com/TheHeartOfGaming/

Thanks for viewing this indiegogo crowd funding project. We hope you enjoyed it and found a perk to suit you. We look forward to meeting you for great gaming times ahead.

Regards, Mark

The old HoG had nothing but Asda and Tesco, meaning that meal time meant a long walk. Shepherds Bush has plenty of local meal options and shops mere seconds away from the HoG entrance. Were 10 seconds walk from Vue cinema!
If you find yourself lacking in funds, no problem! We have received many donations of unwanted/ unused gaming equipment, we always find a use for it and it only serves to keep our library growing!

Use the Indiegogo share tools! Also, 'sharing is caring' maybe sound cliche, but it can make a huge difference and only takes a moment! Share our project and updates with friends!Twitter- @theHOGukYoutube- theHOGukFacebook- facebook.com/TheHeartOfGaming/Thanks for viewing this indiegogo crowd funding project. We hope you enjoyed it and found a perk to suit you. We look forward to meeting you for great gaming times ahead.Regards, Mark",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

Greetings. I am Jean Borde, a web coder, writer, autism parent and old school dungeon master. I'm am fairly well known online. You can find me through our many sites but the one I am best known on is International Discussions, even so you can also find me through Wikipedia, Facebook, etc. As a web developer I am very familiar with scams out there. To verify any information is connected to the actual project, please ensure to use the WhoIS information connected with the domain (if you know what that is). Please contact me via http://www.JeanBorde.com or http://www.RulerOfKings.com from the contact button on those pages. I am usually timely with replies. Now, on to this campaign:

We've created a free medieval fantasy text RPG that is part of a wider international community of writers, debaters and of course role-players. We already run many play-by-post games there but I've found that the pace may be slow at times, however the opportunity to be descriptive is far greater than live tabletop. I thought about combining the two to enable constant play. I have created the framework and you can start adventuring or simply test it at: RulerOfKings.com

Ruler of Kings is a medieval fantasy text role-playing game that allows you to play at anytime without the need of a Dungeon Master or other players. It works based on a combination of custom codes, a compelling story, colorful non-player characters and your choices. It is very much like reading a medieval fantasy novel where you make the choice together with dice, and role-play!

The Ruler of Kings home page explains the game more in depth and there are some videos there that can help you get a better feel for it, however to truly understand Ruler of Kings you have to play it! There is nothing like it online because it combines the element of story building, character development, role-play, and strategy thus allowing you to always be in a medieval fantasy so long as you have access to a browser and the internet. I can also describe it like reading a medieval fantasy novel where you are the author and control the protagonist. Certain elements of the game can also be edited or updated by players, For instance, if you do not like how a place in the town is described you can submit an improvement or alternate description.

As an autism parent I've seen how role-playing games can help many on the spectrum to express themselves (see this article I wrote) but this isn't about autism per se as all kinds of people play Ruler of Kings and other RPGs at our site. I am just mentioning it because many have social challenges that can benefit from an outlet to express themselves. We've decided to start a funding campaign to expand the game. At present, there are two medieval towns, many assignments and 3 specific quests that can be played at anytime. Since this engages a lot of time and expertise I need a source of income to keep me going, hence this campaign. Contributions will also help pay for servers, domains, video creation, images, more expert input into the content, etc.

When you chose to back this project you are helping many medieval fantasy lovers to have an outlet available 24/7 to get into a world that encourages writing, reading, role-play and strategy. Ruler of Kings runs in conjunction with a community (existing for over 16+ years) that caters for constructive input free from spam, trolls and haters in general. This means it is a safe place to play because it is well moderated, in fact, many stages of the game require approval at first to ensure those coming to play have an intent to be a genuine participant.
Your contribution will specifically aide in expanding these parts of the game:
1. The introduction of armies, battle map and player army battles
2. The introduction of clans among players
3. The introduction of a familiar with his/her own role-play
4. The introduction of more quests, especially a major quest with the typical elements of a tabletop game as part of the exploration.

Do note... Ruler of Kings at RulerOfKings.com is an ongoing project and ever growing. I have to home school two of my boys on the spectrum and look for an income at the same time - a formidable task while coding Ruler of Kings and maintaining the community it runs on. Your contributions will enable me to dedicate more time to it as I will not have to worry as much about income for the period of the expansions listed. If for some reason the campaign amount is not met we will still use what is made towards the expansion of Ruler of Kings as it is already running and being played by many.
I do understand that not everyone can contribute financially so the major ways you can help include, but are not limited to:
A. Sharing this campaign with those who you believe can help
B. Joining our community at International Discussions and contributing to the topics there as an active writer.

Hello! Salangan Games team presents you our project - Zeliria Sanctuary visual novel.
We started creating our game in July 2017
column2: originally it was planned only in Russian, as we just wanted to make a small unpretentious visual novel. But when we released a demo version, we found out that our game was interesting for many people
column3: and questions about release in Steam forced us to think about the future of the project.

column1: The interest of our Russian-speaking players made us review our plans and not only make the game in two languages ​​- Russian and English, but also significantly expand it.
To implement all that, we need much more finances than we planned, so we decided to start this fund-raising campaign.

To be an elite fighter of special forces is cool! Strength, dexterity, popularity with the opposite sex, and loyal friends – all this our Maxx has in abundance. Combat missions are difficult, but they give enough thrills to feel your life in all its glory!
 
Alas, even such a dynamic life bores with time
column2:
and the colors begin to fade. But where can a special forces soldier who passed through hell and high water find new sensations? Where no one else was before! Become the first in something, even if it will be a suicidal experiment to test the world’s first teleport!
 
What? The chance to survive is 13%? It’ll do!
 
It would be too easy and stupid to die for Maxx, but life obviously loves him. But he also could not just go down in history, having completed the experiment successfully… He’d rather get into a mess.
 
Maxx took just one step, one small step for a man, but it forever separated the past from the future, divided his life into BEFORE and AFTER, to Earth and “Hell, where am I?!”. But isn’t it what he was looking for? Or was it not the personal motives and desires that hid behind the bravado of the young fighter?
 
It is impossible to go back, past achievements and merits no longer matter, now there is only one way forward. To his new destiny in the new world – on the planet Zeliria.
But there is no reason to grieve, because there are such nice companions and irritating, but still funny and even useful at times purple hamster.
 
The company is a bit of all right: you won’t be bored. Well, for everything else, there’s a knife, a gun and your own fists. Hold on, new world!

column1: At this stage, we want to introduce you two heroes.
This is Leeka, the first girl Maxx meets on Zeliria.
She is not a human, as you can see, but neither an ordinary neko. She is a product of a genetic experiment that failed.
But not only nekos inhabit this strange planet. Meet not-a-hamster Humkey.
Never, never, never call him a hamster. The fluffy creature is not that easy
<li>a lot of choices, cardinally influencing the further events
<li>11 different endings (not counting the bad endings!)
• three girls, each with her own story and several possible endings
<li>a carefully crafted world with its own laws and history
<li>variety of fantastic beasts that you will not find anywhere else
• and, of course, a lot of beautiful scenes “about love”!

Since our game is full of humor and sarcasm (Humkey is the biggest sarcasm lover), it is very important that the color of the speech of our Salangan is not lost in translation. Therefore, for a quality literary translation of the game, we will need professional translators
column2: a significant part of the funds will be spent on their services.

column1:
The main goal of our collection is not so great - only 1800 USD, this amount will be enough for us to add several animation elements to the game and to ensure the quality translation of the game into English.
The rest funds will be aimed at improving the game graphics - increasing the number of transitional scenes for dynamic moments of the game, adding animation to backgrounds and sprites, as well as final arts of the game in a realistic style.
We will certainly release our game even if the fund raising is unsuccessful. But we do need your support to make it better.

Our main goals (all perks except $8 and $200):
1800$ - Additional arts, music and basic translation
column3: 5000 $ - CG for all endings in realistic style (10 CG) and additional transitional CG for dynamic scenes
column5: 15000 $ - OST Introductory video with a song

column1: We dream to make an OST intro. This small fragment creates that initial mood needed for player to plunge into the new world. Just two or three minutes, but to make them at the level corresponding to the rest of the content, we need to record a song in English and make animation.

All $8 and $200 funds will be spent for translation into Japanese. To release the game in Japanese at the same time as the English one, we need $ 10,000. If this amount is not collected, we will release the Japanese version later (as the game is sold). Nevertheless, even a partial amount will speed up the translation of the project.

If you do not have the opportunity to support us financially, you can help us by sharing our project with your friends and relatives at Facebook and Twitter. Besides, Indiegogo offers its own share tools.
We work hard to create the best experience for our players. Here we can show you some of our progress:
We'll keep you advised about the game process, show you sketches and arts, so that you can be sure we spend our time smartly.

The world of Zeliria is full of fairy creatures, incredible events, and bright heroes. Of course, we are ready to share the wonders of Zeliria with our sponsors! Among our bonuses you will find fantastic wallpaper for your desktop (PC and smartphone), sets of comics devoted to events that are left out of the game but are no less interesting
column2: as well as various cool trifles - chibi versions of our characters, digital dakimakuras and much more! Of course, the key to the Steam version of the game is included in most of the bonuses. For the most generous donators, we have prepared more interesting bonuses - the opportunity to come up with one of the inhabitants of the planet (for Bestiary) or a deity (for the Pantheon) of Zeliria, or even become one of the characters of our game, literally ""headlong diving"" into this fantastic world!

column1: That's our first project and we understand you may have some questions. Are they reliable? Will they finish the project? Will they justify our trust?
The answer is YES. Our players and their trust are the best thing we have and we cannot afford to loose it. We will certainly finish the project, regardless of the amount of funds.

Alas, such a long process, like game development, always carries some risks.
Sweeping aside force majeure such as floods, diseases and combustion of ""the only disk where all the materials were"" (we have much more backups :)), we are afraid we have to delay release a bit (because of the larger number of graphics than originally planned). To avoid this, we if possible plan to attract one more artist for game scenes (line and draft color), and to connect several testers to speed up the search of game bugs at the final stage of development.

Set in the nineties, USSR, ""Seven Summer days"" is a set of five visual novels combining loss, passion, anger and mystery. Noir story is the first game from series. After it there will be plot bridges: a loss story, a passion story and an anger story. And Road Demon/Demiurge-trio finishes it as a big epilogue of Close Realms Universe.
Each game features about 20 hours of gameplay with a total non-linear scenario and multiple endings. Six heroines, with a meeting of two of them in the Noir story.

I'm working in GMS2 so porting game to another gaming platforms is only matter of money (and buying extended license). So in case of success there will be simultaneous release in any possible PC/mobile device. In case of even greater succes I can create web-version of game.
7sd will contain more than 120 hours of gameplay in its script, over 50 backgrounds, and 3+ hours of music.
I already have fully working demo so you are able to check future game via downloading/playing the demo and decide whether you support me or not. Probably you just hate visual novel, you know.

• Sprites or heroines models.There are SIX main heroines (Maria, Lera, Stasya, Lana, Sasha, Yana) and I have only one of them.  It costs money. I'm working with a great artist so there are no doubts about future sprite quality.
• Music or soundtrack. Speaks for itself. Good music costs money. And yeah, I'm working with yet another great artist. You can check his music in the demo.
• License! Well, it costs about $400 to port my game to all your devices.
• Translation. Well I'm writing in russian so I need someone who's good enough to translate my text. And he will be paid for his work.

Let me make some loud noises... FROM THE CREATOR OF NUMBER ONE EVERLASTING SUMMER'S MODIFICATION!!! Come on. It's just a mod. People reading it do love it and want me to continue writing this mod. But instead of it I'm going to convert this mod to the separate game (is coming after my work at D3|RD will be finished).
2. Bridge one (loss story) - a story with two routes with Lana and Maria (a boat trip and a train trip). This will be a first connection between original 7dl story and an actual Road Demon scenario.
3. Bridge two (passion story) - story with Stasya and Lera.
3. Bridge three(anger story) - story with Yana and Sasha.
4. Road Demon/Demiurge-trio - main story with all six heroines.
5. 7dl conversion project - converting my already extisting universe into the separate game (its about 100 hours of gameplay. No kidding!)
6. A book may be created, if the idea finds some response.

My stories are about people. About their relationships and their fate leading into the surprisingly interesting endings.  You could find some warmth and hope if you need it. Or just dive deep into a grim atmosphere of my noir story.  Just try clicking some buttons. There are three parts of stories: Lana's ending from the conversion, Dem prologue from Road Demon|Demiurge-trui and Noir as demo exclusive.
BTW, you've got two numbers ""3"". For your info.

Well, the most risk is all mine. Since I've already got in here. I'll be working on my universe no matter of gaining the goal or not. It will be just... slower. The most expensive of course is the music and the heroines' visual. But I will got it as well one way or another. So supporting me you're just speeding up the process.
And yeah, go check out my demo please.
You can get it here on google.drive. Enjoy reading!
What I need from you is to spread a word about 7 summer days/7 dney leta amongst the people:

And of course read it and feel all my emotions bound to my text.

Join Kiwi in his adventure!

Kiwi is an adorable 2D Auto Scroller with hand-drawn art and original music. You play as Kiwi, a young bird who is on a quest to rescue his parents after they have been captured by poachers. On his journey, Kiwi will travel to three Islands-- New Zealand, Australia, and Japan-- and face new enemies and obstacles along the way.

Features:

To bring Kiwi into your wings, the team hopes to raise at least $500. This money will go towards advertising for the game, licensing fees, and Unity Collaboration membership fees.

All your donations will ensure that Kiwi reaches many platforms and that we can share Kiwi with as many people as possible!

In what other ways can you help? Share the uber-cute Kiwi with your friends and family to get the word out!

On his journey, Kiwi will travel to three Islands-- New Zealand, Australia, and Japan-- and face new enemies and obstacles along the way.Features:

To bring Kiwi into your wings, the team hopes to raise at least $500. This money will go towards advertising for the game, licensing fees, and Unity Collaboration membership fees.All your donations will ensure that Kiwi reaches many platforms and that we can share Kiwi with as many people as possible!In what other ways can you help? Share the uber-cute Kiwi with your friends and family to get the word out!",0.0,0,"2 Campaigns

column1: Players have already delivered a lot of creative input on how the game could evolve to the next level. However right now the daily revenue is not enough to sustain working on it. So it's up on you guys to decide if Orcs should evolve to the next level. I would love to continue to work on it, it's my favourite game project so far.

What will you do with my money?
You will allow major Updates to be developed. Coming out every 2 weeks on a Friday. These Updates will bring more game content and give you plenty to achieve and unlock. $2300 is enough for me to focus full time for 3 months on the game and in this time I will create the updates to Orcs.

+New Quests(10+): Face the final Challenges to conquer this island.
Fight through the Barbarian Bastion, face the strongest Humans in a last heroic show down.

+Battle Action: Mighty Warrior Talents
Get full control over your faith and react in time with the right move. It's up to you to maximise your damage output or go defensive.

+New Luck based Drops 
Wood chopping will now drop various items to build Armor for your Warrior. Each Armor level will add a new passive bonus effects to your Warrior that appear/trigger during Quest Battles depending on the type of bonus.

0,"


We are team of six people. We have the will, knowledge and most importantly the passion to see this project to the end. What we do lack, is funding to expand our numbers with a team of 3D Modelers and animators, and with some more server programmers and Unity3D developers, who will help us finish the project by the end of this year. And that's where You guys come in play. However, if we fail to gather required funds via crowdfunding, we certainly won't be giving up on this. Completing Heroes of Asgard is our dream, and you just do not give up on your dreams that easily!
column4:
/>

Heroes of Asgard will be an old-school MMORPG with new ideas and modern execution, based upon the gameplay of Metin2, and is due to release in late 2015.
column7: />
column10:
/>

Ascalon, land of the rich and prosperous. Long ago, the Ascalonians have learned the life of trading. Prosperity has gradually transformed the area into a marketplace where traders from other kingdoms gathered to display their most precious treasures with a bid to find buyers or to trade for other exotic item.

Talos, a strong and mighty kingdom who fought bravely against the titans, where names of those legendary heroes are now recorded in the book of Asgard. Talos is the birthplace of great heroes. The Talosian are proud of their ancestors and train hard each day with an aim to continue the legacy and be remembered forever.

Midas, land of mystery, surrounded by a world of wilderness. Legend has it that the senior Gods constructed a magical wall in this land to prevent demons from invading. The Midasians believe that there is something magical hidden beneath the land which is why the demons have been trying to take over the area for themselves.



Combat is based on Hack &
column11:
Slash system, the player hits the space key each time he or she wishes the character to strike, or just keep holding the button to complete the combo!

Every Class has 6 different skills, divided by attack skills and buffs. Buffs skills can be applied on self or for all. Every skill has 4 different grades and at each grade the animation is enhanced.

Skill starts at the non-master level. After a fixed amount of skill points, the skill advance to Master Level. At this stage the skill can only advance by reading books. Books can be found from Arks or special box and can only be read once a day. At every level, the amount of books needed to complete is increased till it reaches the Grand Master level. The last grade is known as the Perfect Master which needs some rare stones to achieve.

There are also several passive skills that are common in all Class and sub class. They can just be leveled up with special books and they help the players in different ways, like raising some status or boosting special abilities.

PVP system is various and can be triggered in any map. A player can attack other player from a different nation without restriction as they are no different from the monsters. They can also attack player from the same nation using the Free Mode (although it doesn't come without a cost) or he can press the ""Duel"" button and start a normal 1 versus 1 against a co-national. PVP is also triggered on the external maps when 2 or more players claim the same Ark or the same Boss. Usually these situations escalate quickly and friends of both parties approach immediately to aid their friends causing a big war that may continue even after the object of the dispute is long gone. It is also common to attack the Town of a nation with a small or larger group of players and this particular PVP is called raid.

Apart from the common PVP, the game offers different kind of PVP.

Once a week, each kingdom fights for the glory of their Kingdom known as the Kingdom War. All 3 kingdoms fight each other in a 2 round match on an event map. During the first round, kingdom with less point will be sent back home while on the second round the kingdoms with more points is the winner.
column14: />
column17: />
column20: />
column22:
/>


To ensure greater success during game development, the founders and their team members have agreed to go with crowd funding through Indiegogo to raise sufficient fund for the purpose of hiring more graphical staff and server programmers. It is also through crowd funding, we are anticipating supporters who like our work to be involved with us through valuable feedback and game testing.

We want to increase the development budget so we can increase the size of our development team. This in turn will allow us to further increase the amount of gameplay content such as having more dungeons and possibly organizing a team of cinematic animators to create a variety of impressive trailers for the game. We want to make this team as large as we can! We are convinced that we are very close to making a great RPG and we want to rise to the occasion by investing everything we can into it.

So far the game has been funded by us and few friends of ours, who share our passion for MMORPG, but we have reached the limit of what we can do on our own. Here's where your help becomes very valuable. Here's where you can make the difference to help us build an excellent MMORPG. We'll welcome your input as backers and as fans. We know that your feedback makes our games better. By backing this project and giving your input, you become part of our team and an invaluable part of the publication of our game.
NOTICE: Failing to gather funds via crowdfunding will not stop this project, project will be completed as planned, no matter what! :)
column25: />
column28: />
column30:
/>

Our ambition is to create a memorable experience for you, and we know that's only possible if we offer you a diverse, surprising and consistent game world. That takes a lot of time and effort, but it's what we love doing.

If we exceed our target budget, we can start thinking on implementing systems that affect the entire game and not just the game world. Features such as more character customization, game editor features and more levels of interactivity.
column33:
/>



Technical hurdles: 
Software development is never certain. Projects can run late or face technical issues.

Our team does come to this project having proper planning, trying to lay the foundation and understanding the complexity. While this track record is no guarantee of success, it does give us a distinct edge for the amount of time spent. Also, we're using tools like the Unity Engine that help offset some of the risks, and allowing us to more rapidly create prototype, test and iterate. We have been in actual development for almost 8 months now, and already have a number of our key systems in the prototype working. Next, we'll stage our system trials to narrow down unknowns. At each stage, your participation will help in refining the game further, which helps up the odds we'll deliver on the fun

column1: Emanuele Manzione - Lead programmer, years of experience as a server programmer and Unity3D developer.
Cosimo Manzione - Unity3D developer, with 5 years experience in game developing.
Vlatko Savkovic - Server side programmer, though sometimes a bit nuts, he has strong skills in C/C++, C#, Java and over 6 years of experience in the branche.
Djordje Zlatic - Lead Designer, proficient with Maya, Cinema 4D, Zbrush, Photoshop, After Effects, Nuke. Crazy mind behind graphics of this project
Mira Debilce - 3D Modeler and Animator
uros sljivic - Concept artist, turns Crazy-minded guy's ideas into beautiful concepts

uros sljivic - Concept artist, turns Crazy-minded guy's ideas into beautiful concepts",30.0,0,"1 Campaign

Space Chronicles is a free-to-play MMORPG you can play in your browser. You are a space pilot in one of the two races of the game universe, fighting a bloody war to control the Deutanio, the most rare and precious material in the universe. Gather resources, fight the enemy, join factions to reach common objectives, explore and much more! Write the chronicles of the universe!
If you ever played games like DarkOrbit, this game will be familiar in its basic gameplay.
You start by selecting your race. Then you obtain a basic spaceship, some weapons and ammo that you can upgrade with credits, aurum, resources and by rising your exp level.

column2: >The game universe is dominated by two races: The Humans and the Ruykons. There is also present a third race non playable called 'Insectoid', biomachines with survival as their unique objective.

column1: The 'Deutanio' is the most rare and precious resource in the universe. It is the only material that can be used to produce the 'Energhon'. The 'Energhon' makes up the energy used for everything in the universe, from spaceships engines to weapons, defense shields, warp jumping and much more.

Because the 'Deutanio' is so very rare in the galaxy, the two races have engaged in research to find methods to synthetize it. The process isn't easy or cheap and introduces the concept of 'material crafting'. In the universe there are six main resources:
Beuranio, Palonite, Talonite, Teutranio, Detraxite and Deutanio

column2: >The 'Beuranio', 'Palonite' and 'Talonite' are the most common resources in the galaxy. You can find them in asteroids, salvage box, insectoid and other places.

column1: It's possible to combine the Beuranio and the Talonite to synthetize the Teutranio and combine the Palonite and the Talonite to synthetize the Detraxite. By combining the Teutranio and the Detraxite you can finally synthetize the Deutanio! Confused? I told you it wasn't easy!
And yes, you lose some resources along the way. I also told you it's not cheap!
Obviously you can also buy the already synthetized resources on the galatic market so that option is up to you!
The Credits are the main currency of the game. It can be found in the salvage boxes, in the insectoid and obviously yes, it can be looted from the other dead players.

The Aurum is a premium currency of the game, you can think of it as gold. You can get Aurum monthly if you pay for a Premium Account or buy it from our upcoming store. It can also be found in little quantity within the game to allow the free users to obtain the most powerful equipment, but obviously more slowly!

The spaceship is your ""avatar"" in the game. The Hull defines your hitpoints, your speed and the max number of resources player can load aboard. You can upgrade your ship and also buy new hulls to make it more powerful. But you can only use one ship at time, you can't build a fleet.
The weapons available are currently of three main types:
Every weapons can be loaded with different Ammo Types.

column3: >Every ammo types has a basic damage and unique effects, but the number of weapons multiply the damage of the Ammos. I'll give you an example:

column1: you have 2 laser ammo type on board, the 200 damage type and the 400 damage type.
You have 2 laser cannons. So your basic damage will be 200 x 2 for the first type of ammo and 400 x 2 for the second type.
This is a basic rule, but there are other things influencing the damage, like the experience level or the droids.
It will possible to create Factions (or Clans) to cooperatively pursue common  objectives to complete quests, events, and super special events!
This is only a brief introduction of the Space Chronicles galaxy.
It is a universe continuously evolving, one where your actions will have consequences, directing and developing the game's story!

Without getting in depth into the gameplay (that would be a very long reading for this page) you should know that there are an incredible amount of features you can further read on our website, our facebook page or our twitter account. We will upload a full gameplay guide on our website in the coming weeks, but be patient: it's long to read but also to write!

column8: >Hey, why do you want my money anyway?

column1: Space Chronicles is a project that has requested a big investment to reach this prototype  stage. Currently the project is approaching the alpha phase but we have got many ideas that we want to reasearch &
column2: develop. That's why we need your help and support!

column1: The money that we'll get from this fundraising will only be used to fund the game development, to acquire new assets and software licenses, and to hire new developers. The main objective is clear: to get the most entertaining and addictive game possible!
This is a brief explanation of every item available in perks.
Beta Forum: Access to a special forum where you can talk with devs and be an active part of the game developing with your thoughts and ideas.
Closed Alpha: Access to the first phase of playtesting that should begin at the end of June (date may vary). Alpha Access includes Beta Access!
Closed Beta: Access to the second phase of playtesting that should begin at the end of August (date may vary)
Early Start: Start the game one week before the official launch. Be stronger then other players!
Premium Account Benefits: Missile Fire Rate x 2, Repair Rate Rate x 2, 10000 Aurum every Month, 10% discount on aurum that will be combined with other promotions, and many more!
Discount on Aurum: The aurum is the ""gold"" currency of the game. You can found little amounts within the game or buy stocks from the store.
Name a Planet: Give a name to a Ruykon Planet! Moderation by the devs will be applied.
Name a Space System: Give a name to a Space System! Moderation by the devs will be applied.
1 Hours Skype with devs:  Chat or Voice call with the devs for an hour! You can ask anything you want! We speak Italian and English. You will be contacted to get an appointment.

column2: >CL-X03 is a 3x damage multiplier laser cannon. The store value is 30000 Aurum

column1: ML-S3 is an elite ammo that cause a 270 to 300 damage. Store value is 1 aurum for every single shot.
ML-S4 is one of the best ammo available, can cause 375 to 400 damage. The store value is 3 aurum for every single shot
Deutanio: Deutanio is the resource that you need to generate Energhon. The energhon gives power (activates) the Droids, the Shields and other things.
Human Promo Ship Hull: An exclusive promotional Hull only available for Indiegogo backers! This is the only chance to obtain this cool spaceship!
Ruykon Promo Ship Hull: An exclusive promotional Hull only available for Indiegogo backers! This is the only chance to obtain this cool spaceship!
Fully Upgraded Engines: The promo ship you'll receive come equipped with engines that capable of the top speed increase available.
Energhon Generator: It is a portable reactor that allows conversion of Deutanio into Energhon to power up all the ship systems like Droids, Shield etc... The store value is 30,000 aurum
Shields: Your main defense. Shields can absorb damage or even ricochet it back to the enemy, effects may vary depending on the type and upgrade you have.

Droids: these are automated machines you can take aboard your ship to help you with various functions. Every droid it's equippable with ""Chips"" that are similar to the passive and active abilities system that you see in every RPG game. The store value of the droid is 100,000 Aurum and the price of Chips range from a minimum of 10,000 to 20,000 Aurum
Close game development earlier, implement an events/quest system depending and interacting with the game world, implements factions events etc etc...
Add new universe zone to explore, add new alien, add new types of weapons and new types of playable ships.
We'll add a new playable race! The universe will be bigger and we will add new drones, new boss and new quest!
We'll realize a standalone client for the game, that you can play from you desktop instead from the browser. That means Linux support!
We appreciate any way in which will be able to help us achieve our funding. If you are unable to contribute
financially to our campaign, please share the page with your network!
instability is our main challenge: we face the risk of running out of cash.
As we are a small team, it takes longer to complete the project
column2: however it is easier to control our budget that way. Even though we are a small team, the

column1: experience and background of each member has made the team diverse with
creative/design and business/finance expertise. We are constantly analyzing the status of
the game and comparing it to our budget to ensure we have enough money.
not get funded, we'll be doing flexible funding so that backers can still get their
rewards, and so we can still improve the game.

You are a space pilot in one of the two races of the game universe, fighting a bloody war to control the Deutanio, the most rare and precious material in the universe. Gather resources, fight the enemy, join factions to reach common objectives, explore and much more! Write the chronicles of the universe!

Because the 'Deutanio' is so very rare in the galaxy, the two races have engaged in research to find methods to synthetize it. The process isn't easy or cheap and introduces the concept of 'material crafting'. In the universe there are six main resources:
Beuranio, Palonite, Talonite, Teutranio, Detraxite and Deutanio
The 'Beuranio', 'Palonite' and 'Talonite' are the most common resources in the galaxy. You can find them in asteroids, salvage box, insectoid and other places.

It's possible to combine the Beuranio and the Talonite to synthetize the Teutranio and combine the Palonite and the Talonite to synthetize the Detraxite. By combining the Teutranio and the Detraxite you can finally synthetize the Deutanio! Confused? I told you it wasn't easy!
And yes, you lose some resources along the way. I also told you it's not cheap!
Obviously you can also buy the already synthetized resources on the galatic market so that option is up to you!
The Credits are the main currency of the game. It can be found in the salvage boxes, in the insectoid and obviously yes, it can be looted from the other dead players.

The Aurum is a premium currency of the game, you can think of it as gold. You can get Aurum monthly if you pay for a Premium Account or buy it from our upcoming store. It can also be found in little quantity within the game to allow the free users to obtain the most powerful equipment, but obviously more slowly!

The spaceship is your ""avatar"" in the game. The Hull defines your hitpoints, your speed and the max number of resources player can load aboard. You can upgrade your ship and also buy new hulls to make it more powerful. But you can only use one ship at time, you can't build a fleet.
The weapons available are currently of three main types:
Every weapons can be loaded with different Ammo Types.
Every ammo types has a basic damage and unique effects, but the number of weapons multiply the damage of the Ammos. I'll give you an example:
you have 2 laser ammo type on board, the 200 damage type and the 400 damage type.
You have 2 laser cannons. So your basic damage will be 200 x 2 for the first type of ammo and 400 x 2 for the second type.
This is a basic rule, but there are other things influencing the damage, like the experience level or the droids.
It will possible to create Factions (or Clans) to cooperatively pursue common  objectives to complete quests, events, and super special events!
This is only a brief introduction of the Space Chronicles galaxy.
It is a universe continuously evolving, one where your actions will have consequences, directing and developing the game's story!

Without getting in depth into the gameplay (that would be a very long reading for this page) you should know that there are an incredible amount of features you can further read on our website, our facebook page or our twitter account. We will upload a full gameplay guide on our website in the coming weeks, but be patient: it's long to read but also to write!
Hey, why do you want my money anyway?

Space Chronicles is a project that has requested a big investment to reach this prototype  stage. Currently the project is approaching the alpha phase but we have got many ideas that we want to reasearch & develop. That's why we need your help and support!

The money that we'll get from this fundraising will only be used to fund the game development, to acquire new assets and software licenses, and to hire new developers. The main objective is clear: to get the most entertaining and addictive game possible!
This is a brief explanation of every item available in perks.
Beta Forum: Access to a special forum where you can talk with devs and be an active part of the game developing with your thoughts and ideas.
Closed Alpha: Access to the first phase of playtesting that should begin at the end of June (date may vary). Alpha Access includes Beta Access!
Closed Beta: Access to the second phase of playtesting that should begin at the end of August (date may vary)
Early Start: Start the game one week before the official launch. Be stronger then other players!
Premium Account Benefits: Missile Fire Rate x 2, Repair Rate Rate x 2, 10000 Aurum every Month, 10% discount on aurum that will be combined with other promotions, and many more!
Discount on Aurum: The aurum is the ""gold"" currency of the game. You can found little amounts within the game or buy stocks from the store.
Name a Planet: Give a name to a Ruykon Planet! Moderation by the devs will be applied.
Name a Space System: Give a name to a Space System! Moderation by the devs will be applied.
1 Hours Skype with devs:  Chat or Voice call with the devs for an hour! You can ask anything you want! We speak Italian and English. You will be contacted to get an appointment.
CL-X03 is a 3x damage multiplier laser cannon. The store value is 30000 Aurum
ML-S3 is an elite ammo that cause a 270 to 300 damage. Store value is 1 aurum for every single shot.
ML-S4 is one of the best ammo available, can cause 375 to 400 damage. The store value is 3 aurum for every single shot
Deutanio: Deutanio is the resource that you need to generate Energhon. The energhon gives power (activates) the Droids, the Shields and other things.
Human Promo Ship Hull: An exclusive promotional Hull only available for Indiegogo backers! This is the only chance to obtain this cool spaceship!
Ruykon Promo Ship Hull: An exclusive promotional Hull only available for Indiegogo backers! This is the only chance to obtain this cool spaceship!
Fully Upgraded Engines: The promo ship you'll receive come equipped with engines that capable of the top speed increase available.
Energhon Generator: It is a portable reactor that allows conversion of Deutanio into Energhon to power up all the ship systems like Droids, Shield etc... The store value is 30,000 aurum
Shields: Your main defense. Shields can absorb damage or even ricochet it back to the enemy, effects may vary depending on the type and upgrade you have.

Droids: these are automated machines you can take aboard your ship to help you with various functions. Every droid it's equippable with ""Chips"" that are similar to the passive and active abilities system that you see in every RPG game. The store value of the droid is 100,000 Aurum and the price of Chips range from a minimum of 10,000 to 20,000 Aurum
Close game development earlier, implement an events/quest system depending and interacting with the game world, implements factions events etc etc...
Add new universe zone to explore, add new alien, add new types of weapons and new types of playable ships.
We'll add a new playable race! The universe will be bigger and we will add new drones, new boss and new quest!
We'll realize a standalone client for the game, that you can play from you desktop instead from the browser. That means Linux support!
We appreciate any way in which will be able to help us achieve our funding. If you are unable to contribute
financially to our campaign, please share the page with your network!
instability is our main challenge: we face the risk of running out of cash.

column10: img src="" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"" title=""evil kitten - Indie DB"" width=""560"">
column14:
>Kitten Super Adventure is a game where you play as a kitten and explore tons of worlds, your mission is to collect the stolen catnip bags and bring them back to Cat Islands, only then can you save your kitten companions and stop the islands from sinking!

The evil Dr. Tricksies who was banished to an isolated island because of his crazy experiments finally got his revenge on the rest of the kittens by stealing all the catnip bags. Will he stop there?

No his plans are much more diabolical then that, Dr. Tricksies and the minions he has gathered plan to sink the islands, drown all the kittens and build a floating castle where Cat Islands once was.
column20:
>

Who can save Cat Islands and the kittens who live there? 

Only one kitten can, that is you!

column1: Over a year ago I presented a small tech demo in a video to see how people would respond to a game where you play as a kitten, since then a lot of people have come to love Kitten Super Adventure!

Gameplay for Kitten Super Adventure will resemble similar gameplay to that of Spyro The Dragon, what I mean by this is in Spyro there were the base areas for the level and then inside of that level, numerous portals to other playable areas. 
Kitten Super Adventure will resemble similar gameplay but instead of diamonds being collected, you will be collecting catnip bags and have puzzles to solve.
You can collect catnip bags from enemies, find treasure chests, solve puzzles, complete missions and much more!
The game itself still has a ways to go before it is actually finished and various gameplay elements have yet to be implemented but there is definitely a plan.
Features that will be present in Kitten Super Adventure are as follows:

column3:
>- Rich Storyline
(The story will follow as explained above).

>- Large Explorable Worlds
(The size of each level will vary and present different obstacles/tasks to complete).

>- Interactable Objects, NPC's, Etc.
(Some object will be around just for fun while others will be main keys to progressing further in the game or opening portals to the other playable areas).

>- Puzzles
(Puzzles can vary from ""Activate the buttons"" to getting through multiple areas with move able objects that need to be in a certain patter. Puzzles will change with the levels.).

>- Ability To Customize Your Kitten
(Customize your kittens body structure, clothing, accessories and more!
Some levels in story mode may remove your clothing/accessories and replace them with ones that fit the story, please keep this in mind and remember to save your customized kitten setups).

column1: The functionality to customize the kittens body structure is in place but has not been fully implemented into the UI for players as of yet, here is a demonstration video showing what could be done in the game in the near future.
This is a small demonstration and does not represent the final version that will be available for body customization.

column3:
>- Save Customization For Later Use
(You can save a bunch of different customized kitten setups to be used at any point in time during free roam or story mode).

>- Varying Mechanics
(The base mechanics for movement and interaction will always stay the same but depending on the level there may be an extra mechanic or even a few extra mechanics that can be utilized such as using a hoverbike, riding a skateboard, using a jetpack, etc.).

>- Multiplayer
(This is a feature that is still in the experimental stage and is planned to be in the final version, where you can enjoy being a kitten with other players, show off your customized kitten, have races, contests, you name it!)
>(As an extra bonus for completing certain missions and tasks you can unlock special title scenes or mini games.)

column1: For various reasons we decided to not offer physical rewards as it ends up taking a huge chunk out of the raised funds, what we can offer is digital content that is only available to backers.
Below you will find the perk information, each tier comes with previous tier rewards (Ex: Purchase the $100 tier and receive rewards for that tier and any prior tier)

I am sure for many of you one of the first questions that will arise is
""What is the money going to be used for?""

Let's go over that shall we:

Custom Models
(3D model creation can be costly depending on the model, I personally have not practiced enough to be proficient in making my own 3D models which is why I have Mauri on the team to cover that aspect of development. Models can range from $50 for a clothing/accessory piece to $300+ for a character, structure or anything that requires a long creation time or great detail).

Purchase Assets
(If you read the ""Game Engine"" section above you now know I am using the Unity Engine which has a store called the ""Asset Store"", since I am one person I go there to purchase things that I cannot make on my own. Things like scripting assets that help with culling, processing, handling of models, visual effects, shaders, real time reflections, etc.

Asset prices can range from $10 to $150 or more depending on what the asset does, how long it's been around and what changes have been made to it's recent updates).

Soundtrack
(The soundtrack for KSA as of now consists of mostly all royalty free music in order to minimize costs at the beginning of production, I find that having custom music tracks really helps solidify singularity and remembrance over time with gamers and devs. alike. I would like to have custom tracks replace the already present royalty free music and also new tracks for the upcoming levels/playable areas).

Marketing
(Word of mouth can be a powerful marketing tool but another powerful way to get your game known is paid advertisment, I plan to utilize paid ads with well known websites, radio commercials, convention booths, fliers, merchandise, etc. 

I do plan on attending conventions in the near future in order to showcase KSA and offer merchandise that people can enjoy, keep or share with friends in order to spread the word and remember the game for a long time to come).

Unity Pro License Fee - $1,500
(In order to fully utilize Unity to it's fullest potential the pro version purchase is necessary, currently I do a monthly subscription but with the funds from this campaign I plan to purchase it flat out for an entire year. Covering all costs for the engine use and ensuring an entirely legal release).

Production Time/Living Costs
(Production of KSA not only requires costs for things to put into the game itself but also for the game developers survival. A portion of the money raised will go towards living costs in order to solidify a stable living situation so focus on the game can be a top priority.

As I mentioned in the beginning of this fundraiser I have paid for the production of KSA from money I earned working at corporate jobs and doing independent client work. This approach worked for a while but as 10 months has passed the game is nowhere near where I wish it to be, I feel within that time I could have accomplished a lot more if I had only the time and money to just focus on the game itself. 

A portion of the raised funds will help solidify that living space and help the progress of KSA increase dramatically, pushing the overall production time and final release date a lot earlier then if I continued to work on the game only in my spare time.

This does not mean I will be buying a house or renting out a work studio to work out of, this merely means it will cover my rent and food costs so my main focus can be to finish KSA).

Kitten Super Adventure has a very small team dedicated to the production of the game, I personally handle 90% of the workload alone while the other 10% that can be attributed to 3D modeling is handled by one other person. 

Team Members:

The reason I decided to go with Indiegogo instead of Kickstarter is simple, the flexible funding option, at this point in development I have put quiet a lot of time and money into the production of the game. As a solo developer who self funds all of my projects I generally try my best not to ask for funding from others unless it is entirely necessary, at this point I feel it is necessary to get support from the fans and potential fans of the game in order to complete Kitten Super Adventure. 

So I have come on Indiegogo asking for support!
Being a solo developer there are always challenges to overcome, the biggest is marketing and the next thing to follow is optimization.

Marketing

A small portion of the funds will go towards marketing the game before and after early access release on steam, being on steam does not always mean your game will be successful so it is up to us, the developers, to give it that little extra nudge.

column3: >While word of mouth has proven to be very powerful, a nice jump start on well known websites and other platforms using their paid marketing services can help to get that word of mouth expanding beyond the point it is at right now.

>Once the game has reached a certain point I will begin offering press kits and a press version of the game that will be sent out to newspapers, magazines, YouTubers and many other places that offer exposure for games.


Optimization

While the game is meant to be quiet large and immersive the challenge lies in optimizing the game in order to function on most peoples computer,
high or low end. 

The best solution I have come up with for this is LOD's (Load On Demand/Level of Detail) and depth of field culling, both have significantly lighten the load of each level I have implemented those systems into. I have presented this a few times over the course of development on the games facebook page, providing screenshots displaying changes in Tri Count and Draw Calls.
>Another option I am looking into is world streaming, it's something I plan to learn more about in the near future as it seems very promising for optimization.

>Even if the fundraiser is not successful whatever funds that has been raised will be put towards the production of the game, I definitely plan on finishing the game either way as I am not one to give up on anything that easily. Funds will help the production time decrease and allow complete focus on this game, without the funds I will have to work on it only in my spare time and gather funds from my paid work to put towards custom models and the other expenses.

column1: If you have read this far you are awesome! Thank you so much for taking an interest in Kitten Super Adventure, the development of this game means a lot to me and hopefully my passion is apparent ^_^

If you have read this far you are awesome! Thank you so much for taking an interest in Kitten Super Adventure, the development of this game means a lot to me and hopefully my passion is apparent ^_^

As a solo developer the process is not always easy but anything is possible and with your support I can make this dream into a reality, I have even considered a VR possibility in the future which I think a lot of people will enjoy.

A big inspiration for making this game was a huge desire to be a kitten, I am sure a lot of us have had this feeling at one point or another hehe to be a kitten and lounge around or go on secret missions where only a kitten could go! The adventures of a kitten must be so thrilling :D
Once again thank you so much for any sort of support you have shown!

column11: >Forget everything You know about classical pinball!
column18: >After a long period of time, pinball has evolved to Weed Pinball!

column1: Weed Pinball will be published on several platforms. Firstly on Android and iOS mobile devices then later on Windows (Steam), Linux &
column2: Mac OS. Finally the game will be published on PS4, PS3 and Xbox One.

column1: Weed Pinball is an action-arcade with ultra sharp and fluid 2D graphics, realistic physics and extraterrestrial music which wont leave you indifferent.
The game is created for all Pinball &
column2: Weed enthusiasts. The game will offer a Single-player with an intuitive game play story in which you fight to collect as many points as possible so you can grow more weed on your farm.

column1: The game will also offer multiplayer to play against other stoners like yourself for different monthly and weekly prizes.
You will be surprised over and over again while playing Weed Pinball and you will laugh your head off while doing it!

In the Single-player you will go deep into the story-line to meet every crazy character that is shown in the game. Each in-game character will give you a new awesome experience, but watch out because the  game also has bad guys which try to stop you in your mission to collect and grow as much weed as possible.
The first Two levels which have been finished:
