Level Nirvana 2 is still in production, but above are some pictures of what we've done with it till now so you can see our progress!

column1: To immerse you even more into this game in-between each level you will have special mini games which are used to create the changing environment for extra fun, but don't worry they also serve a purpose to the whole game as for example
column2: before starting your first level you have to fly The Weed Voyager through space to collect as many stoner accessorize and avoid the police badges as they create minus points. The point to this is that as more points you obtain the more Pinball balls you will receive when your playing a level. For each new level you will have a new mini game which will keep you feeling satisfied and wanting to play more.

column1: The Multiplayer is the most fun part of our game. When playing multiplayer you can choose to play online or offline. While playing offline, you can play it on different devices or on the same device, for example on a tablet where each side of the tablet the user has his own controls.

Weed Pinball multiplayer is full of surprises and tricks with which you can win and disable your opponent. From switching their controls from left to right, to getting number of different power-ups. In addition to this, if you want to make the game harder for your opponent you can also hit the frog with your ball and cause it to drop bombs and shorten the two joints that the opponent has as his controls, but be careful, the same can happen to you.

While competing online you will be able to compete in a friendly match ladder or in a competitive match ladder for which you will need to submit the plants you earned in to enter the competition. For each victory you will gain your opponents weed plant and there will also be monthly and weekly prizes for first three places on the scoreboard.
You will also be able to brag about your victory on Facebook and show your friends who the real Weed Master is!
For Multiplayer we currently have one Map for Offline and Online. In the future we will add more Maps to keep the game changing and more fun!

Although hes not a real angel, Bob likes to present himself as an angel. He currently lives in his kingdom called ""Nirvana"" and is known as the guardian of weed and is very stingy when it comes to sharing the weed.
The dragon which had a hard childhood. After his parents sold him for a kilo of cocaine to some dealers.

column1: Psychedelic frog Angel Bob loves to lick.

He is trying to catch Baja in his dealing endeavors. He is a very clumsy police officer  and not even one criminal is afraid of him. While he was on duty, someone stole his belt so when you hit him with your ball in-game his pants can drop.
The reason why we chose crowdfunding is because we need your help!
column9: > over 30,000$ for copyright, software, hardware and other costs which are only related to production of the game. Now we need your help to help us finish the game with better quality and deliver it to you our supporter as fast as possible.

column1: To be able to create the game as good as possible and most important to be able to buy servers on which we would host our game on. Currently we are unable to implement the online Multiplayer as we need servers for that. With these servers we would cover all the platforms and unify them so that a person who owns Android can play against an iPhone user or even against Mac Os or Windows. In the future we would implement it with PS4, PS3, PSVita and Xbox One.

With your donation we would also be able to concentrate our full time towards Weed Pinball. You would give us an ability to finish the game much earlier and to implement other features into the game that all you gamers will love
column2: from new levels to new mini games and different online competitions.

column1:
PluraGames is a game studio from Croatia owned by Pluramaks Company. PluraGames team is specialized in development of innovative, different and fun games for all platforms. 
Our goal is to develop stories accompanied with all sort of ""big"" themes in this accelerated world and transform them to very interesting games with HD graphics, futuristic sounds, all kind of various special effects and what's most important, have fun doing it! We hope to entertain You and provide You some new experiences of playing games.
Branko Blazevic, CEO, Graphics Designer
Daniel Greguric, Game Developer
Emil Varga, Public Relations Manager
","Forget everything You know about classical pinball! After a long period of time, pinball has evolved to Weed Pinball!

Weed Pinball will be published on several platforms. Firstly on Android and iOS mobile devices then later on Windows (Steam), Linux & Mac OS. Finally the game will be published on PS4, PS3 and Xbox One.
Weed Pinball is an action-arcade with ultra sharp and fluid 2D graphics, realistic physics and extraterrestrial music which wont leave you indifferent.

The game is created for all Pinball & Weed enthusiasts. The game will offer a Single-player with an intuitive game play story in which you fight to collect as many points as possible so you can grow more weed on your farm.
The game will also offer multiplayer to play against other stoners like yourself for different monthly and weekly prizes.
You will be surprised over and over again while playing Weed Pinball and you will laugh your head off while doing it!

In the Single-player you will go deep into the story-line to meet every crazy character that is shown in the game. Each in-game character will give you a new awesome experience, but watch out because the  game also has bad guys which try to stop you in your mission to collect and grow as much weed as possible.
The first Two levels which have been finished:
Level Nirvana 2 is still in production, but above are some pictures of what we've done with it till now so you can see our progress!

To immerse you even more into this game in-between each level you will have special mini games which are used to create the changing environment for extra fun, but don't worry they also serve a purpose to the whole game as for example
column2: before starting your first level you have to fly The Weed Voyager through space to collect as many stoner accessorize and avoid the police badges as they create minus points. The point to this is that as more points you obtain the more Pinball balls you will receive when your playing a level. For each new level you will have a new mini game which will keep you feeling satisfied and wanting to play more.

column1: The Multiplayer is the most fun part of our game. When playing multiplayer you can choose to play online or offline. While playing offline, you can play it on different devices or on the same device, for example on a tablet where each side of the tablet the user has his own controls.

Weed Pinball multiplayer is full of surprises and tricks with which you can win and disable your opponent. From switching their controls from left to right, to getting number of different power-ups. In addition to this, if you want to make the game harder for your opponent you can also hit the frog with your ball and cause it to drop bombs and shorten the two joints that the opponent has as his controls, but be careful, the same can happen to you.

While competing online you will be able to compete in a friendly match ladder or in a competitive match ladder for which you will need to submit the plants you earned in to enter the competition. For each victory you will gain your opponents weed plant and there will also be monthly and weekly prizes for first three places on the scoreboard.
You will also be able to brag about your victory on Facebook and show your friends who the real Weed Master is!
For Multiplayer we currently have one Map for Offline and Online. In the future we will add more Maps to keep the game changing and more fun!

This being is not a male as everyone thinks. It lives in a very distant galaxy, where the main ingredient for life is THC. It is not aware in which troubles it will fall into when it comes to visit other galaxies.
As an escaped prisoner, he is trying to start a new business as a weed dealer. In the absence of weed on his home planet, he is trying to get the goods in other solar systems.

Although hes not a real angel, Bob likes to present himself as an angel. He currently lives in his kingdom called ""Nirvana"" and is known as the guardian of weed and is very stingy when it comes to sharing the weed.

The dragon which had a hard childhood. After his parents sold him for a kilo of cocaine to some dealers. Angel Bob saved him from those dealers. Today, they are best friends and whenever Angel Bob needs to light his joint Coco is there to help.
Psychedelic frog Angel Bob loves to lick.

He is trying to catch Baja in his dealing endeavors. He is a very clumsy police officer  and not even one criminal is afraid of him. While he was on duty, someone stole his belt so when you hit him with your ball in-game his pants can drop.

The reason why we chose crowdfunding is because we need your help! We have already invested over 30,000$ for copyright, software, hardware and other costs which are only related to production of the game. Now we need your help to help us finish the game with better quality and deliver it to you our supporter as fast as possible.

To be able to create the game as good as possible and most important to be able to buy servers on which we would host our game on. Currently we are unable to implement the online Multiplayer as we need servers for that. With these servers we would cover all the platforms and unify them so that a person who owns Android can play against an iPhone user or even against Mac Os or Windows. In the future we would implement it with PS4, PS3, PSVita and Xbox One.

With your donation we would also be able to concentrate our full time towards Weed Pinball. You would give us an ability to finish the game much earlier and to implement other features into the game that all you gamers will love
column2: from new levels to new mini games and different online competitions.

The Surgical Mission of QMedical Alliance Uganda is aiming at raising resources to provide services to alarming numbers of Key populations who can not access such services at other facilities because of the discrimination and judgement bestowed. This has constantly caused unnecessary deaths at hospitals and to some at home in fear of access to such services.

QMedical Alliance has pending requests for surgical procedures and requires utilities and supplies to carry out such procedures hence the request here for contributions.

At the Moment, two surgical procedures are set to take place due to the conditions of patients who have been diagnosed with complications that require certain procedures.

Please pour your heart out and donate to the cause

Demo

Fight the first boss – Spitter Rat – in the downloadable demo.

On the run from Rabisu, Jushur stumbles upon the city of the Unworthy. They welcome him as a hero predestined to beat the demon but Jushur’s only desire is to get as far away from the Flying island as possible. He flees the city but he is lost in the canals when the Spitter Rat attacks him. Thankfully, the Unworthy appear, ready to help the chosen one.

You cannot use Erimha in this level since Jushur hasn’t gained it yet.

Please, keep in mind, the demo is not 100% finished yet.

Click here to download demo (Windows).

Click here to download demo (macOS).

Gameplay

The Game

Elfscape consists of 18 quests, including 8 big and epic ones.

Every quest tells a story of a specific character and their relation to Jushur. In the side quests, you will accompany Jushur to various situations – whether he’s celebrating a wedding, being a hairstyle consultant, teaching children how to write, or listening to local fool’s poems.

In the main quests, Jushur is searching for a way to defeat the demon. You’ll try to kill the demon’s servants and they will try to kill you. Dive into Jushur’s story and meet interesting characters, such as elven princess or your enemies from the old times. You’ll be worshipped and you’ll mourn the deaths of your friends.  

And moreover, you can just run around the world as you like and discover new territories. Have fun - pick some plants, kill some beasts -  and use gathered materials later to create ammunition, armour and potions.

You can play Elfscape on a keyboard, but it is recommended to play with gamepad (it’s especially useful when fighting with Erimha).


 

Erimha

Erimha is an ancient weapon of the Elves. Its effect changes depending on the type of ammunition. Erimha has three built-in slots and each bullet can be fired in two different styles. The player can alternate between the slots during a fight.


 

 

The Canals

The Elfscape world is quite big. Better use water canals for transportation from one end to the other. 
 

 

 

 

Story

Rabisu! Make a deal with me!

Have you ever felt that your RPG character is an almighty god with so much power, that it became quite boring? Well, elven prince Jushur Eanatum feels like this his whole life. In the Elfscape world, elves are absolutist rulers – no wonder, they’re smarter, stronger and they live longer... And the Gods want it that way.

However, when elf Jushur Eanatum gets poisoned by his own servants , he finds himself standing at the gate to the afterlife. Jushur fears entering the gate so he makes a deal with a curious creature named Rabisu – granting him one more chance for life in exchange for a promise to serve Rabisu after his final death. Unfortunately, Rabisu never specified the length of that promised life.


And so it happens, the first thing Jushur sees when he wakes up is demon Rabisu who came to claim his soul. Jushur runs from the demon and tries to hide in the caves under the city...

 

 

The Unworthy

A wise ruler sees his folk like his own children. Children unable to live without his fatherly guidance, following him beyond death. 

Deep in the caves under the city live the Unworthy. They spend their whole lives worshipping the cult of the Elf, the Noble Beast Lahmu and the First High Priest.

No light reaches the underground so only the prayers determine morning and night. Prophecy foretold that one day, the Elf will descend to the underground and, with the Unworthy by his side, lead a victorious war against the demon.

Not too many of them realise what the word „war“ really means.

 

 

 

Characters

 

Jushur Eanatum 

Jushur, a bored ruler of the western part of The Flying Islands. Folks love his fatherly reigning hand, kind and just at the same time. At least that’s what he seems to think.

 

Rabisu – Master of the Towers

Demon Rabisu lurks after sinful souls that  are terrified of the gods‘ final judgement. For a simple promise to become the servants in his world after their final death, the desperate deceased get one more chance in the world of the living. In the history of time, nobody has ever defeated the demon.  

Ida 

Ida is a cheerful, very noisy person. She doesn’t care much about the prophecy and the temple. Instead, her mute brother Micha gets most of her attention.

 

Wappa

Wappa is a hardworking but hot-headed young man with an opinion on everything. He’s aspiring for a priest career but his hot temper (and, according to the current High Priest, lack of devoted faith) sabotages his own efforts.

Binitarian  Lahmu

The legendary Noble Beast Lahmu. His mere existence is to assist the Elf in the glorious war against the demon. He doesn’t seem to think too highly of people, though...

 

Cities

There are two big cities in the underground – Eshara and Shroomgarden. The city carved in stone - Eshara is the capital city of Elf’s cult. The High Priest Fulrad resides here. You can recognise people from the city by their simple, brownish clothing.

On the contrary, Shroomgarden is built in a mushroom oasis. Instead of prayers, you can hear songs and beating of the drums – folks are much less conservative here.

Cities are home for craftsmen. If Jushur brings them material, they can make anything he needs for his upcoming adventures for free (it is a sin to ask the noble Elf for money). Jushur can get anything here, from potions to armour, or Erimha ammunition.  All quests start in the cities.
column2:
>City of Eshara

Shroomgarden

column1:
Writing

There are two types of writing in the Elfscape world - elvish and human. Elvish, on the left, is read from top to bottom. Because Elves are magical creatures, even their writing is over-flown with magic, creating ornamental patterns. Human writing, on the right, is read from left to right. People are slower writers so their writing is more simple. It's not magical, but it's easy to read.

Comics

If you want to know, how the life in the underground looks like, and to discover what it means to be praying to Lahmu every day and waiting for the Elf’s arrival, you should meet Agol.

Agol only wants two things in life. One, to have the least complicated life possible. Two, the heart of his beloved Naara. Watch him find out that these two wishes contradict each other – and check out his life before the arrival of the Elf in the comics here:

  Click here to read the comics!

Stay in touch with Elfscape universe. Comics come out every other week and their story ends where the game’s story begins.

 

Perk items

'Thank you' in the credits

You will be mentioned and thanked in the credits of the game.

Game

Steam key for the game.

Original Soundtrack

An electronic version of the soundtrack in .mp3 or .flac format.

Stickers

15 cute Elfscape-themed stickers.

T-shirt

A cotton T-shirt with a print in a male or female version, black with a light-coloured print or white with black print.
column2: >Sheep Design
column4: >The sheep of the Unworthies have unusual glowing mushrooms growing on their backs. You’ll send us a photo of your favourite mushroom and choose the colour of its glow – and we will create the sheep of your heart. These sheep can be found grazing on moss next to every town. They bleat, they walk around... and they are totally awesome!

column1:
Carve your face in stone 

There are statues of long-forgotten elven aristocrats scattered in the underground of the Flying Island. You will send us your photo and, after some consultation, your face will become the face of one of the aristocratic statues. We’ll try and portray your face as life-like as possible, with only minor necessary changes for the authenticity of the game surroundings (for instance, we might have to remove your glasses).

Be a dishonour to your family/Become a dead hero/Become a legend

Your face will belong to an Unworthy with whom you’ll be able to interact during the game. We’ll try and portray your face as life-like as possible, with only minor necessary changes for the authenticity of the game surroundings. 

You can also choose the personality of your Unworthy – sanguine, choleric, melancholic or phlegmatic. We might be able to implement some interesting parts of your life into the game if you send us your closer description.

Keychain

This striking keychain can also be worn as a clothing accessory. Vegetable-tanned leather of natural colour will mature with time and gain a beautiful patina. There are Jushur’s words carved into the keychain: “I don’t want to die. Make a deal with me!” – words that mark the beginning of the fight for his soul.

Hooded Sweatshirt

Both sweatshirt designs are made of pleasant, soft cotton material (67% cotton, 33% PES) brushed from the inside. The oversize cut will make you feel extra safe and comfortable. The strings on the green version have pendants with „Elf“ and „Rabisu“ symbols. The red version goes really well with the leather pouch, in this combination creating beautiful sweater-dress. Naara wears a very similar red robe! (You don’t know who Naara is? Hurry up and read the comics!) Whose robe is the inspiration for the green sweatshirt? That shall remain a secret for now. 

The sizes will be chosen individually via e-mail because of the unusual cut of the sweatshirts.

Belt and Pouch

The pouch is made out of black vegetable-tanned leather. The rounded top cover gives the pouch its shape and it has the Elfscape logo delicately carved in. Inside you can find one pocket that easily fits your wallet, phone and keys. The pouch is detachable, giving you the alternative to wear the belt on its own. The belt itself is size-adjustable with a robust carabine and a D-ring used for fastening.

Hooded Sweatshirt + Belt and Pouch


 

Keychains, hooded sweatshirts and pouches are handmade by a fashion  designer Kristína Šmeringaiová. She comes from Slovakia in Central Europe but currently resides in the Czech Republic. For her creations, she uses raw, unprocessed natural materials and mystical/religious motives. Check out her Instagram.

 

 

Artworks 



 

 

Team

We are a small team of developers from Slovakia (Central Europe). Our work has already been supported by Slovak Arts Council – but we need your help to turn Jushur´s story into reality. The raised funds will go mainly towards the salaries of people working full-time on the project.

Adam Schwarz – game designer, writer, composer

Matúš Kubica – programmer

Kristína Lebenská – 2D artist

Adel Smolková – 2D artist

Andrej Kmeť – level design

Zuzana Schwarzová - social media, public relations

Stay in touch

                    

 

  

 

 

This project was supported using public funding by Slovak Arts Council.

Belt and PouchThe pouch is made out of black vegetable-tanned leather. The rounded top cover gives the pouch its shape and it has the Elfscape logo delicately carved in. Inside you can find one pocket that easily fits your wallet, phone and keys. The pouch is detachable, giving you the alternative to wear the belt on its own. The belt itself is size-adjustable with a robust carabine and a D-ring used for fastening.

Hooded Sweatshirt + Belt and Pouch Keychains, hooded sweatshirts and pouches are handmade by a fashion  designer Kristína Šmeringaiová. She comes from Slovakia in Central Europe but currently resides in the Czech Republic. For her creations, she uses raw, unprocessed natural materials and mystical/religious motives. Check out her Instagram.  Artworks   TeamWe are a small team of developers from Slovakia (Central Europe). Our work has already been supported by Slovak Arts Council – but we need your help to turn Jushur´s story into reality.
